en: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
uz: Dushanba kuni Stenford Universitetining Tibbiyot maktabi olimlari hujayralarni turlariga qarab saralay oladigan yangi tashxis vositasi ixtirosini e'lon qildi: har biri taxminan bir AQSH senti atrofida bo'lgan standart rangli printerlardan foydalangan holda ishlab chiqarish mumkin bo'lgan ingichka bosma chip.

en: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
uz: Yetakchi tadqiqotchilarning aytishicha, bu kam daromadli davlatlarda bemorlarning saraton, sil, OIV va bezgakni erta aniqlash imkonini berishi mumkin bo'lib, bunday davlatlarda ko'krak bezi saratoni kabi kasalliklardan omon qolish darajasi boyroq davlatlardagi ko'rsatkichning yarmiga teng.

en: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
uz: JAS 39C Gripen mahalliy vaqt bilan ertalab soat 9:30 lar (0230 UTC) atrofida uchish-qo'nish yo'lagida halokatga uchradi va portlab ketdi, shu tufayli aeroport tijoriy reyslar uchun yopildi.

en: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
uz: Uchuvchi bo'linma rahbari Dilokrit Pattava ekanligi aniqlandi.

en: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
uz: Mahalliy axborot vositalarining xabar berishicha, aeroportdagi o't o'chirish mashinasi ish vaqtida ag'darilib ketgan.

en: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
uz: 28 yoshli Vidal uch mavsum avval Sevilya jamoasidan Barsa jamoasiga kelib qo'shildi.

en: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
uz: Kataloniya poytaxtiga ko'chib o'tganidan beri Vidal klub uchun 49 ta o'yinda qatnashdi.

en: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
uz: Norozilik namoyishi mahalliy vaqt bilan taxminan 11:00 da (UTC+1) Bosh vazirning rasmiy qarorgohi – politsiya qo'riqlaydigan Dauning-stritga kirish ro'parasidagi Uaytxollda boshlandi.

en: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
uz: Soat 11:00 dan o'tishi bilan namoyishchilar Uaytxolldagi shimol tomonga yo'nalgan transport yo'lini to'sib qo'ydilar.

en: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
uz: 11:20 da politsiya namoyishchilar norozilik namoyishiga bo'lgan huquqi bilan yo'l harakati tirbandligi muvozanatini saqlashi kerakligini aytib, ulardan trotuarga qaytishini so'radi.

en: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
uz: Norozilik yurishi 11:29 atrofida Uaytxolldan yuqoriga harakatlanib, Trafalgar tarafga o'tdi hamda Strand bo'ylab Aldvaych va Kingsvay orqali konservatorlar partiyasi Grand Connaught Rooms mehmonxonasida o'zlarining bahorgi forumini o'tkazayotgan Xolborn tomon yo'naldi.

en: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
uz: Nadalning kanadalikka qarshi birga-bir rekordi 7–2.

en: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
uz: U yaqindagina Brisben shahrida o'tkazilgan Ochiq musobaqada Raonichga mag'lub bo'lgan edi.

en: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
uz: Nadal birinchi uzatmada 76 ochko to'plagan holda musobaqada 88% sof ochkoni qo'lga kiritdi.

en: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
uz: o'yindan keyin tuproqli kortlar shohi: "Men eng muhim tadbirlarning yakunlovchi turlarida qatnashayotganimdan juda xursandman. Men bu turnirga g'alaba qozonish uchun kelganman", dedi.

en: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
uz: "Panama hujjatlari" — Panamaning Mossack Fonseca yuridik kompaniyasining 2016-yili matbuotga sizdirilgan o'n millionga yaqin hujjatlar uchun umumiy atamadir.

en: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
uz: Hujjatlar o'n to'rtta bankning badavlat mijozlariga soliqlar va boshqa tartib-qoidalardan qochish uchun milliardlab AQSH dollariga teng boyliklarini yashirishga yordam berganini ko'rsatdi.

en: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
uz: Britaniyaning The Guardian gazetasi Germaniya banki buni amalga oshirish uchun foydalanilgan 1200 ta soxta kompaniyaning taxminan uchdan birini nazorat qilishini aytadi.

en: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
uz: Dunyo bo'ylab norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bir qancha jinoiy ta'qiblar amalga oshirildi va Islandiya hamda Pokiston hukumatlari rahbarlari iste'fo berdi.

en: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
uz: Gonkongda tug'ilgan Ma Nyu-York Universiteti va Garvard yuridik maktabida o'qidi va bir vaqtlar AQSHda doimiy yashash huquqini beruvchi "grin karta"ga ega bo'ldi.

en: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
uz: Hsie saylov vaqtida Ma inqiroz davrida mamlakatdan qochib ketishi mumkinligiga ishora qildi.

en: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
uz: Se, shuningdek, fotogenik Ma moddadan ko'ra, ko'proq uslub ekanini qayd etdi.

en: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
uz: Ushbu ayblovlarga qaramay, Ma Xitoyning materikdagi hududi bilan yaqinroq aloqalarni himoya qiluvchi platformada oson g'alaba qozondi.

en: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
uz: Bugunning kun o'yinchisi "Washington Capitals" jamoasidan Aleks Ovechkin bo'ldi.

en: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
uz: U "Washington" jamoasi "Atlanta Thrashers" jamoasi ustidan 5:3 hisobda g'alaba qilgan o'yinda 2 gol urdi va 2 ta to'p uzatishni amalga oshirdi.

en: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
uz: Ovechkinning kechadagi ilk golli uzatmasi jamoaga yangi qo'shilgan Niklas Bekstormning g'alaba keltirgan goliga aylandi.

en: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
uz: uning o'sha tundagi ikkinchi goli mavsumdagi 60-goli bo'lib, u 1995–96 yilgi mavsumdan buyon Jaromir Jagr va Mario Lemyonlarning har biri ushbu marraga yetganidan beri bir mavsumda 60 yoki undan ko'p gol urgan birinchi o'yinchi edi.

en: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
uz: Betten 2,3 milliardga baholangan boyligi bilan 2008 yilda 400 ta eng boy amerikaliklar orasida 190-o'rinni egalladi.

en: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
uz: U 1950-yilda Virjiniya universitetining San'at va fan kollejini tamomlagan va mazkur muassasaning muhim donori bo'lgan.

en: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
uz: Iroqning Abu Graib qamoqxonasiga qo'zg'olon vaqtida o't qo'yildi.

en: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
uz: Bu qamoqxona AQSH qurolli kuchlari nazoratiga o'tgac, u yerda mahbuslarning qiynoqlarga solingani aniqlanganidan keyin tanilgan.

en: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
uz: Kichik Pike 2008-yilgi Singapur gran-prisida Fernando Alonso uchun xavfsizlik mashinasini olib chiqishda erta pit-stopdan keyin halokatga uchradi.

en: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
uz: Alonsodan oldinda ketayotgan avtomobillar xavfsizlik avtomobili ortidan yonilg'i quyishga kirdi, u g'alabani qo'lga kiritish uchun to'daning oldiga o'tib oldi.

en: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
uz: Piket Jr 2009-yilgi Vengriya Gran-prisidan keyin ishdan bo'shatildi.

en: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
uz: Aynan soat 8:46 (TO) da, aniqroq aytadigan bo'lsak, birinchi samolyot nishoniga zarba bergan vaqtda butun shahardagi sokinlik buzildi.

en: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
uz: Ikkita yorug'lik nuri tunda osmondagi nuqta tomon yo'naltirildi.

en: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
uz: Qurilish maydonida transport markazi va xotira bog'i bilan birgalikda beshta yangi osmono'par bino qurilishi olib borilmoqda.

en: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
uz: PBS shousi yigirma to'rttadan ortiq Emmy mukofotiga ega va uning faoliyati faqat "Sezam ko'chasi" hamda "Janob Rojerning mahallasi"dan qisqaroq.

en: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
uz: Serialning ham bir qismida muayyan kitobdagi mavzuga e'tibor qaratiladi, so'ng o'sha mavzu ham ko'plab hikoyalarni tadqiq qiladi.

en: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
uz: Har bir shouda bolalar o'z kutubxonalariga borganida qidirishlari kerak bo'lgan kitoblar yuzasidan tavsiyalar ham beriladi.

en: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
uz: WNED Buffalo'dan (Reading Rainbow'ning uy bekati) bo'lgan Jon Grant "Reading Rainbow bolalarga nima uchun o'qish kerakligini,… o'qishni sevishni o'rgatdi — [shou] bolalarni biror kitobni olib, o'qishga rag'batlantirdi", dedi.

en: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
uz: Ayrimlar, jumladan, Jon Grant ham, moliyaviy inqiroz va ta'limiy televizion dasturlar falsafasidagi o'zgarish serialning yakunlanishiga hissa qo'shdi, deb hisoblaydi.

en: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
uz: Sinoptiklarning ta'kidlashicha, Kabo-Verde orollaridan 645 mil (1040 km) g'arbda joylashgan bo'ron quruqlik hududlariga xavf solishidan oldin tinishi mumkin.

en: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
uz: Fred hozirda soatiga 105 mil (165 km/s) tezlikka ega va u shimoliy-g'arb tomon harakatlanmoqda.

en: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
uz: Fred sun'iy yo'ldosh orqali tasvirga olish ixtiro qilinganidan beri Atlantika okeanining janubi va sharqida hozirgacha qayd etilganeng kuchli tropik siklondir va sharqdan 35 daraja kenglikda qayd etilgan uchinchi yirik to'fondir.

en: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
uz: 1759-yil 24-sentabrda Artur Ginnes Irlandiyaning Dublin shahridagi Avliyo Jeyms darvozasi pivo zavodini 9 ming yilga ijaraga olish bo'yicha shartnomaga imzo chekdi.

en: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
uz: 250 yildan keyin Ginnes har yili 10 milliard yevro (14,7 milliard AQSH dollari) foyda olib keluvchi global biznesga aylandi.

en: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
uz: A1GP Yangi Zelandiya jamoasining ikkinchi haydovchisi Joni Rid Yangi Zelandiyadagi qurilganiga 48 yil bo'lgan Oklend ko'rfazi ko'prigidan qonuniy asosda eng katta tezlikda harakatlanish orqali bugun tarixga kirdi.

en: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
uz: Janob Rid Yangi Zelandiyaning A1GP Black Beauty avtomobilini ko'prik ustidan yetti marta 160 km/soat tezlikda haydab o'tishni uddaladi.

en: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
uz: "Black Beauty" avtomobilining past ekanligi tufayli Yangi Zelandiya politsiyasi janob Ridning qanchalik tez yurganligini aniqlash uchun o'zining tezlikni aniqlash radaridan foydalanishda muammoga duch keldi va politsiya faqat bir marta janob Rid tezlikni 160 km/soatga pasaytirganida uni qayd etishga muvaffaq bo'ldi.

en: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
uz: Oxirgi 3 oy ichida 80 dan ortiq hibsga olingan kishi rasmiy tarzda biror ayblov qo'yilmasdan tergov izolyatoridan ozod qilindi.

en: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
uz: Shu yilning aprelida sudya Glinn tomonidan hibsga olinganidan so'ng 24 soatdan ortiq sud komissari ishtirokida tinglov o'tkazilmasdan ushlab turilganlarni ozod qilinishini kuchga kiritish maqsadida muassasaga nisbatan vaqtinchalik taqiqlovchi sud buyrug'i chiqarilgan.

en: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
uz: Agar ruxsat berilsa komissar garov pulini belgilaydi va hibsga oluvchi ofitser qo'ygan ayblovlarni rasmiylashtiradi. Bundan so'ng ayblovlar ish kuzatib boriladigan shtat kompyuter tizimiga kiritiladi.

en: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
uz: Eshituv gumonlanuvchining ishni sudda tezkor ko'rib chiqish huquqi uchun sanani ham belgilashi kerak.

en: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
uz: Avstraliyalik g'aznachi va Bosh vazir Jon Hovarddan keyin Lebiral partiya yetakchisiga aylanish ehtimoli yuqori bo'lgan Piter Kastello Avstraliyadagi atom energetikasi sanoatini qo'llab-quvvatladi.

en: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
uz: Janob Kostelo so'zlariga ko'ra, atom energiyasini ishlab chiqarish iqtisodiy jihatdan yashovchan bo'lganidan keyin Avstraliya undan foydalanishda davom etishi kerak.

en: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
uz: "Agar u tijoriylashtirilsa, biz uni olishimiz shart. Ya'ni, umuman olganda atom energiyasiga qarshilik yo'q", — dedi janob Kostello.

en: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
uz: Ansa nashriga ko'ra, "politsiya bir nechta yuqori darajadagi yollanma qotillardan xavotirda edi, ular vorislik urushining boshlanib ketish ehtimolidan qo'rqqan.

en: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
uz: Politsiya u Palermoda Provensanoning o'ng qo'li bo'lgani va tajribasi kattaroqligi bilan Provensanoning imkon qadar panada yurish siyosatini davom ettirishni ko'zlayotgan keksa avlod xo'jayinlarining hurmatini qozongani sababli Lo Pikkoloning qo'li baland kelganini aytdi.

en: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
uz: 1992-yili Provensano Riina olib borgan va mafia faollari Jovanni Falkone va Paolo Borsellinolarning hayotini olib ketgan davlatga qarshi urushga chek qo'yganidan so'ng ushbu xo'jayinlarni jilovlab olgandi".

en: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
uz: Apple bosh ijrochi direktori Stiv Jobs qurilmani sahnada yurib, jinsi shimining cho'ntagidan iPhone'ni chiqargan holda namoyish qildi.

en: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
uz: 2 soatlik nutqi paytida u "Bugun Apple telefonni qayta ixtiro qilmoqchi, biz bugun tarix yaratamiz", – deya ta'kidladi.

en: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
uz: Braziliya dunyodagi eng katta Rim-katolik mamlakatidir va Rim-katolik cherkovi mamlakatda bir xil jinsli nikohlarning qonuniylashtirilishiga doimiy ravishda qarshilik qilib keladi.

en: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
uz: Braziliya Milliy Kongressi 10 yildan buyon qonuniylashtirish masalasini muhokama qilib kelmoqda hamda bu kabi fuqarolik nikohlari hozirgi kunda faqatgina Rio Grand de Sulda qonuniydir.

en: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
uz: Qonun loyihasining asl nusxasini San Pauloning sobiq meri Marta Suplifi ishlab chiqqan. Taklif etilgan qonun, o'zgartirilgandan keyin, hozirda Robert Jeffersonning qo'lida.

en: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
uz: Namoyishchilar Milliy Kongressga taqdim qilish uchun 1,2 million imzoga ega petitsiyani to'plashga umid qilishmoqda.

en: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
uz: Ko'pgina oilalar ko'chirishga qarshi kurashish maqsadida yuridik yordam so'rayotgani ma'lum bo'lganidan keyin, 20-mart kuni Shariy Ko'rfaz hamjamiyati huquqiy markazida uy-joy firibgarligi qurbonlari uchun uchrashuv bo'lib o'tdi.

en: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
uz: Ijarachilar ular bilan yuz bergan narsalarni baham ko'ra boshlaganlarida ishtirok etgan oilalarning ko'pchiligi OHA vakili Karolin Uilson ularning garov pullarini og'irlaganini va shahardan chiqib ketganini angladilar.

en: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
uz: Lokvud Gardensdagi ijarachilar yana 40 yoki undan ko'proq oilalarning ko'chirilishi mumkinligiga ishonadilar, chunki ular OHA politsiyasining boshqa jamoat turarjoy mulklarining uy-joy bilan bog'liq firibgarlikka aralashgan bo'lishi mumkinligini ham o'rganayotganligini bildilar.

en: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
uz: Guruh Mauidagi Urush yodgorligi stadionida 9000 kishi qatnashishi belgilangan shouni bekor qildi va muxlislaridan uzr so'radi.

en: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
uz: Guruhning menejment kompaniyasi, HK Management Inc., 20-sentabrda bekor qilganida, hech qanday dastlabki sabablarni keltirmadi, biroq bir kun o'tib logistik sabablarni aybladi.

en: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
uz: Mashhur grek advokatlari Sakis Kechagioglou hamda Jorj Nikolakopuloslar poraxo'rlik hamda korrupsiyada aydbor deb topilgani sababli Afinadagi Korydallus qamoqxonasiga qamald.

en: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
uz: Buning natijasida sudyalar, huquqshunoslar, advokatlar va yuristlar tomonidan avvalgi yillarda qilingan noqonuniy harakatlarning ochilib qolinishi tufayli grek huquqiy hamjamiyati doirasida katta janjal ko'tarildi.

en: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
uz: Bir necha hafta avval, jurnalist Makis Triantafillopulos Alfa telekanalidagi o'zining "Zoungla" ko'rsatuvida e'lon qilgan ma'lumotdan keyin, parlament a'zosi hamda huquqshunos Petros Mantuvalos idorasi xodimlarining noqonuniy pora va korrupsiya bilan shug'ullanganligi sababli lavozimidan ozod etildi.

en: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
uz: Bundan tashqari, eng yaxshi sudya Evengelos Kalousis xulqi buzilganlikda va korrupsiyaga aloqadorlikda aybdor deb topilganligi sababli qamoqqa tashlanadi.

en: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
uz: Roberts abort qilish etikasini ko'rib chiqishda muhim bo'lgan savol — u hayot qachon boshlanadi, deb ishonishi to'g'risida gapirishdan qat'iy bosh tortdi va bunday holatlarning o'ziga xos xususiyatlari haqida fikr bildirish axloqsizlik bo'ladi, dedi.

en: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
uz: Biroq u o'zining "Rou Ueytga qarshi" "mamlakatning o'rnatilgan qonuni" ekani haqida aytganlarini takrorlab, Oliy sud qarorlarining izchil bo'lishi muhimligini ta'kidladi.

en: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
uz: U yana Rouning qarori bog'liq bo'lgan, ko'zda tutilgan dahlsizlik huquqiga ishonishini ham tasdiqladi.

en: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
uz: Maruchidor ikkinchi o'rindagi Nosani olti ochko ortda qoldirib, pillapoyaning eng yuqorisida yakunladi.

en: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
uz: Ikki taraf katta yarim finalda to'qnash keldi, unda Nusa g'oliblarga 11 ochko keltirdi.

en: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
uz: So'ng Maruchidor Kabulturni dastlabki finalda mag'lub etdi.

en: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
uz: Hesperonikus Elizabet — Dromaeozavrlar oilasiga mansub va Velosiraptorning yaqin qarindoshi hisoblanadi.

en: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
uz: Tanasi pat bilan to'liq qoplangan, qoni qaynoq bu yirtqich qush Velosiraptorga kabi tirnoqli ikki old oyog'ini ko'tarib tik holatda yurgan deb ishonilgan.

en: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
uz: Uning ikkinchi panjasi kattaroq bo'lib, unga "g'arbiy changal" ma'nosini anglatuvchi Hesperonikus nomini bergan.

en: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
uz: Maydalangan muzga qo'shilib keskin ob-havo sharoiti ham qutqaruv ishlariga xalal bermoqda.

en: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
uz: Pittman sharoitlar keyingi haftaning ma'lum vaqtigacha o'nglanmasligini taxmin qildi.

en: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
uz: Pittmanning so'zlariga ko'ra, pakli muzning miqdori hamda qalinligi tyulen ovlovchilar uchun oxirgi 15 yildagi eng yomonidir.

en: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
uz: Jeff Vayse va to'qqiz qurbondan uch nafarining dafn marosimi o'tkazilgan Red Leyk mahallasida 21-mart kungi maktabdagi otishmalar yuzasidan yana bir o'quvchi hibsga olingani haqida yangilik tarqaldi.

en: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
uz: Hukumat organlari bugungi hibsqa olishni tasdiqlashdan boshqa hech qanday rasmiy maʼlumot bermadi.

en: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
uz: Biroq, tergov haqida ma'lumotlarga ega bo'lgan manbaning Minneapolis Star-Tribune gazetasiga aytishicha, bu Qizil ko'l qabilasining boshlig'I Floyd Jurdenning 16 yashar o'g'li Luis Jurden bo'lgan.

en: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
uz: Ayni damda qanday ayblovlar qo'yilishi yoki hukumat organlarini bolaga nima yetaklagani noma'lum, lekin federal sudda voyaga yetmaganlar bo'yicha sud jarayoni boshlandi.

en: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
uz: Lodin, shuningdek, rasmiylarning afg'onlarni yana bir saylov xarajati va xavfsizlikka tahdiddan saqlash maqsadida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini bekor qilishga qaror qilganini aytdi.

en: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
uz: Diplomatlar Afg'oniston konstitutsiyasida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini keraksiz degan qarorga kelish uchun yetarlicha noaniqlik topishganini aytdi.

en: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
uz: Bu saylovning ikkinchi turini bekor qilish konstitutsiyaga xilof bo'lar edi, deyilgan oldingi xabarlarga zid.

en: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
uz: Samolyot Irkutsk tomon yo'l olgan va ichki qo'shinlar tomonidan boshqarilayotgan edi.

en: An inquiry was established to investigate.
uz: o'rganish uchun surishtiruv tayinlandi.

en: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
uz: Il-76 samolyoti 1970-yillardan buyon Rossiya hamda Sovet harbiy kuchlarining asosiy komponenti bo'lib kelgan va u bilan o'tgan oyda Rossiyada jiddiy halokat yuz berdi.

en: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
uz: 7-oktabr havoga ko'tarilish vaqtida dvigatel ajralib ketdi, jarohatlar kuzatilmadi. Rossiya mazkur voqeadan so'ng II-76 samolyotlari parvozini qisqa muddatga taqiqlab qo'ydi.

en: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
uz: 800 millik Trans-Alyaska quvur liniyasi tizimi Alyaskadagi Fairbanks janubida minglab barrel tozalanmagan neft to'kilganidan keyin yopildi.

en: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
uz: Olovni boshqarish tizimi sinovidan keyin elektr quvvatining uzilishi xavfsizlik klapanlarning ochilishiga sabab bo'lgan va 9-sonli Fort-Grili nasos stansiyasi yaqinida ishlov berilmagan neft toshib ketgan.

en: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
uz: Klapanlarning ochilishi tizim bosimning pasayishiga olib keldi hamda moy taglik bo'ylab 55 000 barrel (2,3 million gallon) sig'imga ega bakka oqib tushdi.

en: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
uz: Chorshanba kuni tushdan keyinga kelib bak teshikaridan hali ham oqib ketmoqda edi, sababi bak ichidagi issiqlikdan kengayish bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
uz: 104 500 barell sig'imga ega baklar pastidagi boshqa ikkilamchi saqlash hududi hali sig'imiga qadar to'lmagan.

en: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
uz: Televizorda jonli tarzda berilgan sharhlar Eronning yirik manbalari sanksiyalarning ta'sir o'tkazayotganligini tan olganligining dastlabkisi edi.

en: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
uz: Ular Yevropa Ittifoqi tomonidan Eron iqtisodiyoti 80% tashqi daromadini oladigan ishlov berilmagan neft eksportiga moliyaviy cheklovlar va taqiqlarni o'z ichiga oladi.

en: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
uz: O'zining eng so'nggi oylik hisobotida OPEC neft xom ashyosi eksportlarining yigirma yil ichida eng past darajasiga tushib, kuniga 2,8 million barrelni tashkil qilganligini aytdi.

en: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
uz: Mamlakatning oliy yetakchisi Oyatulloh Ali Xomanaiy neftga bog'lanib qolishni 1979-yildagi Islom inqilobidan avval boshlangan va mamlakat o'zini xalos qilishi kerak bo'lgan "tuzoq" deb atadi.

en: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
uz: Kapsula Yerga yetib borganda va atmosferaga kirganda, taxminan soat 5 (TO) da (sharqiy vaqt bilan), Shimoliy Kaliforniya, Oregon, Nevada va Yuta aholisi uchun haqiqiy yorug'lik shou bo'lishi kutilmoqda.

en: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
uz: Kapsula osmonda uchayotgan yulduzga juda ham o'xshaydi.

en: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
uz: Kapsulaning tezligi soniyasiga 12,8 kilometr yoxud 8 milni tashkil qiladi, bunday tezlik bilan San-Fransiskodan Los-Anjelesga bir daqiqada yetib olish mumkin.

en: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
uz: Stardust 1969-yil may oyida Apollon X boshqaruv modulining qaytish vaqtidagi avvalgi rekordini yangilab, yerga qaytish bo'yicha eng tezkor kosmik kema sifatidagi yangi barcha davrlar rekordini o'rnatdi.

en: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
uz: "U shimoliy Kaliforniyaning g'arbiy sohili bo'ylab harakatlanadi va Kaliforniyadan markaziy Oregon orqali Nevada va Aydahodan o'tib, Yutagacha bo'lgan osmonni yoritadi", — dedi Stardust loyihasi menejeri Tom Daksberi.

en: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
uz: Janob Rudning Kioto iqlim kelishuvini imzolash haqidagi qarori hozirda kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmagan yagona rivojlangan mamlakat Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlarini yakkalab qo'ydi.

en: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
uz: Avstraliyaning sobiq konservativ hukumati Hindiston va Xitoy kabi davlatlar zaharli gazlar chiqindisini kamaytirish rejasi bilan o'zlarini cheklamayotgan bir paytda uning ko'mir eksportiga qattiq suyanib qolishi iqtisoiyotga zarar yetkazadi deya Kyoto protokolini ratifikatsiya qilishni rad etdi.

en: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
uz: Bu eBay tarixidagi eng yirik xariddir.

en: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
uz: Kompaniya o'z daromadlari manbalarini diversifikatsiya qilish hamda Xitoy, Sharqiy Yevropa va Braziliya kabi Skype kuchli mavqega ega hududlarda ommalashishga umid qilmoqda.

en: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
uz: Olimlar Enseladni geologik faol va Saturn muzli E halqasining ehtimoliy manbasi deb gumon qilib kelishgan.

en: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
uz: Enselad quyosh tizimidagi eng nur qaytaruvchi obyekt bo'lib, unga tushadigan quyosh nurining qariyb 90 foizini qaytaradi.

en: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
uz: o'yin noshiri Konami bugun yapon gazetalarining birida "Fallujadagi olti kun" o'yinini chiqarmasliklarini ma'lum qildi.

en: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
uz: O'yin Amerika hamda Iroq kuchlar o'rtasidagi shafqatsiz jang — Falluja uchun ikkinchi urushga asoslangan.

en: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
uz: ACMA, shuningdek, videoning internetda uzatilishiga qaramay, media Big Brother veb-saytida saqlanib qolmaganligi sababli Big Brother onlayn kontent senzurasi to'g'risidagi qonunlarni buzmaganini aniqladi.

en: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
uz: Teleradioeshittirish xizmatlari to'g'risidagi qonun internet kontentini tartibga solishni ko'zda tutadi, biroq internet kontenti sifatida tan olinishi uchun u jismonan jihatdan serverda joylashishi kerak.

en: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
uz: Keniya, Nayrobi shahridagi AQSH elchixonasi "Somalidan kelgan ekstremistlar" Keniya hamda Efiopiyada xudkushlik hamlalarini uyushtirishni reja qilayotgani haqida ogohlantirdi.

en: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
uz: AQSH Efiopiya va Keniyada "mashhur diqqatga sazovor joylarni" portlatish uchun xudkush terrorchilardan foydalanganligi to'g'risida oshkor etilmagan manbadan axborot olganligini ta'kidlamoqda.

en: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
uz: "Kunlik shou" va "Kolbert hisoboti"dan ancha oldin Xek va Jonson 1988-yili UWda talaba bo'lgan paytlari yangiliklar va xabarlarni parodiya qiladigan nashrni tasavvur qilishgandi.

en: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
uz: Asos solinganidan beri The Onion bosma nashri, oktyabr oyida 5 000 000 individual tashrif buyuruvchilari, shaxsiy reklamalar, 24 soatlik yangiliklar tarmog'i, podkastlari va yaqinda ishga tushirilgan "Bizning ahmoqqina dunyomiz" nomli dunyo atlasi bilan chinakam yangiliklar parodiyasi imperiyasiga aylandi.

en: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
uz: Al Gor va general Tommi Frenks bexosdan o'zlarining sevimli sarlavhalarini (The Onion nashriga ko'ra, Gor o'zining 2000-yilgi Saylov kollegiyasidagi mag'lubiyatidan keyin u va Tipper hayotlaridagi eng yaxshi jinsiy aloqani qilishni boshlaganliklarini) aytib yuboradi.

en: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
uz: Ularning ko'pgina yozuvchilari Jon Styuart hamda Stiven Kolbertning yangiliklar parodiyasi shoulariga kuchli ta'sir ko'rsatgan.

en: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
uz: Badiiy tadbir Buxarest shahar meriyasining Ruminiya poytaxtining ijodiy va rang-barang metropolis obrazini qayta tiklash kampaniyasining bir qismi hamdir.

en: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
uz: Shahar joriy yilning iyun va avgust oylari orasida Yevropaning janubi-sharqida birinchi bo'lib dunyoning eng yirik jamoat san'at tadbiri — Sigirlar paradiga mezbonlik qiladi.

en: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
uz: Bugungi e'lon hukumatning joriy yilning martida berilgan qo'shimcha vagonlarni moliyalashtirish majburiyatlarini ham kengaytirdi.

en: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
uz: Qo'shimcha 300 tadan keyin jami vagonlar 1300 taga yetib, tirbandlikni kamaytiririshga erishiladi.

en: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
uz: Los-Anjeles politsiya boshqarmasi vakili Kristofer Garsiya so'zlariga ko'ra, gumon qilinayotgan erkak jinoyatchi vandalizmda emas, mulkiy daxlsizlikni buzish bo'yicha tergov qilinmoqda.

en: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".
uz: Belgiga moddiy zarar yetkazilmagan; moslashtirish kichkina "e" harfini o'qish uchun "O"ni o'zgartirish maqsadida tinchlik hamda yurak belgilari bilan bezatilgan qora brezentlar yordamida amalga oshirilgan.

en: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
uz: Qizil oqim tabiiy tarzda yuz beruvchi bir hujayrali dengiz organizmi hisoblangan Karenia brevisning me'yordan ortiq to'planishi sababli yuzaga keladi.

en: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
uz: Tabiiy omillar kesishib, suv o'tlari sonining keskin ko'payishiga imkon beradigan ideal muhitni hosil qilishi mumkin.

en: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
uz: Suvo'tlari odamlarning ham, baliqlarning ham asablarini ishdan chiqaruvchi neyrotoksin ishlab chiqaradi.

en: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
uz: Aksar holatlarda baliqlar suvdagi toksik moddalarning yuqori darajasi sababli o'ladi.

en: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
uz: Insonlar shamol yoki to'lqinlar havoga olib chiqqan ifloslangan suvdan nafas olish orqali kasallanishi mumkin.

en: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .
uz: Maldiv tilida bir qop palma barglari sharafiga nomlangan tropik Gonu sikloni o'zining eng kuchli holatida soatiga 240 kilometr (soatiga 149 mil) barqaror shamol tezligiga yetdi.

en: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
uz: Bugun erta tongda shamol tezligi 83 km/s atrofida edi va uning susayishi kutilayotgan edi.

en: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
uz: Chorshanbada Qo'shma Shtatlar Milliy basketbol uyushmasi (NBA) professional basketbol mavsumini COVID-19 ga oid xavotirlar sababli to'xtatib qo'ydi.

en: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
uz: NBA qarori Yuta o'yinchisining COVID-19 virusiga topshirgan testi ijobiy chiqqanidan so'ng qabul qilindi.

en: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.
uz: Mazkur qazilmaga asoslangan holda, bu bo'linish molekulyar dalillar tomonidan kutilganidan ancha ertaroq bo'lganini anglatadi.

en: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
uz: "Bu hammasi orqaga qaytarilishi kerak degani", dedi Efiopiyadagi Rift vodiysi tadqiqotlar xizmati taqdidotchisi va tadqiqot hammuallifi Berxan Asfav.

en: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.
uz: Hozirga qadar Qo'shma Shtatlar bo'ylab keng miqyosda foydalanilishi sababli AOL IM bozorini o'z tezligida harakatlantira oldi hamda rivojlantirdi.

en: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.
uz: Ushbu kelishiv kuchga kirishi bilan ozodlik nihoyasiga yetishi mimkin.

en: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
uz: Yahoo! hamda Microsoft xizmatlari foydalanuvchilari soni birgalikda AOL mijozlari soniga raqib bo'ladi.

en: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.
uz: Shimoliy Rok banki 2008-yilda Birlashgan Qirollik hukumati tomonidan favqulodda yordamni qabul qilganligi fosh bo'lganidan keyin davlat mulkiga aylantirildi.

en: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.
uz: Shimoliy Rok 2007-yildagi ikkilamchi ipoteka inqirozi davomida inqirozidan zarar ko'rgani sababli yordam talab qildi.

en: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.
uz: Janob Richard Brensonning "Virgin Group" kompaniyasining bank uchun taklifi bank milliylashtirilishidan oldin rad etilgandi.

en: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).
uz: 2010-yilda, milliylashtirilganida, hozirgi yuqori ko'chadagi bank — Nothern Rock plc "yomon bank" Nothern Rock (Asset Management) dan ajratildi.

en: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
uz: Virgin faqat Shimoliy Rokning "yaxshi banki"ni sotib oldi, aktivlarni boshqarish kompaniyasini emas.

en: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
uz: Bu kimyoviy jihatdan tasdiqlangan Marsga tegishli modda yerga tushishi hodisasi odamlar tomomidan beshincha marta kuzatilishi deb hisoblanadi.

en: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.
uz: Yerga tushgan taxminan 24 000 ta ma'lum meteoritdan atigi 34 ga yaqini Marsdan ekanligi tasdiqlangan.

en: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.
uz: Ushbu xarsang toshlardan o'n beshtasi o'tgan iyul oyidagi meteorit yomg'iriga aloqador.

en: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
uz: Yer yuzida nihoyatda kamyob bo'lgan ayrim toshlarning bir unsiyasi 11 000 AQSH dollaridan 22 500 AQSH dollarigacha sotilmoqda, bu oltin narxidan o'n baravar ko'p.

en: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.
uz: Musobaqaning yakuniy natijalariga ko'ra, Keselovski 2250 ochko bilan Poygachilar chempionati yetakchilikni saqlab kelmoqda.

en: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.
uz: Yetti ochko ortda qolgan Jonson 2243 ochko bilan ikkinchi o'rinda joylashgan.

en: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.
uz: Uchinchi o'rindagi Hemlin yigirma ochkoga ortda qolyapti, biroq Boyerdan besh ochko oldinda. Kane va kichik Trueks 2220 va 2207 ochko bilan mos ravishda beshinchi hamda oltinchi o'rinda bormoqda.

en: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
uz: Styuart, Gordon, Kenset hamda Garvik mavsumda to'rttagina poyga qolgan bir paytda Haydovchilar chempionatidagi yuqori o'ntalikni yakunlab berdi.

en: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.
uz: AQSH harbiy-dengiz floti ham mazkur voqea bo'yicha surishtiruv ishlari olib borilayotganini bildirdi.

en: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".
uz: Ular bayonotda yana "Ekipaj ayni damda kemani xavfsiz tarzda chiqarib olishning eng yaxshi usulini aniqlash ustida ish olib bormoqda", dedi.

en: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.
uz: Evenjer tipidagi minalarga qarshi kurashish kemasi Palava shahridagi Puerto Prince tomonga ketayotgan kema edi.

en: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
uz: U AQSHning yettichi flotiga tayinlangan hamda Yaponiyadagi Nagasaki prefekturasining Sasebo shahrida joylashgan.

en: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
uz: Mumbayga hujum uyushtirganlar 2008-yilning 26-noyabr kuni qayiqda granata, avtomat qurollari bilan yetib kelgan hamda bir qancha nishonlarga, jumladan, gavjum Chatrapati Shivaji Terminus temir yo'l bekati va mashhur Toj Mahal mehmonxonasiga zarba bergan.

en: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.
uz: Devid Hedlining razvedkasi hamda axborot yig'ishi Pokistonning "Laskhar-e-Taiba" jangari guruhidan 10 nafar qurollangan shaxsning operatsiyasini amalga oshirishga yordam berdi.

en: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
uz: Bu hujum Hindiston bilan Pokiston o'rtasidagi munosanatlarni juda taranglashtirdi.

en: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.
uz: O'sha mulozimlar hamrohligida u Texas aholisini jamoat xavfsizligini himoyalash chora-tadbirlari ko'rilayotganiga ishontirdi.

en: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."
uz: Perri, xususan: "Dunyoda bu holatda yuzaga keladigan muammoni munosib qarshi olish uchun yaxshiroq jihozlangan atigi bir nechta joy bor", — dedi.

en: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."
uz: Shuningdek, "Bugun ayrim maktab yoshidagi bolalar bemor bilan aloqada bo'lgani aniqlanganidan xabar topdik", — dedi gubernator.

en: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."
uz: "Bu masala jiddiy. Tizimimiz zarur darajada ishlayotganiga ishonchingiz komil bo'lsin", deya davom etdi u.

en: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.
uz: Agar tasdiqlansa, topilma Allenning Musashiga oid sakkiz yillik tadqiqotlariga yakun yasaydi.

en: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.
uz: Dengiz tubini xaritalashdan keyin kema qoldiqlari ROV yordamida topildi.

en: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
uz: Xabarlarga ko'ra, dunyoning eng badavlat kishilaridan biri bo'lgan Allen o'z boyligining katta qismini dengizni tadqiq qilishga sarmoya sifatida kiritgan va urushdagi azaliy qiziqishi — Musashini topish uchun qidiruvga kirishgan.

en: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.
uz: U Atlantada bo'lgan paytida tanqidchilarning e'tirofiga sazovor bo'ldi va innovatsion shahar ta'limi bilan tanildi.

en: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.
uz: 2009-yilda u "Yilning milliy nazoratchisi" unvoni bilan taqdirlandi.

en: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.
uz: Mukofotlash vaqtida Atlanta maktablarida test natijalarining ancha yaxshilangani kuzatildi.

en: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.
uz: Ko'p o'tmay, Atlanta Journal-Constitution test natijalari bilan bog'liq muammolarni ko'rsatuvchi hisobotni e'lon qildi.

en: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.
uz: Hisobotda test natijalari aql bovar qilmas darajada tez sur'atda oshgani va iddao qilingan maktab o'zining ichki muammolarini aniqlagani, lekin xulosalar asosida harakatlanmagani ko'rsatilgandi.

en: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
uz: Shundan keyin topilgan dalillar test varaqalari qalbakilashtirilganini ko'rsatgach Xoll va yana 34 nafar ta'lim rasmiylari 2013-yili aybdor deb topildi.

en: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.
uz: Irlandiya hukumati vaziyatni o'nglash uchun parlament qonunchiligining zarurligida urg'u bermoqda.

en: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.
uz: Hukumat so'zchisining aytishicha, "hozirda qonunning imkon qadar tezroq qabul qilinishi ham aholi salomatligi, ham jinoiy adliya nuqtayi nazaridan muhim".

en: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.
uz: Sog'liqni saqlash vaziri mazkur moddalarning vaqtincha qonuniyligidan foydalanuvchi shaxslarning salomatligi yuzasidan hamda endilikda konstitutsiyaga zid bo'lgan o'zgarishlar kuchga kirishi bilan chiqarilgan giyohvand moddalarga oid hukmlar borasida ham tashvishda ekanini bildirdi.

en: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
uz: Jarke o'sha kun avvalida Italiyadagi Koverchanoda mavsumoldi mashg'ulotida mashq qilayotgandi. U "Boloniya"ga qarshi rejalashtirilgan yakshanba kungi o'yindan oldin jamoa bilan mehmonxonada qolgandi.

en: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
uz: U yakshanba kuni rejalashtirilgan Boloniyaga qarshi o'yindan oldidan jamoa mehmonxonasida qolayotgandi.

en: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri for the band to play to a sold-out crowd.
uz: Avtobus guruh barcha chiptalari sotilgan konsertda ijro etishi uchun Missuridagi Six Flags St. Louis parki tomon ketayotgan edi.

en: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it.
uz: Guvohlarning aytishicha, shanba kuni soat 1:15 (TO) da avtobus yashil chiroqda o'tayotganda avtomashina uning oldidan burilgan.

en: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian.
uz: 9-avgust tunida Morakot ko'zi Xitoyning Futzyan provinsiyasidan taxminan yetmish kilometr masofada edi.

en: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
uz: To'fon Xitoy tarafga taxminan 11 km/soat tezlikda harakatlanmoqda.

en: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.
uz: Yo'lovchilarga suv berildi, chunki ular 90 (F) daraja issiqda kutayotgan edi.

en: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.
uz: O't o'chirish xizmati kapitani Skot Kouns: "Santa Klarada kun issiq bo'ldi, harorat 90 daraja atrofida edi", dedi.

en: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."
uz: "Amerika tepaliklari atrraksionida qolib ketganda o'tkazilgan har qanday vaqt juda noqulay va birinchi odamning tushishi uchun kamida bir soat vaqt ketgan".

en: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.
uz: Formula 1 chempionatida yetti karra g'olib bo'lganida keyin 2006-yili nafaqaga chiqqan Shumaxer jarohatlangan Filipe Massaning o'rniga kelishi kerak edi.

en: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
uz: 2009-yildagi Vengriya Gran prisi vaqtidagi avtohalokatdan keyin braziliyalik jiddiy bosh jarohati olgan.

en: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
uz: Massa kamida 2009-yilgi mavsumning qolgan qismini o'tkazib yuborishi kerak.

en: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.
uz: Ariasdagi test virusning yengil shakliga ijobiy natija berdi, dedi prezident vaziri Rodrigo Arias.

en: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.
uz: Prezidentning holati barqaror, biroq u bir necha kun davomida uyida isolyatsiya qilinadi.

en: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.
uz: Isitma va tomoq og'rig'ini hisobga olmaganda, ishimni masofadan turib bajara oladigan darajada o'zimni yaxshi va tetik his qilyapman.

en: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
uz: "Men dushanbada hamma vazifalarimga qaytishni kutyapman", — dedi Arias bayonotida.

en: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.
uz: Bir vaqtlar Saffir-Simpson dovul shkalasida 4-toifa bo'roni bo'lgan Felisia seshanba kuni tarqalishidan avval zaiflashib, tropik depressiyaga aylandi.

en: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.
uz: Uning qoldiqlari orollarning katta qismida jalalarni yuzaga keltirdi, biroq hozirgacha hech qanday zarar yoki toshqinlar haqida xabarlar olinmadi.

en: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".
uz: Oaxudagi yo'lakda 6,34 duymga yetgan yog'ingarchilik miqdori "foydali" deb tavsiflandi.

en: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
uz: Yomg'irlarning ayrimlari momaqaldiroq va tez-tez chaqmoq chaqishlar bilan kuzatildi.

en: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.
uz: Twin Otter kecha Kokodada PNG Parvoz CG4684 samolyoti sifatida qo'nishga urinayotgandi, biroq avvalroq bir marta bekor qilingan edi.

en: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.
uz: Ikkinchi yaqinlashishidan keyin qo'nishi kerak bo'lgan vaqtdan taxminan o'n daqiqa avval u yo'qolib qolgan.

en: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.
uz: Halokat joyi bugun aniqlandi va u yerga kirish shu qadar imkonsizki, ikkita politsiyachi omon qolganlarni izlash va voqea joyini ko'zdan kechirish uchun changalzorga tushirildi.

uz: Qidiruvga bekor qilingan qo'nishga sabab bo'lgan aynan shu ob-havo xalaqit bergan.

uz: Xabar qilinishicha, Makbet ko'chasida joylashgan xonadon gaz sizib chiqishi tufayli portlagan.

en: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.
uz: Gaz kompaniyasi rasmiysi qo'shnilaridan biri telefonda sizib chiqayotgani haqida xabar qilganidan so'ng voqea joyiga xabar berayotgan edi.

en: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.
uz: Mutasaddi yetib kelganida kvartira portladi.

en: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
uz: Og'ir jarohatlar to'g'risida xabar berilmagan, biroq portlash paytida voqea joyida bo'lgan kamida besh kishi shok simtomlariga qarshi davolangan.

en: No one was inside the apartment.
uz: Xonadon ichkarisida hech kimsa yo'q edi.

en: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
uz: o'sha vaqtda qariyb 100 ga yaqin aholi hududdan evakuatsiya qilindi.

en: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.
uz: Golf ham, regbi ham Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytish arafasida.

en: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.
uz: Xalqaro olimpiya qo'mitasi bugun Berlindagi ijroiya kengashi yig'ilishida mazkur sport turlarini kiritishga ovoz berdi. Ko'rib chiqilishi kerak bo'lgan boshqa beshta sport turlaridan ko'ra, regbi, xususan, regbi yunion va golf Olimpiada o'yinlarida ishtirok etish uchun tanlangan.

en: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.
uz: Sqvosh, karate va rolikda uchish 2005-yil Olimpiada o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol singari Olimpiada dasturiga kiritilishiga harakat qilgan sport turlaridir.

en: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
uz: Ovoz hali ham to'liq XOQ tomonidan oktyabr oyida Kopengagenda bo'lib o'tadigan yig'ilishida tasdiqlanishi kerak.

en: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.
uz: Hamma ham ayollarning razryadlari qo'shilishini qo'llab-quvvatlayvermas edi.

uz: 2004-yilgi Olimpiadadagi kumush medal sovrindori Amir Xon: "Chin qalbimdan aytadigan bo'lsam, ayollar urushmasliklari kerak. Bu mening fikrim", dedi.

en: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.
uz: O'zining sharhlariga qaramasdan u Londonda o'tkaziladigan 2012-yilgi Olimpiadada Britaniyalik raqiblarini qo'llab-quvvatlashini aytdi.

en: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.
uz: Ishni sudda ko'rib chiqish Birmingem Qirollik sudida bo'lib o'tdi va 3-avgustda qaror chiqarildi.

en: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.
uz: Hodisa joyida hibsga olingan teleboshlovchi hujumni inkor etdi va o'ttiztacha kishi tomonidan unga uloqtirilayotgan shishalardan o'zini himoya qilish uchun tayoqdan foydalanganini aytdi.

en: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
uz: Shu bilan birga Bleyk adolatni qaror toptirishni xalaqit berishda ham aybdor deb topildi.

en: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.
uz: Sudya Bleykka uning qamoqqa tushishi "deyarli aniq" ekanligini aytdi.

en: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.
uz: Qora energiya — doimiy ravishda koinotga ta'sir ko'rsatadigan mutlaqo ko'rinmas kuch.

en: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.
uz: Uning mavjudligi faqatgina koinotning kengayishiga ta'siri sababli ma'lumdir.

en: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.
uz: Olimlar yassi qiyaliklar deb ataladigan, oy yuzasi bo'ylab sochilib yotgan, aftidan oyning juda sekinlik bilan kichrayishi natijasida yuzaga kelgan relyef shakllarini topishdi.

en: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.
uz: Mazkur jarliklar butun Oy bo'ylab topilgan va ob-havo ta'sirida minimal darajada yemirilgan, bu ularni yuzaga keltirgan geologik hodisalar anchagina yaqinda bo'lganligini ko'rsatadi.

en: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
uz: Mazkur nazariya Oyning geologik faoliyatdan to'liq mahrum bo'lganligi to'g'risidagi da'voga zid.

en: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.
uz: Erkak portlovchi moddalar bilanto'ldirilgan uch g'ildirakli transport vositasini olomon ustiga tomon haydagani gumon qilinmoqda.

en: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.
uz: Bombani portlatganlikda gumon qilingan erkak portlash oqibatida jarohatlar olganidan keyin qo'lga olindi.

en: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
uz: Hukumat organlari uning uyg'ur etnik guruhi a'zosi ekanini bilsa-da, uning ismi haligacha ularga ma'lum emas.

en: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.
uz: 2007-yil 17-sentyabrda Rossiyaning Aleysk shahridagi tug'ruqxonada kesarcha kesish yo'li bilan dunyoga kelgan Nadyaning vazni 17 funt 1 unsiya bo'lgan.

en: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated.
uz: "Hammamiz, shunchaki hayratda edik", dedi ona.

en: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."
uz: Undan otasining nima deganligini so'ralganida u: "U hech narsa deya olmadi — u shunchaki u yerda ko'zini miltillatgan holda turdi", dedi.

en: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.
uz: Bu xuddi suvga o'xshaydi. Suv qanday shaffof bo'lsa, u ham xuddi shunday shaffof.

en: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.
uz: Shunday qilib, agar siz qirg'oq yoqasida turgan bo'lsangiz, pastga qarab, uning tubidagi har qanday toshlar yoki balchiqni ko'rishingiz mumkin.

en: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," added Stofan.
uz: "Bizga ma'lumki, Titandan ko'ra ko'proq dinamizm namoyon bo'ladigan yagona sayyoraviy jism bor va uning nomi Yerdir", — dedi Stofan.

en: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.
uz: Bu muammo 1-yanvar kuni o'nlab mahalliy rezidentlarning Obanazava pochta idorasiga an'anaviy va doimiy Yangi yil otkritkalarini olmaganidan shikoyat qilishi bilan boshlandi.

en: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
uz: Kecha pochta bo'limi mo'ljallangan qabul qiluvchilariga yetkazib berilmagan 600 dan ortiq pochta hujjatlarini, jumladan, 429 ta Yangi Yil otkritkalarini bolakay tomonidan yashirilganligini aniqlaganidan keyin, fuqarolar hamda ommaviy axborot vositalaridan uzr so'radi.

en: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.
uz: Uchuvchisiz oy orbital apparati Chandrayaan-1 oy kosmik zondi (MIP) chiqarib yuborildi va Oy sirti bo'ylab soniyasiga 1,5 km (3000 mil/soat) tezlik bilan uchib, Oyning janubiy qutbiga yaqin joyda muvaffaqiyatli qo'ndi.

en: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
uz: Oy zondi uchta muhim ilmiy asbobdan tashqari barcha tomonlaridan bo'yalgan Hindiston milliy bayrog'i tasvirini ham olib yurgan.

en: "Thanks for those who supported a convict like me," Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.
uz: "Mendek mahkumni qo'llab-quvvatlaganlarga rahmat", dedi Siriporn matbuot anjumanida so'zlar ekan.

en: "Some may not agree but I don't care.
uz: Ayrimlar rozi bo'lmasliklari mumkin, biroq menga buning farqi yo'q.

en: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
uz: Meni dastaklashga shay insonlar borligidan mamnunman.

en: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
uz: 1947-yilda Pokiston Britaniya hukmronligidan mustaqil bo'lgan vaqtdan buyon, Pokiston prezidenti hududlar ustidan deyarli to'liq avtonom nazoratni amalga oshiradigan FATAni boshqaruvchi "Siyosiy agentlar"ni belgilaydi.

en: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
uz: Bu vakillar Pokiston Konstitutsiyasining 247-moddasiga ko'ra hukumat va adliya xizmatlarning ko'rsatilishiga mas'uldirlar.

en: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
uz: Bugun ertalab mahalliy vaqt bilan soat 10 lar atrofida Islom dinining muqaddas shahri – Makkada hostel qulab tushdi.

en: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
uz: Bu binoda haj ziyorati arafasida muqaddas shaharga ziyorat uchun tashrif buyurgan ko'plab ziyoratchilar istiqomat qilgan.

en: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
uz: Ushbu hostelning aksariyat mehmonlari Birlashgan Arab Amirliklarining fuqarolari edi.

en: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
uz: Qurbonlar soni 15 ta, bu sonning o'sishi kutilmoqda.

en: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
uz: "11-raqamli kosmonavt" sifatida ham mashhur bo'lgan Leonov Sovet Ittifoqining ilk kosmonavtlar jamoasi tarkibida bo'lgan.

en: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
uz: 1965-yilning 18-martida u kosmik kema tashqarisida o'n ikki daqiqadan ortiqroq vaqt mobaynida yolg'iz qolib, ilk inson uchuvchili kemadan tashqaridagi harakat (EVA) yoxud "kosmos sayri"ni amalga oshirdi.

en: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
uz: U mehnati uchun Sovet Ittifoqining eng yuksak — "Sovet Ittifoqi qahramoni" unvonini oldi.

en: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
uz: O'n yildan keyin u Kosmik poyganing yakuniga yetganini bildirgan holda Apollon-Soyuz missiyasining Sovet qismiga boshchilik qildi.

en: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
uz: U: "Hujumning yaqin-orada kutilishini taxmin qilish uchun hech qanday razvedka ma'lumotlari yo'q", dedi.

en: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
uz: "Lekin tahdid darajasini keskin tushirish umumiy tahdidning yo'qolganini anglatmaydi".

en: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
uz: Hokimiyat organlarining tahdidning mavjudligiga ishonchlari komil bo'lmasada, Merilend transport ma'muriyati FQB talabiga ko'ra yopishni amalga oshirdi.

en: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
uz: Metroga kirishni to'sib qo'yish uchun samosvallardan foydalanildi va avtoulovchilarni aylanma yo'llarga yo'naltirish uchun 80 ta politsiyachi yordam berdi.

en: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
uz: Shaharning muqobil yo'nalishi hisoblanuvchi halqa yo'lida kuchli qatnov kechikishlari qayd etilmagan.

uz: Nigeriya avvalroq sammitdan bir hafta avval AfCFTA tashkilotiga qo'shilishni rejalashtirganligini e'lon qilgan.

uz: AU savdo-sotiq hamda sanoat komissari Albert Muchanga Benin ham qo'shilmoqchi ekanini ma'lum qildi.

en: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
uz: Komissar: "Biz hozircha kelib chiqish va tarif imtiyozlari qoidalari bo'yicha kelishuvga erishmadik, lekin holat 2020-yil 1-iyuldan savdo-sotiqni boshlashimiz uchun tayyorligimizni ko'rsatmoqda", — dedi.

en: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
uz: Kosmik stansiya missiyasida avvalroq giroskopning yo'qolganiga qaramay, stansiya ochiq kosmosga chiqish jarayoni oxiriga qadar o'z yo'nalishini saqlab qoldi.

en: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
uz: Chiao va Sharipovlarning balandlikni sozlovchi uloqtirish qurilmalaridan xavfsiz masofada ekanligi xabar qilindi.

en: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
uz: Rossiya yer usti nazorati samolyotlarni faollashtirdi hamda stansiyaning odatdagi munosabati qayta tiklandi.

en: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
uz: Ish Virjiniyada olib borildi, chunki u yerda ayblovlarni qo'zg'atgan kompaniya — yetakchi internet provayder AOL joylashgan.

en: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
uz: Bu ommaviy elektron pochta xabarlarining — spam nomi bilan ham mashhur — foydalanuvchilar pochta qutilariga nomaqbul tarqatilishini cheklash maqsadida 2003-yilda qabul qilingan qonunga tayanib chiqarilgan ilk hukmdir.

en: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
uz: 21 yoshli Jezus Braziliyaning "Plameyras" klubidan 2017-yil yanvar oyida 27 million funt sterling evaziga "Manchester Siti"ga kelib qo'shilgan edi.

en: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
uz: O'shandan beri braziliyalik futbolchi barcha musobaqalarda klub safida 53 ta uchrashuvda maydonga tushib, 24 ta gol muallifiga aylangan.

en: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
uz: Doktor Li ayni damda Turkiyada bolalar xastalanmasdan A (H5N1) parranda grippi virusini yuqtirayotganligi to'g'risidagi xabarlardan xavotrilanayotganini ham aytdi.

en: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
uz: Ba'zi tadqiqotlar kasallik global epidemiyani keltirib chiqarishidan oldin uning o'lim darajasi pastroq bo'lishi kerakligini ko'rsatadi, deb qayd etdi u.

en: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
uz: Gripp belgilari yengilligicha qolsa, bemorlar kundalik yumushlarini bajarish orqali ko'proq insonlarga infeksiyani yuqtirishda davom etishlari mumkin, degan xavotir bor.

en: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
uz: Komen fondi vakili Lesli Aunning so'zlariga ko'ra, tashkilot qonuniy tergov o'tkazilayotgan tashkilotlarning grant yoki pul mablag'lari bilan mukofotlanishini taqiqlaydigan yangi qoidani qabul qilgan.

en: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
uz: Vakil Kliff Stirns tomonidan Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkiloti mablag'larni qay tarzda sarflashi va bu haqda hisobot berishi yuzasidan olib borilishi kutilayotgan tergov sababli Komen siyosati Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkilotini diskvalifikatsiya qildi.

en: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
uz: Sterns Uy energiyasi va tijorat qo'mitasi qoshidagi Nazorat va surishtiruvlar quyi qo'mitasining raisi sifatida o'z vazifasida Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik federatsiyasi orqali abortni moliyalashtirish uchun soliqlardan foydalanilayotganligi yoki yo'qligini o'rganmoqda.

en: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
uz: Sobiq Massachusets shtati gubernatori Mitt Romni seshanba kuni Florida Respublikachilar partiyasida o'tkazilgan boshlang'ich prezidentlik saylovida 46 foizdan ko'proq ovoz bilan g'alaba qozondi.

en: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
uz: AQSH Vakillar Palatasining sobiq spikeri Nyut Gingrich 32 foiz bilan ikkinchi o'rinni egalladi.

en: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
uz: g'olib butun shtatni qo'lga kiritadi, degan qoidaga ko'ra, Florida ellikta delegatning barchasini Romniga taqdim qilib, uni respublikachilar partiyasi nomzodligi uchun kurashda yetakchi sifatida oldingi o'ringa chiqardi.

en: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
uz: Norozilik namoyishi tashkilotchilarining aytishicha, Germaniyaning Berlin, Kyoln, Gamburg va Gannover kabi shaharlaridan taxminan 100 000 kishi kelgan.

en: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
uz: Berlinda politsiya namoyishchilarni 6500 nafar deb taxmin qildi.

en: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
uz: Protestlar Parijda, Bolgariyaning Sofiya, Litvaning Vilnyus, Maltaning Valetta, Estoniyaning Tallin hamda Shotlandiyaning Edinburg va Glazgo shaharlarida ham bo'lib o'tdi.

en: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
uz: Londonda ayrim mualliflik huquqi egalarining asosiy ofislari oldida chamasi 200 nafar odam e'tirozlar bilan namoyishga to'plandi.

en: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
uz: o'tgan oy Polsha ACTAni imzolaganda mamlakatda yirik norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bu Polsha hukumatining hozircha mazkur kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmaslik haqida qaror qabul qilishiga sabab bo'ldi.

en: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
uz: Latviya ham, Slovakiya ham ACTAga qo'shilish jarayonlarini kechiktirdi.

en: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
uz: Hayvonlarni ozod qilish va hayvonlarga nisbatan shafqatsizlikning oldini olish Qirollik hamjamiyati (RSPCA) Avstraliyadagi hamma kushxonalarda CCTV kameralarini majburiy tartibda o'rnatishni talab qilishga chaqirmoqda.

en: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
uz: RSPCA Yangi Janubiy Uels bosh inspektori Devid O'Shannessi ABC kanaliga kushxonalarni kuzatish hamda tekshirish Avstraliyada odatiy holat bo'lishi lozimligini ta'kidladi.
