en: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
uz: "CCTV, shubhasiz, hayvonlar bilan ishlaydigan insonlarga ularning farovonligi eng ustuvor vazifa ekanligi haqida kuchli signal beradi".

en: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
uz: Qo'shma Shtatlar Geologik xizmatining xalqaro zilzilalar xaritasi bir hafta avval Islandiyada zilzila bo'lmaganini ko'rsatdi.

en: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
uz: Islandiyaning meteorologiya xizmati Xekla xududida so'nggi 48 soat ichida hech qanday zilzila sodir bo'lmaganligi haqida xabar berdi.

en: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
uz: Fazaning o'zgarishiga olib keligan sezilarli zilzila 10-mart kuni vulqonning cho'qqi kalderasining shimoliy-sharqiy tomonida yuz berdi.

en: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
uz: Biror bir vulqon harakatiga aloqador bo'lmagan qora bulutlar tog' yonbag'rida qayd etilgan edi.

en: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
uz: Bulutlar haqiqatan ham portlash sodir bo'lgan yoki yo'ligi haqidagi ehtimoliy chalkashlikni keltirib chiqardi.

en: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
uz: Luno ishdan chiqqanida, bortida 120–160 kubometr yonilg'i bor edi va kuchli shamol hamda to'lqinlar uni dengiz suviga surib yubordi.

en: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
uz: Vertolyotlar ekipajning o'n ikki a'zosi qutqardi va burun sinishi yagona jarohat bo'ldi.

en: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
uz: 100 metrlik kema odatiy o'g'it yuklarni olib kelish uchun ketayotgandi hamda dastlab mulozimlar kemaning yukni to'kib yuborishidan hayiqqandi.

en: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
uz: Taklif qilingan tuzatish 2011-yilda allaqachon ikkala palata tasdig'idan ham o'tgan edi.

en: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
uz: o'zgartirish mazkur qonunchilik sessiyasida amalga oshirildi, avval ikkinchi gap Vakillar Palatasi tomonidan o'chirildi va keyin dushanba kuni xuddi shu shaklda Senat tomonidan qabul qilindi.

en: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
uz: Bir jinsli fuqarolik uyushmalarini taqiqlash taklif etilgan ikkinchi gapning muvvaffaqiyatsizligi kelgusida fuqarolik uyushmalariga eshiklarni ochib berishi mumkin.

en: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
uz: Jarayondan keyin jarayonda qolishi uchun HJR-3 keyingi saylangan qonunchilik organi tomonidan 2015 yoki 2016-yilda qaytadan ko'rib chiqiladi.

en: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
uz: Votyening rejissyorlikdan tashqari erishgan yutuqlariga 1973-yilda o'zi siyosiy senzura deb bilgan narsasiga qarshi ochlik e'lon qilgani ham kiradi.

en: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
uz: Fransuz qonuni o'zgartirildi. Uning faoliyati 15 yoshligiga, u Ikkinchi jahon urushi davrida Fransiya qarshiligi harakatiga qo'shilgan davrga taqaladi.

en: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
uz: U o'zini 1998-yilgi kitobga kiritdi.

en: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
uz: 1960-yilda u kino rejissyorligidan dars berish uchun endigina mustaqil bo'lgan Jazoirga yo'l oldi.

en: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
uz: Yaponiyalik dzyudochi, ikki karra Olimpiada o'yinlari oltin medali sovrindori Hitoshi Saito 54 yoshida olamdan o'tdi.

en: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
uz: Jigar ichi safro yo'llari saratoni o'lim sababi deb e'lon qilindi.

en: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
uz: U seshanba kuni Osakada olamdan o'tdi.

en: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
uz: Sobiq olimpiada o'yinlari va jahon chempioni Saito vafot etgan vaqtida Butun Yaponiya dzyudo federatsiyasining o'quv qo'mitasi raisi bo'lgan.

en: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
uz: O'tgan yili to'yi bo'lgan juftlik nikohining bir yilligini nishonlash uchun bazmga kamida 100 nafar odam keldi.

en: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
uz: Rasmiylar rasmiy yubiley tadbiri keyinroq o'tkazilishi rejalashtirilganini aytdilar.

en: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
uz: Juftlik bir yil avval Texasda turmush qurgan hamda do'stlari hamda qarindoshlari bilan nishonlash uchun Buffaloga kelgan edi.

en: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
uz: Buffaloda tavallud topgan 30 yoshli erkak otishmada halok bo'lgan to'rt kishidan biri edi, lekin uning rafiqasi jabrlanmadi.

en: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
uz: Karno mashhur, lekin o'zi ta'kidlaganidek faoliyatining cho'qqisida 9000 nafar talabasi bo'lgan "Modern Education" va "King's Glory" ta'lim markazlarida dars bergan munozarali ingliz tili o'qituvchisidir.

en: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
uz: Qaydlarida u ayrim ota-onalar qo'pol deb hisoblaydigan so'zlardan foydalangan va uning sinfda behayo so'zlardan foydalangani xabar qilingan.

en: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
uz: Modern Education uni ruxsatsiz katta hajmdagi reklamalarni avtobuslarda chop qilish va o'zini ingliz tili bo'yicha katta o'qituvchisi deb aytish orqali yolg'on gapirishda aybladi.

en: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
uz: U ilgari mualliflik huquqini buzganlikda ham ayblangan, lekin unga ayblov e'lon qilinmagan.

en: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
uz: Sobiq talaba "darsda jargondan foydalangani, eslamarda tanishish ko'nikmalarini o'rgatgani va shunchaki, talabalarning do'stidek bo'lganini" aytdi.

en: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
uz: Xitoy oxirgi o'n yilda rasmiy tarzda kommunist mamlakat bo'lib qolganiga qaramasdan, bozor iqtisodiyotini rivojlantirdi.

en: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
uz: Iqtisodiyotdagi ilk islohotlar Den Syaoping rahbarligi ostida amalga oshirilgan.

en: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
uz: O'sha vaqtlardan buyon Xitoyning iqtisodiy hajmi 90 martaga o'sdi.

en: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
uz: o'tgan yili ilk bor Xitoy Germaniyadan ko'ra ko'proq avtomobil eksport qildi va mazkur sanoat bo'yicha eng yirik bozor sifatida AQSHni ortda qoldirdi.

en: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
uz: Xitoyning YaIMi yigirma yil ichida Qo'shma Shtatlarinikidan kattaroq bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
uz: 2010-yilgi Atlantika bo'ronlari mavsumining nom berilgan to'rtinchi dovuli — Deniel tropik bo'roni sharqiy Atlantika okeanida vujudga kelgan.

en: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
uz: Floridadagi Mayami shahridan taxminan 3000 mil uzoqlikdagi bo'ronning maksimal barqaror tezligi 40 mil/soat (64 km/s) ga teng.

en: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
uz: To'fonlarni o'rganish milliy markazi olimlari Daniel chorshanbaga borib to'fonga aylanishini bashorat qilmoqdalar.

en: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
uz: Bo'ron quruqlikdan uzoq bo'lgani tufayli, AQSH yoki Karib dengiziga ehtimoliy ta'sirini baholash mushkul bo'lib qolmoqda.

en: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
uz: Xorvatiya poytaxti Zagrebda dunyoga kelgan Bobek "Partizan Belgrad" safida to'p surib mashhurlikka erishgan.

en: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
uz: U ularga 1945-yilda qo'shildi va 1958-yilgacha turdi.

en: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
uz: Jamoadagi faoliyati davomida u 468 ta uchrashuvda 403 ta gol urgan.

en: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
uz: Hech kim Bobekdan ko'ra ko'proq guruh uchun maydonga tushmagan yoki gol urmagan.

en: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
uz: 1995-yili u "Partizan" jamoasi tarixidagi eng yaxshi o'yinchi deb topildi.

en: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
uz: Bayram tantanalari dunyoga mashhur Cirque du Soleil guruhining maxsus shoui bilan boshlandi.

en: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
uz: Undan so'ng Istanbul Davlat Simfoniya Orkestri, Yanissar guruhi hamda qo'shiqchilar Fotih Erkoch va Muslum Gurseslar davom ettirishdi.

en: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
uz: Keyin Wherling Dervishes sahnaga chiqdi.

en: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
uz: Turk primadonnasi Sezen Aksu italyan tenori Alessandro Safina va yunon xonandasi Haris Aleksiu bilan birga ijro etdi.

en: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
uz: Yakunlash uchun Turkiyaning "Fire of Anatolia" raqs guruhi "Troya" shousini namoyish qildi.

en: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
uz: 13 yoshli mototsikl haydovchisi Piter Lens Indianapolis Motor Sidveyda avtohalokatga uchrab, vafot etdi.

en: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
uz: Tayyorgarlik mashqini olib borayotgan vaqtida, Lenz velosipeddan yiqilib tushdi va keyin hamkasbi Xaver Zayat uni urib yubordi.

en: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
uz: Unga zudlik bilan tez tibbiy yordam xodimlari tomonidan yordam ko'rsatlib, mahalliy shifoxonaga yetkazildi va u keyinchalik o'sha yerda vafot etdi.

en: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
uz: Zayat baxtsiz hodisada jarohat olmadi.

en: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
uz: Global moliyaviy holat haqida Zapatero shunday deya davom etdi: "moliyaviy tizim iqtisodning bir qismi, juda muhim qismidir.

en: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
uz: Biz o'tgan ikki oyda eng keskin pallaga chiqqan bir yillik moliyaviy inqirozdamiz va menimcha hozirda moliyaviy bozorlar qayta tiklana boshladi".

en: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
uz: o'tgan hafta Naked News dasturi uchta yangi ko'rsatuv bilan o'zining xalqaro til vakolatini yangiliklarni xabar qilishga keskin ravishda oshirishini e'lon qildi.

en: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
uz: Allaqachon ingliz va yapon tillarida lavhalar berayotgan хalqaro idora TV, internet va mobil qurilmalar uchun ispan, italyan va koreys tilidagi dasturlarni boshlamoqda.

en: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
uz: Yaxshiki, menga hech narsa bo'lmadi, biroq kishilar tashqariga chiqish uchun derazalarni sindirishga urinayotganliklari sababli men dahshatli manzaraga guvoh bo'ldim.

en: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
uz: Odamlar oynalarni stullar bilan urishardi, biroq derazalar sinmas edi.

en: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
uz: "Nihoyat oynalardan biri sindi va ular oyna orqali tashqariga chiqa boshladilar", dedi omon qolgan Fransishek Koval.

en: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
uz: Yulduzlar og'irroq elementlarni hosil qilish uchun vodorod atomlari bir-birlariga birlashganida (yoki yopishganida) energiya hosil bo'lishi tufayli yorug'lik va issiqlik beradi.

en: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
uz: Olimlar xuddi shu usulda energiya ishlab chiqara oladigan reaktor yaratish bo'yicha ish olib bormoqdalar.

en: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
uz: Lekin bu yechimi qiyin bo'lgan muammo va biz foydali termoyadroviy reaktorlarni ko'rishimiz uchun ko'p yillar bor.

en: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
uz: Suv yuzasining tarangligi tufayli po'lat igna uning ustida suzadi.

en: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
uz: Yuza taranglashishi suv yuzasidagi suv molekulalarining bir-birlarini ularning tepasidagi havo molekulalari ularni tortishiga qaraganda kuchli tortishlari tufayli yuz beradi.

en: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
uz: Suv molekulalari igna kabi narsalarning suv yuzida suzib yurishiga imkon beradigan ko'rinmas parda hosil qiladi.

en: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
uz: Zamonaviy muz konkisidagi tig' ikki qirrali bo'lib, ular orasida botiq bo'shliq bor. Ikkala qirra, hatto qiya bo'lganda ham, muzga yaxshiroq o'rnashish imkonini beradi.

en: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
uz: Tig'ning tag qismi egilgan bo'lgani uchun tig' u yoki bu tomonga og'ar ekan, muzga tekkan qirrasi gam egiladi.

en: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
uz: Bu konkichining burilishiga olib keladi. Agar konki o'ngga og'sa, konkichi o'ngga buriladi, agar konki chapga og'sa, konkichi chapga buriladi.

en: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
uz: Oldingi quvvat darajasiga qaytish uchun ular o'zlari yorug'likdan olgan qo'shimcha quvvatdan qutulishi lozim.

en: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
uz: Ular buni "foton" deb ataluvchi mayda yorug'lik zarrasini chiqarish orqali amalga oshirishdi.

en: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
uz: Olimlar ushbu jarayonni "qo'zg'atilgan nurlanish emissiyasi" den ataydi, chunki atomlar kuchli yorug'lik bilan qo'zg'atilib, foton nuri chiqishiga sabab bo'ladi, nur esa nurlanishning bir turidir.

en: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
uz: Keyingi suratda foton chiqarayotgan atomlar tasvirlangan. Albatta, aslida fotonlar suratdagidan ko'ra ancha kichik.

en: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
uz: Fotonlar atomlarni tashkil qiluvchi narsalardan ham maydaroq!

en: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
uz: Bir nech yuz soatlik faoliyatdan keyin lampochkadagi tolalar oxir-oqibat kuyadi va elektr lampa ishlamay qoladi.

en: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
uz: So'ng lampochkani almashtirish talab qilinadi. Lampochkani almashtirishda ehtiyot bo'lish zarur.

en: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
uz: Dastlab, chiroqning elektr kalitini o'chirish yoki kabelni uzish kerak.

en: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
uz: Buning sababi shuki, lampochkaning metall qismi turuvchi rozetkaga boradigan elektr toki, agar u hali ham qisman rozetkada bo'lganda rozetkaning ichiga yoki lampochkaning metall asosiga tegsangiz, sizni kuchli tok urishi mumkin.

en: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
uz: Qon haydovchi yurak qon aylanish tizimining asosiy organi hisoblanadi.

en: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
uz: Qon arteriyalar deb ataluvchi tomirlar orqali yurakdan chiqib ketadi va venalar deb ataluvchi tomirlar orqali yurakka qaytib keladi. Eng kichik tomirlar kapillyarlar deb ataladi.

en: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
uz: Triseratopning tishlari nafaqat barglarni, balki nihoyatda qattiq shoxlar va ildizlarni ham eza olgan bo'lardi.

en: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
uz: Ba'zi olimlarning fikriga ko'ra, Triseratoplar bo'r davrida keng tarqalgan o'simlik turidan biri sanalgan sikadlar bilan oziqlangan.

en: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
uz: Bu o'simliklar o'tkir toji, tikanli yaproqlari bilan mitti palma daraxtiga o'xshab ketadi.

en: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
uz: Triseratoplar daraxt tanasini yeyishdan avval barglarini uzib tashlash uchun kuchli tumshug'idan foydalangan bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
uz: Boshqa olimlarning ta'kidlashicha, ushbu o'simliklar o'ta zaharli, shu sababli, bugungi kunda yalqov va to'tiqush (dinozavrlarning avlodi) kabi boshqa hayvonlar zaharli barglar yoki meva bilan oziqlana olsa-da, ularni biror bir dinozavr yegani ehtimoldan uzoq.

en: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
uz: Ioning tortish kuchi meni qanday tortgan bo'lar edi? Agar siz Ioning sathida tursangiz, yerdagiga nisbatan kamroq tosh bosgan bo'lar edingiz.

en: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
uz: Yerda 200 funt (90 kg) tosh bosadigan kishi, Ioda taxminan 36 funt (16 kg) tosh bosadi. Demak, tortishish kuchi, albatta, sizni kamroq tortadi.

en: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
uz: Quyosh Yer kabi siz qadam bosishingiz mumkin bo'lgan qobiqqa ega emas. Quyosh butunlay gazlar, olov va plazmadan tashkil topgan.

en: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
uz: Quyosh markazidan uzoqlashganingiz sari gaz siyraklashib boradi.

en: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
uz: Quyoshga qaraganimizda biz ko'rgan tashqi qism "yorug'lik shari" fotosfera deb nomlanadi va "yorug'lik shari" degan ma'noni anglatadi.

en: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
uz: Taxminan uch ming yil o'tib, 1610-yilda, italiyalik astronom Galelio Galiley, oyda bo'lgani kabi Venerada ham fazalar borligini tekshirish uchun teleskopdan foydalangan.

en: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
uz: Fazalar faqat Veneraning (yoki Oyning) quyoshga yuzlangan tarafi yoritilgani uchun sodir bo'ladi. Veneraning fazalari sayyoralarning quyosh atrofida aylanishi to'g'risidagi Kopernik nazariyasini qo'llab-quvvatladi.

en: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
uz: So'ng, bir qancha yil o'tgach, 1639-yili Jeremiya Horroks ismli ingliz astronomi Venera tranzitini kuzatadi.

en: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
uz: Denloni qayta zabt etganidan so'ng Angliyada uzoq vaqt tinchlik hukm surdi.

en: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
uz: Biroq 991-yilda Ezelred bir asr oldingi Gutrum davridan beri boshqalariga qaraganda kattaroq bo'lgan Vikinglar floti bilan to'qnashdi.

en: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
uz: Mazkur flotga o'z mamlakatini Daniya hukmronligi ostidan qaytarib olishni maqsad qilgan norvegiyalik Olaf Trigvasson boshchilik qilgan.

en: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
uz: Dastlabki harbiy muvaffaqiyatsizliklardan keyin Ezelred Norvegiyaga qaytib, qirolligini birgalikdagi muvaffaqiyat orqali qo'lga kiritishga urinayotgan Olaf bilan shartlarni kelishishga erishdi.

en: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
uz: Hangul — xalq har kuni foydalanadigan atayin ixtiro qilingan yagona alifbo. Alifbo 1444-yilda qirol Sejong (1418–1450) hukmronligi davrida ixtiro qilingan.

en: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
uz: Qirol Sejong Choson sulolasining to'rtinchi qiroli bo'lgan va eng obro'lilaridan biridir.

en: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
uz: Dastlab, u Hangul alifbosini "to'g'ri talaffuz uchun insonlarga qo'llanma" ma'nosini anglatuvchi Hunmin Jeongeum deb nomlagan.

en: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
uz: Sanskrit qanday paydo bo'lgani haqida ko'plab nazariyalar mavjud. Ulardan biri o'zlari bilan birga o'z tillarini olib kelgan Oriylarning ga'rbdan Hindistonga ko'chishi haqidadir.

en: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
uz: Sanskrit qadimiy til bo'lib, Yevropada so'zlashiladigan lotin tiliga qiyoslanadi.

en: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
uz: Dunyoda ma'lum bo'lgan eng qadimiy kitob sanskrit tilida yozilgan. Upanishadlar to'plamidan keyin, sanskrit tili iyerarxiya tufayli shunchaki asta-sekinlik bilan yo'qolib ketdi.

en: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
uz: Sanskrit tili, xuddi lotin tili fransuz hamda ispan tillari singari Yevropa tillari uchun manba bo'lganidek, ko'plab zamonaviy hind tillari uchun manba bo'lib xizmat qilgan nihoyatda murakkab hamda boy til.

en: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
uz: Fransiya uchun kurash tugashi bilanoq, Germaniya Britaniya orolini bosib olishga tayyorgarlikni boshladi.

en: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
uz: Germaniya hujumga "Dengiz sheri operatsiyasi" degan shartli nom berdi. Britaniya armiyasining aksariyat og'ir qurollari va zaxiralari Dyunkerkdan evakuatsiya qilinishda yo'qotilgandi, shu sababli armiya g'oyat zaif edi.

en: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
uz: Biroq Qirollik harbiy-dengiz floti hali ham Germaniya harbiy-dengiz flotiga ("Kriegsmarine") qaraganda ancha kuchliroq edi va La-Mansh bo'ylab yuborilgan har qanday istilo flotini yanchib tashlay olar edi.

en: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
uz: Lekin qirollik dengiz flotining oz sonli kemalari ehtimoliy hujum yo'nalishlarida joylashtirilgan edi, chunki admirallar nemis havo hujumi natijasida cho'kib ketishdan qo'rqardi.

en: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
uz: Keling, Italiyaning rejalarini anglashdan boshlaymiz. Xususan, Italiya Germaniya va Yaponiyaning "kichik ukasi" edi.

en: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
uz: Ular shundoqqina urush boshlanishidan oldin to'rtta yangi kema qurishgan bo'lsa-da, kuchsizroq armiya va kuchsizroq dengiz flotiga ega edi.

en: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
uz: Italiyaning bosh maqsadlari Afrika davlatlari edi. Mazkur mamlakatlarni qoʻlga kiritish uchun ularga harbiy platsdarm kerak bo'lardi, shunda qo'shinlar o'rta yer dengizi bo'ylab suzib o'tib, Afrikani bosib olishlari mumkin edi.

en: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
uz: Buning uchun ular Misrdagi Britaniya bazalari hamda kemalaridan qutilishlari lozim edi. Bu harakatlardan tashqari, Italiya jangovar kemalari boshqa hech narsa qilmasligi lozim edi.

en: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
uz: Endi Yaponiya uchun. Yaponiya xuddi Britaniya kabi orol-davlat edi.

en: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
uz: Suvosti kemalari suv ostida yurish va u yerda uzoq muddat qolishga mo'ljallangan kemalardir.

en: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
uz: Birinchi jahon urushi va Ikkinchi jahon urushida suvosti kemalaridan foydalanilgan. o'sha vaqtlarda ular juda sekin bo'lib, o't ochish masofasi juda cheklangan edi.

en: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
uz: Urushning boshida ular asosan dengiz yuzasida safar qilar edi, lekin radarlar takomillashib, aniqroq bo'la boshlagani sayin, suvosti kemalari ko'zga tashlanmaslik uchun suv ostiga shong'ishga majbur bo'lgan.

en: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
uz: Nemis suvosti kemalari U-Boats deb atalgan. Nemislar suvosti kemalarida suzish va ularni boshqarishga juda usta bo'lishgan.

en: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
uz: Suvosti kemalari bilan muvaffaqiyat qozonganliklari sababli urushdan so'ng nemislar ularning ko'pchiligiga ega deb ishonilmaydi.

en: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
uz: Ha! Ba'zida "Qirol Tut" yoki "Qirol bolakay" deb ham atalgan podshoh Tutanxamon hozirda eng taniqli bo'lgan qadimgi Misr shohlaridan biri.

en: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
uz: Qizig'I, u qadimgi vaqtlarda juda muhim deb hisoblanmagan hamda ko'pchilik qadimgi podshohlar ro'yxatlarida qayd etilmagan.

en: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
uz: Ammo 1922-yilda qabrining topilishi uni mashhur shaxsga aylantirdi. o'tmishning ko'plab qabrlari talon-taroj qilingan bo'lsa ham, bu qabrga deyarli tegilmagandi.

en: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
uz: Tutanxamon bilan birga ko'milgan narsalarning ko'pchiligi, jumladan qimmatli metallar va nodir toshlardan yasalgan minglab artefaktlar yaxshi saqlanib qolgan.

en: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
uz: Kegayli g'ildiraklarning ixtiro qilinishi Ossuriya aravalarini yengilroq, tezroq va askarlar hamda boshqa aravalardan o'zib ketishga yaxshiroq darajada tayyor bo'lishiga olib keldi.

en: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
uz: Ularning dahshatli arbaletlaridan otilgan o'qlar dushman askarlari zirhlariga kirishi mumkin edi. Miloddan avvalgi 1000-yil atrofida Ossuriyaliklar birinchi otliq qo'shinni yaratdilar.

en: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
uz: Otliqlar otda jang qiladigan qo'shindir. Egarlar hali kashf qilinmaganligi sababli, Ossuriya otliqlari o'z otlariga egarsiz mingan holda jang qilgan.

en: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
uz: Biz ko'plab yunon siyosatchilari, olimlari va musavvirlarini bilamiz. Ehtimol, bu madaniyatning eng mashhur shaxsi Yunon adabiyotining ikki shoh asarlari "Iliada" va "Odissey" dostonlarini yozgan, ko'zi ojiz afsonaviy shoir Gomerdir.

en: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
uz: Sofokl va Aristofan hanuzgacha taniqli dramanavislar bo'lib, ularning asarlari jahon adabiyotining durdona asarlaridan hisoblanadi.

en: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
uz: Yana bir mashhur grek bu asosan o'zining to'g'ri burchakli uchburchakning tomonlari o'rtasidagi munosabatlar teoremasi bilan mashhur bo'lgan matematik Pifagordir.

en: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
uz: Hind tilida qancha odam gaplashishi haqida turli taxminlar mavjud. Uning dunyoda eng keng tarqalgan ikkinchi va to'rtinchi tillar orasida ekani taxmin qilinadi.

en: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
uz: Ona tilida so'zlashuvchilar soni juda yaqin bog'langan dialektlarlarning hisobga olingan yoki olinmaganiga bog'liq ravishda farq qiladi.

en: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
uz: Hisob-kitoblarga ko'ra, so'zlovchilari 340 milliondan 500 milliongacha bo'lib, 800 millionga yaqin odam bu tilni tushuna oladi.

en: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
uz: Hind va urdu tili lug'at jihatidan o'xshash, lekin yozuv jihatidan farqli; kundalik suhbatlarda, odatda, har ikkala tilda gapiruvchilar bir-birini tushunadi.

en: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
uz: Taxminan 15-asrlarda Shimoliy Estoniya Germaniyaning ulkan madaniy ta'siri ostida yashagan.

en: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
uz: Ayrim nemis rohiblari Xudoni tub xalqqa yaqinlashtirishni xohlashdi, shuning uchun ular eston adabiy tilini yaratishdi.

en: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
uz: U nemis alifbosiga asoslangan hamda birgina "Õ/õ" belgisi qo'shilgan edi.

en: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
uz: Vaqt o'tishi bilan, nemis tilidan kirib kelgan ko'plab so'zlar birlashdi. Bu ma'rifatning ibtidosi edi.

en: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
uz: An'anaga ko'ra, taxt vorisi maktabni tamomlagach, to'g'ri harbiy xizmatga jo'nardi.

en: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
uz: Ammo Charlz Kembrijdagi Triniti kollejga borib, antropologiya va arxeologiya, keyinchalik esa tarixni o'rganib, 2:2 (quyi ikkinchi toifali daraja) ni qo'lga kiritdi.

en: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
uz: Charlz Britaniya Qirollik oilasining daraja bilan taqdirlangan dastlabki a'zosi bo'lgan.

en: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
uz: Turkiyaning Yevropa qismi (sharqiy Frakiya yoki Bolqon yarim orolidagi Rumeliya deb ham ataladi) mamlakatning 3% hududini qamrab olgan.

en: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
uz: Turkiya hududi deyarli to'g'ri to'rtburchak shaklga ega bo'lib, uzunligi 1600 kilometrdan (1000 mil) ortiq va kengligi 800 kilometrga (500 mil) teng.

en: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
uz: Turkiyaning maydoni, ko'llarni hisobga olgan holda, 783 562 kvadrat kilometerni (300 948 kvadrat milya) egallaydi, shundan 755 688 kvadrat kilometr (291 773 kvadrat milya) janubiy g'arbiy Osiyoda va 23 764 kvadrat kilometr (9174 kvadrat milya) Yevropada joylashgan.

en: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
uz: Turkiya hududi uni dunyodagi 37-eng yirik mamlakatga aylantiradi va deyarli Metropliten Fransiya hamda Birlashgan Qirollikning birgalikdagi maydoniga teng.

en: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
uz: Turkiya uch tomondan dengizlar bilan o'ralgan: g'arbda Egey dengizi, shimolda Qora dengiz, janubda o'rta Yer dengizi joylashgan.

en: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
uz: Lyuksemburgning uzun tarixi bor, lekin uning mustaqilligi 1839-yildan boshlanadi.

en: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
uz: Belgiyaning hozirgi kundagi hududlari o'tmishda Lyuksemburgning tarkibida bo'lgan, biroq 1830-yillardagi Belgiya inqilobidan so'ng Belgiya hududiga aylangan.

en: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
uz: Lyuksemburg doim betaraf mamlakat bo'lib qolishga harakat qilgan, ammo Birinchi jahon urushida ham, Ikkinchi jahon urushida ham Germaniya tomonidan bosib olingan.

en: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
uz: 1957-yilda Lyuksemburg hozirda Yevropa Ittifoqi sifatida tanilgan tashkilotning ta'sischi a'zosi bo'lgan.

en: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
uz: Drukgyal Dzong — Paro tumanining yuqori qismida (Phondey qishlog'ida) joylashgan vayron qilingan qal'a va buddaviylik monastiri.

en: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
uz: Aytishlaricha, 1649-yili Zabdrung Ngavang Namgyel Tibet-mo'g'ul kuchlariga ustidan g'alabasini xotirlash maqsadida mazkur qal'ani bunyod etgan.

en: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
uz: 1951-yili yong'in tufayli Drukgyal Dzongning faqat ayrim qoldiqlari, masalan, Zabdrung Ngavang Namgyal surati qoldi, xolos.

en: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
uz: Yong'indan so'ng qal'a saqlab qolindi va himoyaga olindi, u Butandagi eng shov-shuvli jozibador maskanlaridan biri bo'lib qoldi.

en: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
uz: 18-asrda Kambodja Tailand va Vetnamdek ikki qudratli qo'shnisi orasida siquvda qoldi.

en: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
uz: 18-asrda taylandliklar Kambodjaga bir necha marotaba bostirib kirgan va 1772-yil Pnom Fenni vayron qilgan.

en: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
uz: 18-asrning oxirgi yillarida vetnamliklar ham Kambodjani istilo qildi.

en: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
uz: Venesuelaliklarning o'n sakkiz foizi ishsiz bo'lib, ish bilan ta'minlanganlarning ko'pchiligi norasmiy iqtisodda ishlaydi.

en: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
uz: Ishlaydigan venesuelaliklarning uchdan ikki qismi xizmat ko'rsatish sohasida mehnat qiladi, deyarli chorak qismi sanoatda va beshdan bir qismi qishloq xo'jaligida ishlaydi.

en: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
uz: Venesuelaliklar uchun muhim sanoat bu mamlakat sof eksportchi bo'lgan neft sanoatidir, garchi neft sanoatida aholining faqat bir foizi ishlasa ham.

en: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
uz: Davlat mustaqilligining ilk kunlarida Singapur Botanika bog'i ekspertlari orolni tropik bog' shaharga aylantirishga ko'maklashdilar.

en: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
uz: 1981-yili orxideya gibridi bo'lgan Vanda Miss Joakim xalqning milliy guli sifatida tanlab olindi.

en: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
uz: Har yili oktyabr atrofida qariyb 1,5 million o'txo'r hayvonlar yomg'ir uchun shimoliy tepaliklardan Mara daryosini kechib o'tib, janubiy tekisliklar tomon safar qiladi.

en: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
uz: Va keyin aprel oyidagi yomg'irdan so'ng g'arb orqali, yana Mara daryosini kesib o'tib, shimolga qaytiladi.

en: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
uz: Serengeti mintaqasii Tanzaniyadagi Serengeti Milliy bog'i, Ngorongoro qo'riqxona hududi hamda Masva Game qo'riqxonasi va Kenyadagi Maasai Mara Milliy qo'riqxonasini qamrab oladi.

en: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
uz: Interfaol mediani yaratishni o'rganish uchun odatiy va an'anaviy ko'nikmalar, shuningdek, interfaol darslarda o'rganilgan vositalar (hikoya taxtasini yaratish, audio va videoni tahrirlash, hikoya so'zlash va h.k.) talab etiladi.

en: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
uz: Interfaol dizayn media mahsulot haqidagi taxminlaringizni qayta baholashingizni va noodatiy usullar orqali o'ylashni o'rganishni talab qiladi.

en: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
uz: Interaktiv dizayn loyiha komponentlarining bir-birlariga bog'lanishlarini, biroq alohida element sifatida ma'noga ega bo'lishlarini ham talab qiladi.

en: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
uz: Yaqinlashtiruvchi linzalarning asosiy noqulayligi shundan iboratki, fokusning murakkabligi va fokus masofasiga erishish uchun talab qilingan linza elementlari soni asosiy fokusli linzalarga qaraganda ancha katta bo'ladi.

en: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
uz: Obyektiv ishlab chiqaruvchilarning obyektiv ishlab chiqarishda erishgan yuqori standartlari tufayli bu tobora arzimas muammoga aylanib bormoqda.

en: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
uz: Bu yaqinlashtirish linzalari o'zgarmas fokusli linzalar yordamida erishilgan natija bilan taqqoslanadigan rasmlar yaratish imkonini beradi.

en: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
uz: Yaqinlashtiruvchi obyektivlarning boshqa bir kamchiligi shundaki, obyektivning maksimal diafragmasi (tezligi) odatda pastroq bo'ladi.

en: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
uz: Bu yorug'lik kam bo'lgan sharoitlarda arzon kattalashtiruvchi linzalardan chaqnoqsiz foydalanishni qiyinlashtiradi.

en: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
uz: Kinofilmni DVD formatiga aylantirishda eng ko'p uchraydigan muammolardan biri bu tasvirni ortiqcha yoyib yuborishdir.

en: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
uz: Ko'pchilik televideniyelar keng ommaga yoqadigan tarzda tayyorlanadi.

en: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
uz: Ana shu sababli siz televizorda ko'radigan barcha narsalar yuqoridan, pastdan va yon tomonlardan kesilgan chegaralarga ega bo'ladi.

en: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
uz: Bu tasvir ekranni to'liq qoplashini ta'minlash uchun qilingan. Bu overskan deyiladi.

en: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
uz: Afsuski, DVDga yozganingizda uning chetlari ham kesilishi mumkin, agar videoda taglavha tag qismga juda yaqin joylashgan bo'lsa, ular ko'rinmaydi.

en: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
uz: An'anaviy o'rta asrlar qal'asi ritsarlar turnirlari, banketlar va Artur rutsarligini qiyofalantirgan holda uzoq vaqtlar tasavvurlarni ilhomlantirib keldi.

en: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
uz: Hattoki ming yillik eski harobalar orasida turib ham uzoq o'tmishda o''tib ketgan janglarning tovushlari va hidlarini tasavvur qilish, toshlar ustida tuyoqlarning yurishlarini deyarli eshitish va zindon ostidan ko'tarilayotgan qo'rquvni sezish mumkin.

en: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
uz: Biroq bizning tasavvurimiz haqiqatga asoslanganmi? Nega birinchi navbatda qasrlar qurilgan? Ular qanday qilib loyihalashtirilgan va bunyod etilgan?

en: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
uz: o'sha davrga xos bo'lgan Kibri Muxloe qal'asi haqiqiy qal'adan ko'ra, ko'proq mustahkamligi oshirilgan uydir.

en: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
uz: Uning katta oynaband derazalari va ingichka devori keskin hujumga uzoq dosh berolmagan bo'lardi.

en: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
uz: 1480-yillarda qurilishi Lord Gastings tomonidan boshlangan vaqtda mamlakat nisbatan tinch bo'lgan va mudofaa izg'ib yurgan mayda qaroqchilar to'dalariga qarshi talab qilingan xolos.

en: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
uz: Kuchlar muvozanati Yevropa mamlakatlari barcha Yevropa davlatlarining milliy suverenitetini saqlashga harakat qilgan tizim edi.

en: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
uz: Konsepsiya Yevropaning barcha davlatlari bir davlatning qudratli bo'lishing oldini olishga intilishlaridan iborat edi va shu tarzda milliy hukumatlar muvozanatni saqlash maqsadida o'z ittifoqlarini tez-tez o'zgartirib turardilar.

en: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
uz: Ispaniya merosi uchun urush kuchlar muvozanati asosiy muammosi bo'lgan birinchi urushni belgilab berdi.

en: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
uz: Bu muhim o'zgarish bo'ldi, chunki Yevropaning qudratli davlatlari endi diniy urushni bahona qila olmas edi. Shu tarzda, diniy urush deb nomlangan o'ttiz yillik urush oxirgi urush bo'ldi.

en: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
uz: Efesdagi Artemida ibodatxonasi m.a. 356-yil 21-iyulda Gerostratning qasddan o't qo'yishi oqibatida vayron qilingan.

en: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
uz: Hikoyaga ko'ra, uning muddaosi istalgancha badal evaziga mashhur bo'lish edi. G'azablangan efesliklar Gerostratning nomi hech qachon qayd etilmasligini e'lon qiladi.

en: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
uz: Keyinchalik yunon tarixchisi Strabon mazkur nomni qayd etgan, shu tarzda biz bugun undan xabardormiz. Ibodatxona Buyuk Aleksandr dunyoga kelgan tunda vayron etilgan.

en: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
uz: Aleksandr shoh sifatida ibodatxonani qayta qurish uchun pul to'lashni taklif qildi, biroq uning taklifi rad etildi. Keyinchalik, Aleksandr vafotidan so'ng, m.a.323-yilda ibodatxona qayta barpo qilindi.

en: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
uz: Notalarning barchasini to'g'ri bosar ekansiz, qo'lingizning iloji boricha bo'shashganligiga ishonch hosil qiling — shuningdek, barmoqlaringiz bilan tegishli bo'lmagan harakatlarni ko'p qilmaslikka urining.

en: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
uz: Shu tarzda, siz o'zingizni imkon qadar kamroq toliqtirasiz. Unutmang, pianinodagi singari qo'shimcha kuch uchun klaviaturani katta kuch bilan urishga hojat yo'q.

en: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
uz: Akkordeonda qo'shimcha tovush chiqarish uchun ohangdan kuchliroq bosim yoxud tezlik bilan foydalanasiz.

en: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
uz: Tasavvuf — bu yakuniy voqelik, ilohiylik, ma'naviy ishonch yoki Xudodan ongli ravishda xabardor bo'lish, o'zlikni anglash, Xudo bilan muloqotda bo'lish istagining mavjudligidir.

en: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
uz: E'tiqod qiluvchi ilohiy borliq/ma'bud yoki ma'budlarga bo'lgan bevosita tajriba, ichki his yoki tushunchani izlaydi.

en: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
uz: Shogirdlar hayotning muayyan yo'llarini yoxud ushbu tajribani boyitishga qaratilgan amaliyotlarni davom ettiradilar.

en: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
uz: Tasavvuf noyob ong holatini, xususan, tinch, ziyrak, saodatli va hatto ekstatik xarakterga ega holatni bevosita boshdan kechirishga urg'u berishi orqali boshqa diniy e'tiqod va ibodat shakllaridan farqlanishi mumkin.

en: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
uz: Sikxizm Hind submaterigidagi dindir. U Panjob mintaqasida 15-asrda Hinduizm an'analari doirasidagi sektalarga bo'linish natijasida kelib chiqqan.

en: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
uz: Sikxlar garchi o'z e'tiqodlarining Hinduizm asosidagi ildizlar va an'analarga egaligini tan olsalar ham, uni hinduizmdan alohida din deb hisoblaydilar.

en: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
uz: Sikxlar o'z dinini "Gurmat" deb ataydi, bu panjob tilida "guru yo'li" degani. Guru barcha hind dinlarining asosiy xususiyatidir, biroq sikxizmda sikx e'tiqodi asosini tashkil etuvchi ahamiyatga ega.

en: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.
uz: Mazkur dinga Guru Nanak (1469–1539) tomonidan 15-asrda asos solingan. So'ngra to'qqiz nafar guru ketma-ket ergashdi.

en: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.
uz: Biroq 1956-yilning iyunida xodimlar oziq-ovqat tanqisligi hamda ish haqi kamaytirilishiga qarshi namoyishlar o'tkazayotgan joyda, kommunizmga qarshi umumiy norozilikka aylanib ketganda, Polshadagi tartibsizliklar vaqtida Xrushchevning va'dalari sinovdan o'tkazildi.

en: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.
uz: Oxir-oqibat, Xrushchyov tartibni qayta tiklash maqsadida tanklarni yuborganligiga qaramay, u ayrim iqtisodiy talablarga yon berdi hamda mashhur Vladislav Gomulkani yangi bosh vazir etib tayinlashga rozilik berdi.

en: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.
uz: Hind vodiysi sivilizatsiyasi — hozirgi Pokistonning aksariyat qismi hamda shimoli-sharqiy Afg'oniston va shimoli-g'arbiy Hindistondagi ba'zi viloyatlarni o'z ichiga olgan shimoli-g'arbiy Hindiston subkontinentida joylashgan Bronza davri svilizatsiyasi edi.

en: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.
uz: Bu tamaddun Hind daryosi havzasida gullab-yashnadi, shu sababli uning nomini oldi.

en: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
uz: Ba'zi olimlar hozirda qurib bitgan Sarasvati daryosi havzalarida ham sivilizatsiya mavjud bo'lganligi sababli, u mos ravishda Hind-Sarasvati sivilizatsiyasi deb nomlanishi kerak, deb ta'kidlasa-da, ayrimlar 1920-yillarda qazilgan joylardan birinchisi — Harappa sharafiga uni Harappa sivilizatsiyasi deb ataydi.

en: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
uz: Rim imperiyasining militaristik tabiati tibbiyot yutuqlarining taraqqiyotiga ko'maklashdi.

en: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
uz: Imperator Avgust shifokorlarni yollay boshladi hamda ular hattoki urushlardan so'ng foydalanish maqsadida birinchi Rim tibbiyot korpusini yaratishdi.

en: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
uz: Jarrohlar ko'knor urug'i ekstraktlaridan olingan morfin va mingdevona urug'idan olingan skopolaminni o'z ichiga olgan turli tinchlantiruvchi vositalar to'g'risida ma'lumotga ega edilar.

en: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
uz: Ular kasallarni gangrenadan saqlash uchun amputatsiya qilish, shuningdek, qon oqishini to'xtatish uchun turniket va arterial qisqichlardan foydalanishda mohir bo'lib olishdi.

en: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
uz: Bir necha asrlar davomida Rim imperiyasi tibbiyot sohasida ulkan g'alabalarga erishgan va hozirgi vaqtda bizga ma'lum bilimlarning katta qismini shakllantirdi.

en: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
uz: Pyurlend origami — bu bir vaqtning o'zida faqat bitta buklama bajarilishi mumkin bo'lgan, teskari buklamalar kabi murakkab buklamalarga yo'l qo'yilmaydigan va barcha buklamalar oddiy o'ringa ega bo'lgan origamidir.

en: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
uz: U tajribasiz buklovchilarga yoxud harakatlanish ko'nikmalari cheklanganlarga ko'mak berish maqsadida 1970-yillarda Jon Smit tomonidan ishlab chiqilgan.

en: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
uz: Irq va irqiy stereotiplar haqida tushuncha yosh bolalarda juda erta shakllanadi va mazkur irqiy stereotiplar xulq-atvorga ta'sir o'tkazadi.

en: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.
uz: Masalan, o'zini "maktabda yaxshi o'qimaydi" stereotipi bilan qaraladigan irqiy ozchilikka mansub deb bilgan bolalar o'zlarining irqiga oid stereotip haqida eshitganidan so'ng maktabda yaxshi o'qimay qo'yishga moyil bo'lgan.

en: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.
uz: MySpace Qo'shma Shtatlarda foydalaniladigan uchinchi eng mashhur sayt hisoblanadi va ayni vaqtda 54 millionta profilga ega.

en: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.
uz: Bu veb-saytlar, xususan, ta'lim muassasalarida yuqori e'tibor qozondi.

en: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.
uz: Mazkur veb-saytlar ijobiy jihatlarga ega, jumladan, bloglar, videolar, rasmlar va boshqa xususiyatlarni o'z ichiga olgan sinf sahifasini osongina o'rnata oladi.

en: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.
uz: Mazkur sahifaga birgina veb-manzilni ko'rsatish orqali osongina kirish mumkin, bu klaviaturadan foydalanish yoki imloda muammolari bor talabalar uchun yozish va eslab qolishni osonlashtiradi.

en: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.
uz: Uni o'qishni osonlashtirish, shuningdek kerakli darajada ko'proq yoki kamroq rangli qilib sozlash mumkin.

en: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".
uz: Diqqatni jamlay olmaslik buzilishi "bu nevrologik sindrom bo'lib, uning klassik aniqlovchi alomatlari impulsivlik, chalg'ituvchanlik va giperfaollik yoki ortiqcha energiyani o'z ichiga oladi".

en: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".
uz: Bu o'rganishga layoqatsizlik emas, bu o'rganish faoliyatidagi buzilish; bu "barcha bolalarning 3–5 foizi, ehtimol, qariyb 2 million amerikalik bolalarga ta'sir o'tkazadi".

en: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.
uz: ADDga yo'liqqan bolalar o'qish mashg'ulotlari kabi narsalarga diqqat jamlashga qiynaladi, lekin ular o'yinlar o'ynash yoki sevimli multfilmlarini tomosha qilish yoxud gaplarni tinish belgilarisiz yozish kabi narsalarga diqqatini jamlay oladi.

en: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.
uz: Ushbu bolalar odatda ko'p muammolarga duch keladi, chunki ular o'zlarining ongini odatiy usullar bilan rag'batlantira olmaganliklari uchun rag'batlantirish maqsadida "qaltis xatti-harakatlarda ishtirok etishadi, janjallarga kirishishadi va hokimiyatga qarshi chiqishadi".

en: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.
uz: ADD boshqa tengdoshlar bilan munosabatlarga ta'sir qiladi, chunki boshqa bolalar ularning o'zlarini nega bunday tutishini yoki nega bunday talaffuz qilishini yoxud ularning yetuklik darajasi boshqacha ekanini tushuna olmaydilar.

en: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.
uz: Bilim olish hamda o'rganish slohiyati yuqorida tilga olinganidek o'zgargani tufayli, bilim olishning bazaviy darajasi ham o'zgargan.

en: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.
uz: Axborot olish bo'yicha yondashuv boshqacha edi. Individual eslash vaqtida ortiq bosim bo'lmas edi, biroq matnni eslash qobiliyatiga ko'proq e'tibor qaratila boshlagandi.

en: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
uz: Aslini olganda, Uyg'onish davri o'rganish hamda bilim berishga nisbatan bo'lgan yondashuvda katta o'zgarishlar qildi.

en: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.
uz: Boshqa primatlardan farqli ravishda, gominidlar siljish yoki vaznini ko'tarish yoxud daraxtlar oralab o'tishda ortiq qo'llaridan foydalanmaydi.

en: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.
uz: Shimpanzening qo'l va oyoq kaftlari o'lcham va uzunlik jihatidan bir xil, bu qo'lning bo'g'imda yurish paytida og'irlikni ko'tarish uchun foydalanilishida aks etadi.

en: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.
uz: Inson qo'li tekisroq bo'g'imlarga ega bo'lib, oyoqdan kaltaroqdir.

en: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
uz: Yoshi ikki milliondan uch million yilgacha bo'lgan qo'l suyagi topilmalari qo'lning ixtisoslashuvi yurishdan qo'l mehnatiga ko'chganini ko'rsatadi.

en: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.
uz: Ayrim kishilar tez-tez sun'iy ravishda qo'zg'atilgan ongli tushlarni ko'rish juda ham toliqtirishi mumkin deb hisoblaydi.

en: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.
uz: Bu hodisaning asosiy sababi REM fazasi o'rtasidagi vaqt uzunligini kengaytiruvchi ongli tushlarning natijasidir.

en: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.
uz: Har tuniga kamroq sondagi REM lar bilan siz haqiqiy uyquni boshingizdan kechiradigan va tanangiz qayta tiklanadigan bu holat muammoga aylanish uchun yetarli darajada kamroq bo'lib boradi.

en: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.
uz: Bu go'yoki har yigirma yoki o'ttiz daqiqada uyg'onib, televizor ko'rish kabi toliqtiradi.

en: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
uz: Natija sizning miyangizning bir kechada qanchalik aniq tush ko'rishga urinishiga bog'liq.

en: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.
uz: Shimoliy Amerikada italiyaliklarning ishlari deyarli boshidanoq o'ngidan kelmadi. 1940-yilning 10-iyunida Italiya urush e'lon qilgandan bir hafta o'tib, Britaniyaning 11-gussarlar polki Liviyadagi Kapuzzo qal'asini qo'lga oldi.

en: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.
uz: Bardiya sharqidagi pistirmada britaniyaliklar italyanlarning o'ninchi armiyasi bosh muhandisi Genaral Lastuchchini qo'lga oldi.

en: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
uz: 28-iyun kuni Liviya general-gubernatori va Mussolinining mo'ljaldagi vorisi — marshal Italo Balbo Tobrukka qo'nish paytida o'z tarafdorlarining yanglish o't ochishi natijasida halok bo'ldi.

en: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.
uz: Zamonaviy qilichbozlik sporti universitetda tahsil olayotgan talabalardan tortib, professional va Olimpiada o'yinlarigacha ko'plab darajalarda o'ynaladi.

en: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
uz: Bu sport asosan duel shaklida o'ynaladi, bir qilichboz boshqasi bilan jang qiladi.

en: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.
uz: Golf — bu o'yinchilar koptoklarni urib, chuqurchalarga tushirish uchun klyushkalardan foydalanadigan o'yindir.

en: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.
uz: Odatiy raund davomida o'n sakkizta chuqurcha o'ynaladi, o'yinchilar odatda yo'lakdagi birinchi chuqurchadan boshlashadi va o'n sakkizinchisida tugatishadi.

en: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.
uz: Bosqichni yakunlash uchun eng kam chavgon zarbalari yoxud tebranishlaridan foydalangan o'yinchi g'alaba qiladi.

en: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
uz: o'yin o't ustida o'ynaladi va chuqurcha atrofidagi o'tlar qisqaroq qilib o'rilib, yashil deb nom beriladi.

en: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.
uz: Ehtimol, turizmning eng keng tarqalgan turi bu aksariyat odamlar sayohat bilan bog'laydigan rekreatsion turizmdir.

en: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.
uz: Bu kishilarning odatiy kundalik hayot tarzidan ancha farqli bo'lgan yerga dam olish hamda ko'ngil ochish uchun borishidir.

en: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.
uz: Plyajlar, mavzuli parklar va lager maydonlari ko'pincha hordiq chiqaruvchi sayyohlar tez-tez tashrif buyuradigan eng ommabop joylardir.

en: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.
uz: Agar muayyan joyga tashrif buyurishdan maqsad uning tarixi hamda madaniyati bilan tanishish bo'lsa, unda turizmning mazkur turi madaniy turizm deb ataladi.

en: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
uz: Sayohatchilar muayyan davlatning turli diqqatga sazovor manzillariga tashrif buyurishlari yoxud shunchaki faqat bitta hududga e'tibor qaratishni afzal ko'rishlari mumkin.

en: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.
uz: Mazkur faoliyatni ko'rgach, mustamlakachilar ham qo'shimcha kuchlarni chaqirdi.

en: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).
uz: Oldingi pozitsiyalarni mustahkamlovchi qo'shinlar polkovniklar Jon Stark va Jeyms Rid (har ikkalasi ham keyinchalik general bo'lishgan) qo'l ostilaridagi 200 kishidan iborat 1 va 3-polklarni o'z ichiga oldi.

en: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.
uz: Starkning odamlari mustamlakachi pozitsiyasining shimoliy yakunidagi panjara bo'ylab o'z o'rinlarini egalladilar.

en: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.
uz: Quyi oqim yarimorolning shimoli-sharqi bo'ylab Mistik daryo yoqalab bo'shliq ochganida, ular tezda to'siqni qisqa tosh devor bilan kichik sohildagi suv havzasining shimoliy chekkasiga qadar kengaytirishdi.

en: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
uz: Gridli yoki Stark to'siq oldiga taxminan 100 fut (30 m) masofada ustun o'rnatib, oddiy odamlar o'tib ketgunicha hech kim o't ochmasligini buyurdi.

en: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions.
uz: Amerikaning rejasi uchta turli yo'nalishdan muvofiqlashtirilgan hamlalarni amalga oshirishga asoslangandi.

en: General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements.
uz: General Jon Kadvalder har qanday qo'shimcha vositalarni to'sib qo'yish uchun Bordentaundagi ingliz garnizoniga qarshi chalg'ituvchi hujum boshlaydi.

en: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping.
uz: General Jeyms Eving Trenton Ferridagi daryodan 700 nafar militsiyani olib o'tdi, Assunpink daryosi ustidagi ko'prikni qo'lga kiritdi hamda hech bir dushman qo'shinining qochib qolishiga yo'l qo'ymadi.

en: The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
uz: 2400 kishilik asosiy hujum kuchi Trentondan to'qqiz mil shimoldagi daryodan kesib o'tib, so'ng biri Grin qo'l ostida hamda yana biri Sallivan qo'l ostida tong otishiga yaqin hujum boshlash maqsadida ikki guruhga bo'lingan.

en: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity.
uz: Chorak mil yugurishdan yarim mil yugurishga otilganida tezlikning ahamiyatini ancha kamayadi va bardoshlilik mutlaq zaruriyatga aylanadi.

en: Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards.
uz: Albatta, ikki daqiqani ishlab olishi mumkin bo'lgan birinchi darajali o'rta masofaga yuguruvchi sportchi juda katta tezlikka ega bo'lishi lozim, biroq nima bo'lganda ham chidamlilik rivojlantirilishi kerak.

en: Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
uz: Qish paytida kross yugurish, tananing yuqori qismi uchun gimnastik mashqlar bilan birgalikda, yugurish mavsumi uchun eng yaxshi tayyorgarlikdir.

en: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness.
uz: To'g'ri ovqatlanish amaliyotlarining o'zi a'lo ko'rsatkichlarni ta'minlay olmaydi, lekin ular yosh sportchilarning umumiy salomatligiga sezilarli ta'sir qila oladi.

en: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
uz: Sog'lom quvvat muvozanatini saqlash, foydali suv ichish odatiga amal qilish va qo'shimchalar iste'molining turli jihatlarini tushunish sportchilarga o'z ko'rsatkichlarini yaxshilash va sportdan ko'proq zavq olishlariga yordam beradi.

en: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate.
uz: O'rta masofaga yugurish nisbatan arzon sport turi bo'lsa-da, u bilan shug'ullanish uchun zarur qancha anjom zarurligi borasida yanglish tushunchalar ko'p.

en: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance.
uz: Mahsulotlar ehtiyojga qarab sotib olinishi mumkin, biroq aksariyati faoliyatga arzimas ta'sir ko'rsatadi yoki umuman ta'sir ko'rsatmaydi.

en: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
uz: Atletlar hattoki haqiqiy foyda bermaganida ham, ular mahsulotni afzal ko'rishni his qilishlari mumkin.

en: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter.
uz: Atomni barcha moddalarning asosiy qurilish g'ishtlaridan biri deb hisoblasa bo'ladi.

en: Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1.
uz: U Quyosh atrofida aylanayotgan sayyoralar singari Borning soddalashtirilgan modeliga asosan elektron orbitasi bo'ylab harakatlanayongan markaziy yadrodan tashkil topgan juda murakkab obyektdir — 1.1-rasmga qarang.

en: The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons.
uz: Yadro ikkita zarrachalar — neytronlar va protonlarni o'z ichiga oladi.

en: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
uz: Neytronlar zaryadsiz, protonlar esa musbat elektr zaryadga ega. Elektronlarda manfiy elektr zaryadlar mavjud.

en: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety.
uz: Qurbonni tekshirish uchun siz xavfsizligingizga ishonch hosil qilish maqsadida avval voqea sodir bo'lgan joyni o'rganishingiz kerak.

en: You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags.
uz: Jabrlanuvchiga yaqinlashganingizda uning (erkak yoki ayol) holatini va har qanday avtomatik xavf alomatlarini payqashingiz kerak.

en: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
uz: Agar siz yordam berishga urinib jarohat olsangiz, vaziyatni yanada og'irlashtirish uchungina xizmat qilishingiz mumkin.

en: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers.
uz: Tadqiqotda tushkunlik, qo'rquv va vahima bel og'rig'idan aziyat chekuvchilarda og'riq va nogironlik o'rtasidagi munosabatga vositachilik qilishi aniqlandi.

en: Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions.
uz: Tushkunlik va qo'rquv emas, faqatgina halokatlashtirishning ta'sirlari haftalik qilib tuzilgan muntazam PA seanslarining sharti edi.

en: Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.
uz: Domiy faoliyat ishtirokchilariga surunkali og'riqdagi farqlar va odatiy jismoniy harakatdan noqulaylik hissini ajratib turuvchi og'riqning salbiy qabul qilinishi nuqtai-nazaridan ko'proq ko'makni talab qilindi.

en: Vision, or the ability to see depends on visual system sensory organs or eyes.
uz: Nigoh yoki ko'rish qobiliyati sezgi a'zolarining ko'rish tizimiga yoki ko'zlarga bog'liq.

en: There are many different constructions of eyes, ranging in complexity depending on the requirements of the organism.
uz: Organizm talabiga qarab, murakkabligi turlicha bo'lgan ko'zlarning xilma-xil tuzilishlari bor.

en: The different constructions have different capabilities, are sensitive to different wave-lengths and have differing degrees of acuity, also they require different processing to make sense of the input and different numbers to work optimally.
uz: Turli konstruksiyalar har xil imkoniyatga ega, har xil to'lqin uzunligiga nisbatan sezuvchan va turlicha keskinlik darajasiga ega, shu bilan birga ular kirish sezilishi uchun turlicha ishlov berish va optimal darajada ishlashi uchun turli raqamlarni talab qiladi.

en: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area.
uz: Populyatsiya berilgan geografik hudud doirasidagi ma'lum bir turlardagi organizmlar to'plamidir.

en: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic.
uz: Populatsiyaning barcha alohida vakillari aniq bir xususiyatga nisbatan bir xil bo'lgan hollarda ular monomorfik deb ataladi.

en: When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
uz: Jismoniy shaxslarda muayyan xususiyatning bir qancha variantlari namoyon bo'lsa, ular polimorfikdir.

en: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well.
uz: Chumoli koloniyalar armiyasi turli bosqichlarda ham yuradi va uya quradi.

en: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day.
uz: Ko'chish bosqichida chumolilar armiyasi tunda yuradi va kun davomida dam olish uchun to'xtashadi.

en: The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday.
uz: Mavjud oziq-ovqat kamayganida koloniya ko'chmanchilik fazasini boshlaydi. Bu faza davomida koloniya har kuni o'zgaruvchi vaqtinchalik in quradi.

en: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
uz: Mazkur ko'chmanchi g'alayon yoxud yurishlarning har biri qariyb 17 kun davom etadi.

en: What is a cell? The word cell comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning "small room", and it was first coined by a microscopist observing the structure of cork.
uz: Hujayra nima? Hujayra so'zi "kichik xona" ma'nosini anglatuvchi lotincha "cella" so'zidan olingan va birinchi marta po'kakning tuzilishini mikroskopik kuzatish orqali kashf qilingan.

en: The cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all organisms are composed of one or more cells.
uz: Hujayra barcha tirik jonzotlarning asosiy birligi hisoblanadi va barcha organizmlar bir yoki ko'proq hujayralardan tashkil topadi.

en: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life".
uz: Hayotni o'rganishda hujayralar shunchalik muhimki, ular ko'pincha "hayotning tarkibiy qismlari" deb ataladi.

en: The Nervous System maintains homeostasis by sending nerve impulses through out the body to keep the flow of blood going as well as undisturbed.
