uz: Asab tizimi uzluksiz qon oqimini ta'minlash uchun tana bo'ylab asab impulslarini yuborish orqali gomeostazni ta'minlaydi.

en: These nerve impulses can be sent so quickly throughout the body which helps keep the body safe from any potential threat.
uz: Mazkur asab impulslari tana bo'ylab nihoyatda tez yuboriladi, bu esa vujudni har qanday ehtimoliy xvafdan saqlashga yordam beradi.

en: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path.
uz: Tornadolar, boshqa kuchli bo'ronlar bilan taqqoslaganda, kichik hududga zarba beradi, ammo yo'lida uchragan har qanday narsani vayron qilishi mumkin.

en: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours.
uz: Tornadolar daraxtlarni ildizi bilan qo'porib tashlaydi, binolardan taxtalarni sug'urib oladi va avtomobillarni osmonga uchiradi. Tornadolarning eng kuchli ikki foizi uch soatdan ko'proq davom etadi.

en: These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
uz: Bu dahshatli bo'ronlarda shamolning tezligi 480 km/soatgacha (133 m/s; 300 milya/soat) yetadi.

en: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years.
uz: Insonlar ming-minglab yillar davomida kattalashtirish uchun linzalar ishlab chiqarishmoqda va foydalanib kelishmoqda.

en: However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century.
uz: Biroq birinchi haqiqiy teleskoplar Yevropada XVI asrning oxirlarida yaratildi.

en: These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.
uz: Ushbu teleskoplarda olisdagi obyektlarni yaqinroq va kattaroq ko'rsatish uchun ikkita linza kombinatsiyasidan foydalanilgan.

en: Greed and selfishness will always be with us and it is the nature of cooperation that when the majority benefit there will always be more to gain in the short term by acting selfishly
uz: Ochko'zlik va xudbinlik doimo biz bilan birga bo'ladi va hamkorlikning tabiati shuki, ko'pchilik foyda ko'radigan holatda xudbinlarcha harakat qilish qisqa muddatli istiqbolda har doim ko'proq foyda keltiradi.

en: Hopefully, most people will realise that their long term best option is to work together with others.
uz: Aksariyat kishilar ularning uzoq muddatli eng yaxshi tanlovi – bu boshqalar bilan birgalikda ishlash ekanligini anglab yetadi, deb umid qilamiz.

en: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant.
uz: Ko'pchilik odamlar boshqa yulduzlarga sayohat qila oladigan va boshqa dunyolarni o'rgana oladigan kunni orzu qilishadi, ayrim kishilar u yerlarda nimalar borligini o'ylashadi, ba'zilar esa boshqa sayyorada o'zga sayyoraliklar yoki boshqacha hayot mavjud bo'lishi mumkinligiga ishonishadi.

en: But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are "neighbors".
uz: Biroq, agar bu sodir bo'lsa ham juda uzoq muddat sodir bo'lmasa kerak. Yulduzlar shunchalik tarqoqki, "qo'shni" yulduzlar orasida trillion mil masofa mavjud.

en: Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?
uz: Ehtimol, bir kuni chevaralaringiz begona dunyo ustida turib o'z ajdodlari haqida qiziqar?

en: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.
uz: Hayvonlar ko'p hujayralardan tashkil topgan. Ular narsalarni yeydilar va ularni ichlarida hazm qiladilar. Ko'pchilik hayvonlar harakatlana oladilar.

en: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).
uz: Faqatgina jonivorlarda miya bor (garchi barcha jonivorlarda emas; masalan, meduzalarning miyasi yo'q).

en: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
uz: Hayvonlar butun yer yuzida topiladi. Ular yerni qazadi, okeanda suzadi va osmonda uchadi.

en: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.
uz: Hujayra tirik (mavjudotlar) organizmlarning eng mayda tarkibiy va funksional birligi hisoblanadi.

en: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.
uz: Hujayra so'zi kichkina xona ma'nosini bildiruvchi lotincha cella so'zidan olingan.

en: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.
uz: Agar siz tirik mavjudotlarga mikroskop ostida qarasangiz, ular kichik kvadratlar va sharlardan tashkil topganligini ko'rasiz.

en: Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope.
uz: Angliyalik biolog Robert Huk daraxt po'kagidagi kichkina kvadratchalarni mikroskop orqali kuzatdi.

en: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
uz: Ular xonalarga o'xshab ketardi. U o'lik hujayralarni kuzatgan dastlabki inson bo'ldi.

en: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.
uz: Element va birikmalar o'zgarmay bir holatdan ikkinchisiga o'tishi mumkin.

en: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.
uz: Gaz va suyuq shaklidagi azot bir xil xususiyatlarga ega. Suyuq holatdagi azot zichroq bo'lishiga qaramay bari bir molekulalari bir xil.

en: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
uz: Suv yana bir misoldir. Murakkab suv ikkita vodorod atomi va bitta kislorod atomidan tashkil topadi.

en: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.
uz: U gaz, suyuqlik yoxud qattiq jism bo'lishidan qat'i nazar, molekulyar tuzilishi bir xil.

en: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
uz: Garchi uning fizik holati o'zgarishi mumkin, shunga qaramay, kimyoviy holati shundayligicha qoladi.

en: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.
uz: Vaqt bu atrofimizni o'rab turgan, biz bajarayotgan ishlarga ta'sir qiladigan, lekin tushunish qiyin bo'lgan narsadir.

en: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.
uz: Vaqt ming yillar mobayida diniy, falsafiy hamda allomalar tarafidan tadqiq qilingan.

en: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.
uz: Biz vaqtni kelajakdan hozirgi zamon orqali o'tmishga yo'l oladigan voqealar ketma-ketligi sifatida qabul qilamiz.

en: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.
uz: Vaqt biz voqealar davomiyligini (uzunligini) qanday taqqoslashimiz hamdir.

en: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
uz: Davriy hodisaning takrorlanishini kuzatish orqali vaqtning o'tishini o'zingiz belgilashingiz mumkin. Davriy hodisa — bu muntazam ravishda qayta va qayta sodir bo'ladigan narsadir.

en: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.
uz: Bugungi kunda kompyuterlar rasmlar va videolarga ishlov berishda ishlatiladi.

en: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.
uz: Takomillashgan animatsiyalar kompyuterlarda yaratilishi mumkin hamda animatsiyaning bu turidan televizor va kinolarda tobora ko'proq foydalanilmoqda.

en: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
uz: Musiqa ko'pincha ohanglarga ishlov berish va ularni aralashtiruvchi murakkab kompyuterlardan foydalanib yoziladi.

en: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.
uz: 19 va 20-asrlarda moalar deb ataluvchi ulkan qushlarni ovlovchi Maori xalqi Yangi Zelandiyaning ilk aholisi ekanligiga uzoq vaqt ishonib kelingan.

en: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.
uz: Keyinchalik Maori odamlari Buyuk flotda Polineziyadan ko'chib kelib, Morioridan Yangi Zelandiyani tortib olgani, shu orqali qishloq xo'jaligiga asoslangan jamiyat yaratgani bilan bog'liq g'oyaga asoslangan nazariya paydo bo'ldi.

en: However, new evidence suggests that the Moriori were a group of mainland Maori who migrated from New Zealand to the Chatham Islands, developing their own distinctive, peaceful culture.
uz: Ammo yangi dalillar Moriorilarning Yangi Zelandiyadan Chatham orollariga ko'chib kelib, o'zlarining boshqalardan farqli, osoyishta madaniyatini yaratgan asosiy maorilar jamosi bo'lganligini ko'rsatadi.

en: There was also another tribe on the Chatham islands these were Maori who migrated away from New Zealand.
uz: Chatem orollarida boshqa bir qabila – Yangi Zelandiyadan ko'chib ketgan Maori qabilasi ham bor edi.

en: They called themselves the Moriori there were a few skirmishes and in the end, the Moriori were wiped out
uz: Ular o'zlarini Moriorilar deb atagan, bir nechta to'qnashuvlar bo'lgan va oxir-oqibat, Moriorilar yo'q qilingan.

en: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures.
uz: Bunda qatnashgan kishilar bir necha o'n yillar davomida qiyinchiliklar va hattoki muvaffaqiyatsizliklarni ochiq baholagan holda kuchli tomonlarimiz va ehtiroslarimizni baholashimizga yordam berdilar.

en: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.
uz: Shaxsiy, oilaviy hamda tashkiliy hikoyalari bilan o'rtoqlashuvchi kishilarni eshitish vaqtida bizda bebaho o'tmish va tashkilot madaniyatiga yaxshi yoki yomon ta'sir ko'rsatgan shaxslarning ayrimlari haqida tushuncha hosil bo'ldi.

en: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.
uz: Biror kishining tarixini tushunish madaniyatni tushunishni anglatmaydi, lekin hech bo'lmaganda kishilarga tashkilot tarixi doirasida ularning qayerga tushib qolganini his qilishga yordam beradi.

en: While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization.
uz: Muvaffaqiyatlarni baholash va xatolardan ogoh bo'lish davomida alohida shaxslar va butun qatnashuvchi shaxslar tashkilot qadriyatlari, missiyasi va harakatlantiruvchi kuchlarini yanada chuqurroq kashf qiladilar.

en: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.
uz: Ushbu holatda, oldingi tadbirkorlik xatti-harakati holatlari hamda erishilgan yutuqlarni yodga olish insonlarga yangi o'zgarishlar va mahalliy cherkovlar uchun yangi yo'nalishlarga ochiq bo'lishiga yordam berdi.

en: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.
uz: Muvaffaqiyat haqidagi bunday hikoyalar kelajakdagi o'zgarishga nisbatan ijobiy moyilliklarni yaratgan holda o'zgarishdan qo'rqish hissini kamaytirdi.

en: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.
uz: Konvergent fikrlash namunalari — bu yechim topish uchun turli xil g'oyalarni yoxud sohalarni birlashtiradigan muammoni hal qilish usulidir.

en: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.
uz: Tezkorlik, mantiq va aniqlik, shu bilan birga faktlarni aniqlash, mavjud texnikalarni qayta qo'llash, axborot yig'ish mazkur fikrlash tarzining asosiy yo'nalishidir.

en: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.
uz: Mazkur fikrlash tarzining eng muhim omili bu: faqat bitta to'g'ri javob bor. Siz faqat ikkita javob, ya'ni to'g'ri yoki noto'g'ri haqida o'ylaysiz.

en: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.
uz: Bu turdagi tafakkur muayyan bir fan yoki standart tartib-qoidalar bilan bog'liq.

en: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
uz: Bu tarzda o'ylaydigan insonlar mantiqiy tafakkurga ega bo'lib, namunalarni yodlab qolish, muammolarni yechish va ilmiy testlar ustida ishlashlari mumkin.

en: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.
uz: Insonlar boshqalarning fikrlarini o'qish bo'yicha eng qobiliyatli turlardir.

en: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.
uz: Bu bizning boshqa insonlar nimani idrok etishini, niyat qilishini, ishonishi, bilishi yoki xohlashini oldindan bashorat qila olishimizni anglatadi.

en: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.
uz: Bu qobiliyatlar orasida boshqalarning maqsadini tushunish nihoyatda muhim. Bu jismoniy harakatlarning ehtimoliy noaniqlikarini hal etish imkonini beradi.

en: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.
uz: Masalan, agar kimsa biror kimning avtomobil oynasini sindirayotganligini ko'rsangiz, siz u begonaning avtomobilini o'g'irlashga urinayotganligini taxmin qilgan bo'lardingiz.

en: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
uz: Agarda u avtomobilining kalitini yo'qotib qo'ygan bo'lsa hamda u buzib kirishga urinayotgan avtomobil o'ziniki bo'lsa, u boshqacha baholanishi kerak bo'lardi.

en: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).
uz: MRI 1930-yillarda Feliks Blok (Stenford universitetida ishlayotgan) va Edvard Pursell (Garvard universitetidan) tomonidan kashf qilingan yadro-magnit rezonansi (NMR) deb ataluvchi fizik hodisaga asoslangan.

en: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.
uz: Bu rezonansda magnit maydon hamda radio to'lqinlar atomlarning ingichka radio signallarni yuborishiga sabab bo'ladi.

en: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.
uz: 1970-yili tibbiyot shifokori hamda tadqiqotchi olim Raymond Damadian magnit-rezonans tomografiyadan tibbiy tashxis vositasi sifatida foydalanish asosini kashf etdi.

en: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.
uz: To'rt yil o'tib, MRT sohasida chiqarilgan dunyodagi ilk patent berildi.

en: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
uz: 1977-yili doktor Damadian ilk "butun tana" MRT skanerini yaratishni yakunladi hamda uni "Indomitable" deb nomladi.

en: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.
uz: Asinxron aloqa mulohaza hamda boshqalarga reaksiya bildirish uchun vaqtni beradi.

en: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.
uz: Bu talabalarga o'z sur'atida ishlash va o'quv ma'lumoti sur'atini nazorat qilish imkonini beradi.

en: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)
uz: Bundan tashqari ish soatlarini moslashtirish mumkin bo'lgani holda vaqt cheklanishlari kamroqdir. (Bremer, 1998)

en: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.
uz: Internet va Jahon tarmog'idan foydalanish ta'lim oluvchilarga ma'lumotlarni istalgan vaqtda olishlariga imkon beradi.

en: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
uz: Talabalar kunning har qanday paytida ustozlariga savol bera olishlari hamda keyingi yuzma-yuz uchrashuvni kutib o'tirgandan ko'ra, oqilona tez javoblarni kutishlari mumkin.

en: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.
uz: Postmodern ta'lim yondashuvi mutloqliklardan ozodlikni taklif qiladi. o'rganish uchun yagona yaxshi usul mavjud emas.

en: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.
uz: Aslida, o'rganish uchun bittagina yaxshi narsa mavjud emas. O'rganish taqdim etilgan bilim hamda o'rganuvchi orasidagi tajribada sodir bo'ladi.

en: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.
uz: Barcha o'z qo'lingiz bilan bajariladigan ishlar va axborot taqdim etish bilan bog'liq amaldagi tajribamiz, o'rganishga asoslangan teleko'rsatuvlar shuni ko'rsatib turibdi.

en: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.
uz: Shu tarzda, bizlarning ko'pchiligimiz o'zimiz hech qachon qatnashmaydigan yoki o'sha bilimlarni qo'llamaydigan jarayon yoki tajriba to'g'risida ma'lumot beruvchi teleko'rsatuvlarni tomosha qilyapmiz.

en: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
uz: Biz hech qachon avtomobilni kapital ta'mirlamaymiz, qadimgi xarobalarni o'rganish uchun Peruga sayohat qilmaymiz yoki qo'shnimizning uyini qayta modellashtirmaymiz.

en: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.
uz: Dengiz osti optik tolali kabel orqali Yevropaga hamda keng polosali sputnikka ulanish sababli Grenlandiyaning internetga ulanganlik darajasi yaxshi – aholining 93%i ulangan.

en: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.
uz: Mehmonxonangiz yoki mezbonlaringiz (agar uy mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolsangiz) katta ehtimol bilan Wi-Fi yoki shaxsiy kompyuterga ulangan internetga ega bo'ladi va barcha aholi manzilgohlarida internet-kafe yoki ochiq Wi-Fi tarmog'i bo'lgan joylar mavjud.

en: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.
uz: Yuqorida qayd etilganidek, "Eskimo" so'zi Qo'shma Shtatlarda maqbul so'z bo'lib qolayotgan bo'lsa-da, u ko'plab AQSHlik bo'lmagan Arktika xalqlarida, ayniqsa, Kanadada kamsituvchi so'z hisoblanadi.

en: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.
uz: Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi qo'llaydigan so'zni eshitish mumkin bo'lgani holda xorijliklar undan foydalanishdan qochishlari kerak.

en: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.
uz: Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi o'zini Kanadada Inuit, Glenlandiyada Kalaaleq (ko'plikda — Kalaallit) — grenlandiyalik deb ataydilar.

en: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."
uz: Jinoyat va chet elliklarga yomon niyatda bo'lish Grenlandiyada umuman mavjud emas. Hatto shaharlarda ham "qo'pol hududlar" yo'q.

en: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.
uz: Hoynahoy, sovuq ob-havo — tayyorgarlik ko'rmagan odamlar duch keladigan yagona haqiqiy xavfdir.

en: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.
uz: Agarda siz Grenlandiyaga sovuq mavsumlarda borsangiz (qancha shimolroqqa borsangiz, shuncha sovuq bo'lishi hisobga olinsa), yetarlicha issiq kiyimlar olib borish kerak.

en: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.
uz: Yozning juda uzun kunlari yetarli darajada uxlamaslik va ular bilan bog'liq sog'liq muammolariga olib kelishi mumkin.

en: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.
uz: Yoz davomida Nordik chivinlaridan ham ehtiyot bo'ling. Garchi hech qanday kasallik yuqtirmasa-da, ular juda g'ashingizga tegishi mumkin.

en: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.
uz: San-Fransisko iqtisodiyoti uning dunyo darajasidagi sayyohlik manzili ekanligi bilan bog'liq bo'lsa-da, uning iqtisodi xilma-xildir.

en: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.
uz: Ish bilan ta'minlovchi eng yirik sohalar professional xizmatlar, hukumat, moliya, savdo hamda turizmdir.

en: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.
uz: Musiqa, film, adabiyot va ommaviy madaniyatda ko'p aks ettirilishi shahar va uning diqqatga sazovor yerlarini dunyoga tanitishga hissa qo'shdi.

en: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.
uz: San-Fransisko ko'p sonli mehmonxonalar, restoranlar hamda yuqori darajadagi anjumanlar o'tkaziladigan inshootlardan iborat yirik turizm infratuzilmasini rivojlantirgan.

en: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
uz: San-Fransisko boshqa Osiyo oshxonalari: koreys, tay, hind hamda yapon oshxonalari uchun ham mamlakatdagi eng yaxshi joylardan biridir.

en: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.
uz: Walt Disney World parkiga sayohat qilish ko'pchilik amerikaliklar uchun katta ziyoratdek.

en: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.
uz: "An'anaviy" tashrif Orlando xalqaro aeroportiga borib qo'nish, avtobusda istirohat bog'i ichida joylashgan mehmonxonaga borish, bir haftani tashqariga chiqmasdan Disney parkida o'tkazish va uyga qaytishdan iborat.

en: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".
uz: Cheksiz xilma-xilliklar bor, biroq "Disney olamiga borish" to'g'risida gap ketganda ko'pchilik shuni nazarda tutadi.

en: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.
uz: eBay yoxud Craigslist singari auksiion veb-saytlari orqali onlayn sotiluvchi ko'p chiptalar qisman foydalaniladigan ko'p kunlik park-hopper chiptalari hisoblanadi.

en: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
uz: Bu juda keng tarqalgan ish bo'lishiga qaramay, u Disney tomonidan taqiqlangan: chiptalarni boshqalarga o'tkazib bo'lmaydi.

en: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit.
uz: Grand Kanyonda gardishi ostidagi har qanday kemping uchun chekka hudud ruxsatnomasi talab etiladi.

en: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.
uz: Kayonni himoya qilish uchun ruxsatlar cheklangan va ular boshlash oyinda to'rt oy avval, oyning 1-kuni beriladi.

en: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan.
uz: Shunday qilib, may oyidagi istalgan sanadan boshlanuvchi chekka hududlarda kemping uchun ruxsatni 1 yanvardan boshlab olish mumkin bo'ladi.

en: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.
uz: Fantom ranchosiga tutash "Yorqin farishta" lageri kabi eng mashhur hududlarda joylar odatda ular band qilinish uchun ochilgan birinchi sanadayoq olingan so'rovlar bilan to'lib qoladi.

en: There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
uz: Kirish so'rovlari uchun cheklangan miqdordagi ruxsatnomalar mavjud bo'lib, ularni kim birinchi kelsa, o'sha qo'lga kiritadi.

en: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.
uz: Janubiy Afrikaga avtomobilda kirish — mintaqaning barcha go'zalliklarini ko'rish, shuningdek, oddiy sayyohlik yo'nalishlaridan tashqari joylarga borishning ajoyib usulidir.

en: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.
uz: Buni oddiy avtomobilda yaxshi rejalashtirish orqali qilish mumkin, biroq 4x4 turidagi mashinalar yuqori darajada tavsiya qilinadi va ko'plb hududlarga faqatgina 4x4 turdagi baland g'ildiraklar bilan borish mumkin.

en: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.
uz: Reja tuzayotganda shuni yodda tutingki, Janubiy Afrika barqaror mamlakat bo'lsa-da, barcha qo'shni davlatlar ham bunday emas.

en: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.
uz: Viza talablari va chiqimlari davlatdan davlatga farq qiladi hamda sizning davlatingiz unga ta'sir qiladi.

en: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
uz: Har bir mamlakat avtomobilda qanday favqulodda yordam buyumlari bo'lishi kerakligini talab qiluvchi o'ziga xos qonunlarga ega.

en: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.
uz: Viktoriya sharsharasi — Zimbabvening g'arbiy qismida, Zambiyaning Livingstoun shahri va Botsvana yaqinidagi chegara bo'ylab joylashgan shaharchadir.

en: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.
uz: Shahar shundoqqina sharsharalar yonida joylashgan va ular asosiy diqqatga sazovor joydir, lekin bu mashhur sayyohlik manzili ham sarguzasht izlovchilarga, ham ekskursiyachilarga uzoq vaqt qolish uchun ko'plab imkoniyatlarini taqdim qiladi.

en: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.
uz: Yomg'ir mavsumida (noyabrdan martgacha) suv hamji balandroq hamda sharsharalar yanada dramatik bo'ladi.

en: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.
uz: Ko'prikdan o'tsangiz yoki sharshara yaqinidagi egri-bugri yo'laklar bo'ylab yursangiz, ho'l bo'lishingiz kafolatlanadi.

en: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
uz: Boshqa tomondan, aynan suv hajmi shu qadar baland bo'lgani tufayli mana shu butun suv asl sharsharani nigohingizdan yashiradi!

en: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.
uz: Tutanxamon maqbarasi (KV62). KV62, ehtimol, vodiydagi maqbaralarning eng mashhuri, Hovard Karter 1922-yilda kashf etgan yosh podshoh dafn etilgan deyarli buzilmagan shohona joy.

en: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.
uz: Boshqa shohlarning qabrlariga qaraganda Tutanxamon qabri ancha kichkina va bezaklarning kamligi bilan tashrif buyurishga arzimaydi.

en: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.
uz: Mumiyoni tobutdan olishga urinishlar paytida unga yetkazilgan zararni isbotlovchi dalillarni ko'rishga qiziquvchi barchaning hafsalasi pir bo'ladi, chunki ularning faqat boshi va yelkalarini ko'rish mumkin.

en: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
uz: Maqbaraning aql bovar qilmas boyliklari endi uning ichida emas, balki Qohiradagi Misr muzeyiga ko'chirilgan.

en: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
uz: Vaqti cheklangan tashrif buyuruvchilar o'z vaqtini boshqa biror yerda o'tkazgani ma'qul.

en: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.
uz: Pnon Krom Siem Reapdan 12 km janubi-g'arbda. Mazkur tepalikdagi ibodatxona 9-asr oxirida, qirol Yasovorman davrida qurilgan.

en: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.
uz: Ibodatxonaning g'amgin muhiti va Tonlesap ko'li manzarasi tepalikka chiqishga arziydi.

en: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.
uz: Mazkur manzilga tashrif ko'lga qayiqdagi safar bilan qulay ravishda umumlashtirilishi mumkin.

en: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
uz: Ibodatxonaga kirish uchun Angkor chiptasi kerak, shu sababli Tonlesapga borishda pasportingizni o'zingiz bilan olib kelishni unutmang.

en: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.
uz: Quddus Isroilning eng katta shahri hamda poytaxti sanaladi, biroq aksariyat boshqa davlatlar hamda Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti bu shaharni Isroil poytaxti sifatida tan olmaydi.

en: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.
uz: Yahudiy tog'laridagi qadimiy shahar minglab yillarni qamrab olgan maftunkor tarixga ega.

en: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.
uz: Shahar uch yakkaxudolik dinlari — yahudiylik, xristianlik hamda islom dinlari uchun muqaddas sanaladi va ma'naviy, diniy, madaniy markaz sifatida xizmat qiladi.

en: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.
uz: Shaharning diniy ahamiyatga egaligi, xususan, Eski shaharning ko'plab diqqatga sazovor joylari sababli Quddus Isroilning asosiy sayyohlik manzillaridan biridir.

en: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
uz: Quddusda jo'shqin hamda gavjum savdo do'konlar, kafelar va restoranlar bilan birga, ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik hamda madaniy joylar ham bor.

en: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.
uz: Ekvador Kuba fuqarolaridan xalqaro aeroportlar hamda chegaradagi kirish nuqtalari orqali kirishdan avval taklif xati olishni talab qiladi.

en: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.
uz: Mazkur maktub Ekvador Tashqi ishlar vazirligi tomonidan qonuniylashtirilishi hamda muayyan talablarga mos bo'lishi lozim.

en: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.
uz: Mazkur talablar ikki davlat o'rtasida tartibli migratsiya oqimini ta'minlashga mo'ljallangan.

en: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.
uz: AQSH grin kartasiga ega Kuba fuqarolari bu talabdan ozod bo'lish uchun Ekvador konsulligiga borishlari kerak.

en: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
uz: Pasportingiz sayohat sanalaridan keyin kamida 6 oy davomida yaroqli boʻlishi lozim. Borish-kelish/davom etish chiptasi qoladigan vaqtingiz davomiyligini tasdiqlashi kerak.

en: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.
uz: Kattaroq guruhlar uchun sayohatlar arzonroq, shu sababli o'zingiz yoki faqat bir nafar do'stingiz bilan bo'lsangiz, boshqa odamlar bilan tanishib, odam boshiga to'g'ri keluvchi narx yaxshiroq bo'lishi uchun to'rt-olti kishilik guruh tuzishga harakat qiling.

en: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.
uz: Lekin bu aslida sizni bezovta qilmasligi kerak, chunki sayyohlar mashinalarni to'ldirish uchun ko'pincha aralashib ketadi.

en: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
uz: Bu ko'proq odamlarni ko'proq to'lashlari kerakligiga ishontirish usuliga o'xshaydi.

en: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.
uz: Machu-Pikchuning shimoliy uchidan tepaga ko'tarilgan mazkur tik tog' ko'p hollarda vayronalarning ko'plab suratlariga fon bo'ladi.

en: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.
uz: Bu pastdan bir oz vahimali ko'rinadi va tik hamda mashaqqatli ko'tarilishdir, ammo bardam odamlar buni deyarli 45 daqiqada bosib o'tishlari kerak.

en: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.
uz: Yo'lning katta qismiga tosh zinalar yotqizilgan va qiyaroq bo'limlarida po'lat kabellar tayanch bo'luvchi tutqich vazifasini bajaradi.

en: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.
uz: Shunday bo'lsa-da, nafasingiz tiqilib qolishi mumkinligini hisobga oling va tikroq qismlarda, ayniqsa, yog'ingarchilik payti ehtiyot bo'ling, chunki tezda yurish xavfli bo'lib qolishi mumkin.

en: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
uz: Yuqorida kichik g'or bo'lib, u orqali o'tish lozim, u juda past va anchagina tor.

en: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.
uz: 1835-yilda Charliz Darvin qilgani singari, Galapagosning yovvoyi hayoti va diqqatga sazovor joylarini tomosha qilish qayiqda ajoyib tarzda amalga oshiriladi.

en: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.
uz: Galapagos suvlarida 8 nafardan 100 nafargacha yo'lovchi sig'imiga ega bo'lgan 60 dan ortiq kruiz kemalari qatnaydi.

en: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).
uz: Ko'pchilik odamlar o'z joylarini oldindan band qiladilar (chunki mavsum cho'qqisiga chiqqanda qayiqlar to'lgan bo'ladi).

en: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.
uz: Siz buyurtma qilgan agent turli-tuman kemalar haqida yaxshi bilimga ega Galapagos mutaxassisi ekaniga ishonch hosil qiling.

en: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
uz: Bu sizning alohida qiziqishlaringiz va/yoki cheklovlaringiz ularga eng mos bo'lgan kema bilan mutanosib bo'lishini ta'minlaydi.

en: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.
uz: 16-asrda ispanlar kelishidan oldin shimoliy Chili Inka hukmronligi ostida bo'lgan, Araukanlar (Mapuche) esa markaziy va Janubiy Chilida istiqomat qilgan.

en: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.
uz: Mapuche Chili mustaqillikka erishguniga qadar ispancha gaplashuvchi boshqaruvga butunlay singib ketmagan oxirgi amerika tub aholisi guruhlaridan biri ham edi.

en: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
uz: Chili 1810-yilda mustaqilligini e'lon qilganiga qaramay (Napaleon urushlari Ispaniyani bir necha yil davomida markaziy hukumat boshqaruvisiz qoldirilgan), 1818-yilgacha ispanlar ustidan hal qiluvchi g'alabaga erishilmadi.

en: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti
uz: Dominikan Respublikasi (ispanchada: Republica Dominicana) – Gaiti bilan bo'lib olingan Hispaniola orolining sharqiy qismini egallab turuvchi Karib dengizi mamlakatidir.

en: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
uz: Oq qumli plyajlar va tog' landshaftlaridan tashqari, mamlakatda hozirda Santo Domingoning bir qismi bo'lgan Amerikadagi eng qadimiy Yevropa shahri joylashgan.

en: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
uz: Orolda dastlab taynoslar va kariblar yashashgan. Kariblar arakakan tilida so'zlashuvchi, miloddan 10 000 yil avval kelgan odamlar bo'lgan.

en: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
uz: Yevropalik tadqiqotchilar kelganidan so'ng o'tgan kichik muddat davomida Taynos aholisi ispan bosqinchilari tomonidan sezilarli darajada qirib tashlangan.

en: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
uz: Ispan mustamlakachilari Frey Bartolome de las Casasga (Tratado de las Indias) joylashgan holda 1492–1498-yillar oralig'ida 100 mingga yaqin taynoslarni o'ldirdilar.

en: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
uz: Jardin de la Union. Mazkur joy 17-asr monastiri uchun atrium sifatida bunyod etilgan bo'lib, undagi Templo de San Diego omon qolgan yagona imoratdir.

en: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
uz: U hozir markaziy maydon sifatida xizmat qiladi va unda tunu-kun doimo juda ko'p narsalar o'tkaziladi.

en: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
uz: Bog' atrofida bir qator restoranlar mavjud bo'lib, tushdan so'ng va kechki paytlarda ko'pincha markaziy ayvonda tekin konsertlar beriladi.

en: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
uz: Callejon del Beso (o'pish hiyoboni). Atigi 69 santimetr ajratib turuvchi ikki balkon muhabbat haqidagi eski afsona makonidir.

en: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
uz: Ayrim bolalar ozgina chaqa uchun sizga bu voqeani aytib berishadi.

en: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
uz: Bouen oroli qayiqda suzish, piyoda yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar kabilarni taklif qiluvchi ommabop kunlik sayohat va dam olish kunlaridagi sayohat maskani.

en: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
uz: Bu asl hamjamiyat Vankuver yaqinidagi Xau-Saundda joylashgan va unga Vankuver markazidagi Granvil orolidan jadval bo'yicha jo'naydigan suv taksilari yordamida osonlik bilan yetib olish mumkin.

en: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
uz: Ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotlardan zavqlanadiganlar uchun Dengizdan osmongacha yo'lagi bo'ylab sayr juda muhimdir.

en: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
uz: Vistler (Vankuverdan 1,5 soatlik yo'l) qimmat, biroq 2010-yilgi Qishki olimpiada tufayli mashhur bo'lgan shahardir.

en: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
uz: Qishda Shimoliy Amerikadagi eng yaxshi chang'i uchish tajribasidan zavqlaning, yozda esa haqiqiy tog'da velosiped uchish mashg'ulotini sinab ko'ring.

en: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
uz: Ruxsatnomalarga avvaldan buyurtma berilishi kerak. Sirenada tunash uchun rusxatnomaga ega bo'lishingiz kerak.

en: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
uz: Sirena lagerdan tashqari yotoqxona turar joyi va issiq taomlar taklif qiladigan yagona qo'riqchi stansiyadir. La Leona, San Pedrolla, Los Patos faqat oziq-ovqat xizmatlari bo'lmagan lagerlarni taklif qiladi.

en: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
uz: Park-ruxsatnomalarini bevosita Renjer bekatidan qo'lga kiritish mumkin, lekin ular kredit kartalarni qabul qilmaydi.

en: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
uz: Park xizmati (MINAE) kutilgan yetib kelishdan bir oydan ko'proq vaqtga park ruxsatlarini bermaydi.

en: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
uz: CafeNet El Sol 30 AQSH dollari yoki bir kunlik o'tishlar uchun 10 dollar evaziga buyurtma qilish xizmatini taklif qiladi; tafsilotlar ularning Corcovadi sahifasida.

en: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
uz: Kuk orollari Janubiy Tinch okeani o'rtasida, Polineziyada joylashgan bo'lib, Yangi Zelandiya bilan erkin birlashmadagi orol davlatdir.

en: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
uz: Bu okeanda 2,2 million km2 dan ko'proq hududga cho'zilgan 15 ta oroldan iborat arxipelag.

en: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".
uz: Gavayi bilan bir xil vaqt zonasidagi mintaqalar bilan orollar haqida ba'zida "Gavayi tagida" deya o'ylashadi.

en: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.
uz: Kichikroq bo'lsa-da, u Gavayining ayrim keksa tashrifchilariga turistlar uchun katta mehmonxonalari va boshqa rivojlanish obyektlari bo'lmagan davlatchilikdan avvalgi holatni eslatadi.

en: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
uz: Kuk orollarida birorta ham shahar yo'q, biroq ular 15 ta turli orollardan tashkil topgan. Asosiylari Rarotonga va Aitutaki orollaridir.

en: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.
uz: Hozirda rivojlangan davlatlarda lyuks to'shak hamda nonushta bilan ta'minlash san'at darajasiga yetgan.

en: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.
uz: Alal-oqibat, B&B lar asosan ikki asosiy narsa: yotoq va nonushta orqali raqobatlasha oladi.

en: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.
uz: Mos ravishda, eng yaxshi shunday muassasalarda eng serhasham ko'rpa-to'shaklarni, ehtimol, qo'lda ishlangan choyshab yoki antiqa yotoqni topish mumkin.

en: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.
uz: Nonushta mintaqaning mavsumiy lazzatli shirinliklarini yoxud mezbonning maxsus ovqatini o'z ichiga olishi mumkin.

en: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
uz: Bu joy antiqa jihozlar, tekislangan maydonlar va suzish havzasiga ega tarixiy eski bino bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
uz: O'z avtomobilingizga o'tirish hamda olis safarga yo'l olish oddiyligi bilan o'ziga xos jozibaga ega.

en: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
uz: Kattaroq transport vositalaridan farqli ravishda, avtomobilingizni haydash tartibi bilan, hoynahoy, allaqachon tanishsiz va uning cheklovlarini bilasiz.

en: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
uz: Xususiy mulk yoki har qanday kattalikdagi shaharchada chodir qurish osongina istalmagan diqqatni jalb qilishi mumkin.

en: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
uz: Qisqa qilib aytganda, o'z mashinangizdan foydalanish safarga chiqishning ajoyib usuli, biroq kamdan-kam hollarda uning o'zini "chodir" qilish mumkin.

en: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
uz: Agar sizda yotish uchun joylari bo'lgan katta miniven, SUV, sedan yoki unversal avtomobil bo'lsa, avtomobilda kemping qilishingiz mumkin.

en: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
uz: Ayrim mehmonxonalarda bug' temir yo'llari hamda okean laynerlari oltin davridan qolgan meros mavjud; Ikkinchi jahon urushidan avval, 19 yoki 20-asr boshlaridagi.

en: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
uz: Mazkur hostellar o'sha davrning boy va mashhur kishilari joylashadigan joy bo'lib, ko'pincha yaxshi tamaddixonalar hamda tungi hayotga ega bo'lardi.

en: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
uz: Eskicha uslubdagi furnitura, eng so'ngi qulayliklarning yo'qligi va qandaydir nafis qarilik ham ularning xususiyatlaridandir.

en: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
uz: Odatda xususiy mulk bo'lsa-da, ularga ba'zida tashrif buyuruvchi davlat rahbarlari va yuqori lavozimli amaldorlar joylashadi.

en: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
uz: g'aram-g'aram puli bor sayyoh mazkur mehmonxonalarning ko'pida to'xtab-to'xtab, dunyo bo'ylab parvozni amalga oshirish haqida o'ylab ko'rishi mumkin.

en: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
uz: Mehmondo'stlik almashinuvi tarmog'i sayyohlarni ular bormoqchi bo'lgan shaharlardagi tub aholi bilan bog'lovchi tashkilot hisoblanadi.

en: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
uz: Bu kabi tarmoqqa qo'shilish odatda shunchaki onlayn shaklni to'ldirishni talab etadi; garchi ayrim tarmoqlar qo'shimcha tekshirishni taklif yoki talab qilsa ham.

en: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
uz: Mavjud mezbonlar ro'yxati bosma va/yoki onlayn shaklda, ba'zida boshqa sayyohlarning tavsiyalari va sharhlari bilan birga beriladi.

en: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
uz: Couchsurfing 2004-yilning yanvar oyida kompyuter dasturchisi Keysi Fenton Islandiyaga arzon reys topib, tunab qolishga joy topa olmaganidan keyin tashkil qilingan.

en: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
uz: U mahalliy universitetdagi talabalarga elektron pochta orqali xat yubordi va bepul turar joy uchun nihoyatda ko'p takliflar qabul qildi.

en: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
uz: Hostellar birinchi navbatda yoshlarga — odatda yigirma yoshlarda bo'lgan mehmonlarga xizmat ko'rsatadi, lekin u yerda ko'pincha keksa sayohatchilarni ham uchratishingiz mumkin.

en: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
uz: Bolali oilalarni kamdan-kam hollarda ko'rish mumkin, lekin ayrim hostellar ularning shaxsiy xonalarda qolishiga ruxsat beradi.

en: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
uz: Xotiyning Pekin shahri 2022-yildagi Qishki olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qiladi, bu esa uni ham yozgi, ham qishki Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgan birinchi shaharga aylantiradi.

en: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
uz: Pekin ochilish va yopilish marosimlari va usti yopiq arenalardagi muz ustidagi musobaqalarga mezbonlik qiladi.

en: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
uz: Boshqa chang'i tadbirlari Pekindan taxminan 220 km (140 mil) uzoqlikdagi Zangjiakouda joylashgan Taizicheng chang'i hududida bo'lib o'tadi.

en: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
uz: Ko'pchilik ibodatxonalarda noyabr oyidan boshlab may oyining o'rtalarigacha davom etadigan, har bir ibodatxonaning yillik taqvimiga ko'ra o'zgarib turadigan Yillik festival bor.

en: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
uz: Ibodatxona bayramlarining ko'pchiligi ibotxonaning har yilgi yoki boshchilik qiluvchi ma'budning tug'ilgan kuni yoki ibodatxona bilan bog'liq bo'lgan boshqa katta tadbir sifatida nishonlanadi.

en: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
uz: Keralaning ibodatxona festivallarini ko'rish juda qiziqarli, ularda bezatilgan fillarning muntazam tantanali yurishi, ibodatxona orkestri va boshqa tantanalar bo'ladi.

en: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
uz: Jahon yarmarkasi (odatda Butunjahon ko'rgazmasi yoki, shunchaki Ekspo deb ataladi) — bu yirik xalqaro san'at va fan festivalidir.

en: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
uz: Ishtirokchi davlatlar dunyo muammolari yoxud o'z davlatlari madaniyati hamda tarixini namoyish etish uchun milliy pavilionlarda san'at va ma'rifiy ko'rgazmalarni taqdim etadilar.

en: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
uz: Xalqaro bog'dorchilik ko'rgazmalari — gul ko'rgazmalari, botanik bog'lar va o'simliklar bilan bog'liq boshqa narsalarni namoyish etuvchi ixtisoslashgan tadbirlardir.

en: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
uz: Nazariy jihatdan (agar turli mamlakatlarda bo'lsa) ular har yili o'tkazilishi mumkin esa-da, amalda bunday emas.

en: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
uz: Bu tadbirlar odatda uch oydan olti oygacha davom etadi hamda ular 50 gektardan kam bo'lmagan maydonlarda o'tkaziladi.

en: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
uz: Yillar davomida foydalanib kelingan ko'plab turli kinoplyonka formatlari mavjud. Standart 35 mm li kinoplyonka (36 ga 24 mm li negativ) juda keng tarqalgan.

en: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
uz: Agar tugab qolsa, uni ancha oson to'ldirish mumkin va u joriy DSLR ga taxminan mos keladigan tasvir aniqligini beradi.

en: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
uz: Ayrim o'rta formatdagi kameralar 6 ga 6 sm, aniqrog'i, 56 ga 56 mm salbiy formatdan foydalanadi.

en: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
uz: Bu 35 mm salbiy o'lcham (3136 mm² ga 864) dan ko'ra qariyb to'rt baravar yuqori o'lchamni beradi.

en: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
uz: Yovvoyi tabiat suratkash uchun eng qiyin mavzular sirasiga kiradi hamda unga omad, sabr, tajriba va yaxshi uskunalar kombinatsiyasi kerak bo'ladi.

en: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
uz: Yovvoyi tabiat fotosuratlari ko'p hollarda oddiy narsa sifatida qabul qilinadi, biroq umumiy fotosuratlarga o'xshab, bu rasm ham minglab ta'rifga arziydi.

en: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
uz: Yovvoyi tabiat suratkashligi ko'pincha uzun telefoto obyektiv talab qiladi, lekin qushlar galasi yoki mayda jonzot kabi narsalarga boshqa obyektivlar kerak.

en: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
uz: Ko'plab ekzotik jonivorlarni topish mushkul va ayrim hollarda xiyobonlarda tijoriy maqsadda suratga olish qoidalari bor.

en: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
uz: Yovvoyi hayvonlar tortinchoq yoki tajovuzkor bo'lishi mumkin. Muhit sovuq, issiq yoxud boshqacha tarzda noqulay bo'lishi mumkin.

en: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
uz: Dunyoda 5000 dan ortiq turli tillar mavjud, jumladan, ularning yigirmadan ortig'i 50 million yoki undan ko'p so'zlashuvchiga ega.

en: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
uz: Og'zaki so'zlarga qaraganda yozilgan so'zlarni tushunish osonroq hamdir. Bu, ayniqsa, tushunarli talaffuz qilish ko'p hollarda mushkul bo'lgan holatlarga taalluqli.

en: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
uz: Ko'pgina xalqlar ingliz tilida ravon gapiradi va hatto siz yanada cheklangan bilimni kutishingiz mumkin — ayniqsa, yoshlar orasida.

en: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
uz: Agar istasangiz, mankunianlik, bostonlik, yamaykalik va sidneylikning Torontodagi restoranda kechki ovqat tanovul qilib stol atrofida o'tirishganini tasavvur qiling.

en: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
uz: Ular o'zlarining o'ziga xos talaffuzi va mahalliy jargonlarida aytilgan o'z shaharlaridagi hikoyalar bilan bir-birlarini xursand qilmoqdalar.

en: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
uz: Oziq-ovqatlarni supermarketlarda xariq qilish odatda ovqatlanish uchun eng arzon usuldir. Pishirish imkoniyatlarisiz, tanlov faqat tayyor oziq-ovqatlar bilan cheklanadi.

en: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
uz: Tobora ko'proq supermarketlar yanada xilma-xil tayyor ovqatlar bo'limiga ega bo'lmoqda. Ba'zilari hatto ovqatni isitish uchun mikroto'lqinli pech yoki boshqa vositalarni taqdim qilishmoqda.

en: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
uz: Ayrim davlatlarda yoki do'kon turlarida ko'pincha norasmiy bo'lgan kamida bitta hamyonbop restoran bor.

en: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
uz: Sug'urta polisingiz va sug'urta qiluvchingizning kontakt ma'lumotlaridan nusxa olib, o'zingiz bilan olib keling.

en: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
uz: Ular maslahat/avtorizatsiyalar va shikoyatlar uchun sug'urtalovchining elektron pochta manzili va xalqaro telefon raqamlarini ko'rsatishi kerak.

en: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
uz: Boshqa nusxasini yuk sumkangiz va internetda (ilova qilib elektron pochtangizga yuboring yoki "bulut"da) saqlang.

en: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
uz: Agar noutbuk yoki planshet bilan sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, uning xotirasi yoki diskining nusxasini saqlab qo'ying (internetsiz kirish mumkin).

en: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
uz: Shuningdek, yordam berishga tayyor sayohatdagi sheriklaringiz hamda yurtingizdagi qarindoshlaringiz yoki do'stlaringizga sug'urta polisi/kontakt nusxalarini bering.

en: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
uz: Loslar (elk deb ham ataladi) tabiatan tajovuzkor emas, ammo biror xatar sezsa, o'zini himoya qiladi.

en: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
uz: Insonlar losga ehtimoliy xavfli hayvon sifatida qaramasa, ular juda yaqin borishlari hamda o'zlarini xavf ostiga qo'yishlari mumkin.

en: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
uz: Alkogolli ichimliklarni me'yorida iching. Alkogol turli odamlarga turlicha ta'sir qiladi va me'yoringizni bilish juda muhimdir.

en: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
uz: Haddan ortiq ichkilikbozlik tufayli yuzaga keladigan sog'liqqa oid uzoq muddatli oqibatlar jigarning shikastlanishi va hatto ko'rlik va o'limni ham o'z ichiga olishi mumkin. Noqonuniy ishlab chiqarilgan spirtli ichimliklar iste'mol qilinganda, ehtimoliy xavf ortadi.

en: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
uz: Noqonuniy spirtli ichimliklar xavfli aralashmalar, jumladan, hatto kichik dozasi ham ko'rlikka yoki o'limga sabab bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan metanolni o'z ichiga oladi.

en: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
uz: Ko'zoynaklar xorijiy, ayniqsa, maoshlari past bo'lgan mamlakatlarda arzonroq bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
uz: Ayniqsa, sug'urta qoplaydigan bo'lsa, uyda ko'zingizni ko'rikdan o'tkazish va topshirish uchun shifokor tavsiyasini olib borish haqida o'ylab ko'ring.

en: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
uz: Bu kabi joylarda mavjud bo'lgan yuqori sifatli brend romlaring ikkita muammosi bo'lishi mumkin; ularning ba'zilari qalbaki bo'lishi va import qilingan haqiqiylari uydagidan ko'ra qimmatroq bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
uz: Qahva dunyodagi eng ko'p sotiladigan mahsulotlardan biri bo'lib, hoynahoy, siz o'z mintaqangizda uning ko'p turlarini topishingiz mumkin.

en: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
uz: Shunga qaramay, dunyo bo'ylab qahva ichishning sinab ko'rishga arzigulik turli xil usullari mavjud.

en: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
uz: Kanyoning (yoki: kanyonering) — bu quruq yoki suv to'la dara tubidan o'tish.

en: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
uz: Kanyoning o'zida suzish, toqqa chiqish va sakrash elementlarini birlashtiradi — lekin boshlash uchun nisbatan kam tayyorgarlik yoki jismoniy bardamlikni talab qiladi (masalan, toqqa chiqish, akvalang yordamida suv ostida suzish yoki tog' chang'isi bilan taqqoslaganda).

en: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
uz: Piyoda yurish — ko'pincha piyoda safar qilish yoki tabiat qo'ynida sayr qilishdan iborat ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotdir.

en: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
uz: Kunduzgi piyoda sayohat bir mildan kamroq masofadan tortib bir kunda bosib o'tish mumkin bo'lgan uzoqroq masofalarni qamrab oladi.

en: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
uz: Oson yo'lda bir kunlik piyoda sayr uchun bir oz tayyorgarlik talab qilinadi hamda har qanday o'rtacha sog'lom odam undan zavqlana oladi.

en: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
uz: Yoshi kichik bolalari bor oilalar ko'proq tayyorgarlik ko'rishi kerak bo'lishi mumkin, ammo chaqaloq va bog'cha yoshidagi bolalar bilan ham ochiq havoda kun oson o'tishi mumkin.

en: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
uz: Xalqaro miqyosda 200 ga yaqin ishlab turgan sayyohlik tashkilotlari bor. Ularning aksariyati mustaqil faoliyat yuritadi.

en: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
uz: "Global yugurish turlari" vorisi — "Yugurishga chiq turlari" to'rt qit'ada o'nlab tomoshaviy yugurish provayderlarini birlashtiradi.

en: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
uz: Ildizi Barselonaning "Barselona yugurish turlari" va Kopengagenning "Kopengagenda yugurish" iga borib taqalgan, tez orada unga Pragada joylashgan "Praga yugurish turlari" va boshqalar qo'shildi.

en: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
uz: Sayohat qilgan vaqtingizda va undan oldin inobatga olishingiz shart bo'lgan ko'plab narsalar mavjud.

en: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
uz: Sayohat qilganingizda, narsalarning "uyingizdagidek" bo'lib chiqmasligini kuting. Xulq, qonunchilik, oziq-ovqat, tirbandlik, turar joy, standartlar, til va boshqalar siz istiqomat qiladigan yerdan ma'lum darajada farq qiladi.

en: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
uz: Buni hafsalangiz pir bo'lmasligi uchun yoki ehtimol, ishlarni bajarishning mahalliy usullaridan jirkanmaslik uchun doim yodda tutishingiz kerak.

en: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
uz: Sayyohlik agentliklari 19-asrdan buyon mavjud. Sayohat agenti odatda sayyohning tabiat, madaniyat, til yoki rivojlanmagan davlatlarga tashrif bo'yicha avvalgi tajribalaridan tashqarida bo'lgan sayohat uchun yaxshi tanlovdir.

en: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
uz: Garchi aksariyat agentliklar eng odatiy buyurtmalarni olishga tayyor bo'lsa ham, ko'p agentlar sayohatning ayrim turlari, ma'lum miqdordagi byudjet yoki belgilangan manzillarga ixtisoslashgan.

en: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
uz: Aksar hollarda siznikiga o'xshagan sayohatlarni bron qiladigan agentdan foydalanish yaxshiroq bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
uz: Xoh veb-sayt, xoh do'kon peshtaxtasida bo'lsin, agent qanday sayohatlarni reklama qilayotganini ko'rib chiqing.

en: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
uz: Agar siz dunyoni zarurat, yashash tarzi yoki qiyinchilik sababli arzon yo'l bilan ko'rishni istasangiz buni qilishning ayrim usullari mavjud.

en: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
uz: Ular asosan ikki toifaga bo'linadi: Yoki sayohat vaqtida ishlaysiz, yoki xarajatlaringizni cheklashga urinib ko'rasiz. Ushbu maqola keyingisi haqida.

en: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
uz: Chiqimlarni nolga yaqin darajada kamaytirish maqsadida qulaylik, vaqt hamda bashorat qilish qobiliyatini qurbon qilmoqchi bo'lganlar uchun minimal byudjetli sayohatga qarang.

en: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
uz: Maslahatga ko'ra, sayyohlar o'g'irlik qilmaydi, mulkiy daxlsizlikni buzmaydi, noqonuniy savdoda ishtirok etmaydi, tilanchilik qilmaydi yoki boshqacha shaklda boshqa kishilardan o'z manfaatlari yo'lida foydalanmaydi, deb ishoniladi.

en: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
uz: Immigratsiya punkti odatda samolyot, kema yoki boshqa transport vositasidan tushishdagi dastlabki to'xtatish joyidir.

en: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
uz: Ba'zi transchegaraviy poyezdlarda tekshiruvlar harakatlanayotgan poyezdda amalga oshiriladi va ushbu poyezdlardan biriga chiqayotganingizda yoningizda shaxsni tasdiqlovchi yaroqli hujjatingiz bo'lishi kerak.

en: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
uz: Yotoq poyezdlarda uyqungiz buzilmasligi uchun pasportlar konduktor tomonidan yig'ib olinishi mumkin.

en: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
uz: Ro'yxatdan o'tish viza olish jarayonidagi qo'shimcha talabdir. Ayrim davlatlarda siz mahalliy hokimiyat organlarida o'sha yerda ekaningiz hamda yashash manzilingizni ro'yxatdan o'tkazishingiz lozim.

en: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
uz: Buning uchun shaklni mahalliy politsiya punktlarida to'ldirish yoki immigratsiya idoralariga tashrif buyurish talab etilishi mumkin.

en: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
uz: Shunday qonunga ega ko'plab davlatlarda, roʻyxatdan oʻtkazish ishlarini mahalliy mehmonxonalar amalga oshiradilar (albatta, so'rab oling).

en: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
uz: Boshqa holatlarda, faqat sayyohlik turar joylaridan tashqarida qolayotganlar ro'yxatdan o'tishi kerak. Lekin qonunni yanada noaniqlashtiradi, shu sababli oldindan bilib oling.

en: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
uz: Arxitektura binolarni loyihalashtirish va qurishdan iborat. Joy arxitekturasi ko'pincha o'ziga xos sayyohlik manzili hisoblanadi.

en: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
uz: Ko'pgina binolar tomosha qilish uchun juda chiroyli va baland binolar yoki oqilona joylashtirilgan derazasidan ko'rinadigan manzarani tomosha qilish go'zal bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
uz: Me'morchilik shaharsozlik, qurilish muhandisligi, bezash san'ati, interyer dizayni hamda landshaft dizayni singari boshqa sohalar bilan sezilarli darajada mosdir.

en: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
uz: Ko'plab pueblolarning qanchalik uzoq masofada ekanligini inobatga olsak, siz Albukerke yoki Santa Fega sayohat qilmasdan turib, tungi hayotning sezilarli qismini topa olmaysiz.

en: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
uz: Lekin yuqorida sanalgan qariyb barcha kazinolar ichimliklar taklif qiladi va ularning ba'zilari o'yin-kulgi brendlarini vujudga keltiradi (asosan, Alkuberka va Santa-Fe atrofida joylashgan katta kazinolar).

en: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
uz: Ogoh bo'ling: bu yerdagi kichik shahar barlari shtatlik bo'lmagan tashrif buyuruvchilar aylanishi uchun har doim ham yaxshi joylar emas.

en: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
uz: Bir tomondan, shimoliy Nyu-Meksikoda mast holda transport vositalarini boshqarish bilan bog'liq anchagina muammolar bor va kichik shahar barlari yaqinida mast haydovchilar soni ko'p.

en: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
uz: Xush ko'rilmaydigan devoriy tasvirlar va aji-buji yozuvlar grafiti sifatida tanilgan.

en: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
uz: Zamonaviy hodisadan uzoq bo'lsa-da, aksariyat odamlar, ehtimol, buni sepma bo'yoqlar yordamida jamoatchilik va xususiy mulkka zarar yetkazuvchi yoshlar bilan bog'laydi.

en: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
uz: Ammo bugungi kunda taniqli grafiti musavvirlari, grafiti tadbirlar va "qonuniy" devorlar bor. Mazkur kontekstdagi grafiti suratlari ko'pincha tushunarsiz teglarga emas, balki san'at asarlariga o'xshaydi.

en: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
uz: Bumerang uloqtirish — ko'plab sayyohlar o'rganishni xohlaydigan ommabop ko'nikmadir.

en: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
uz: Agarda qo'lingizga qaytib keluvchi bumerangni otishni o'rganmoqchi bo'lsangiz, qaytishi uchun mos bumerangga egaligingizga ishonch hosil qiling.

en: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
uz: Avstraliyada mavjud bo'lgan bumeranglar aslida qaytib kelmaydigan bo'ladi. Boshlovchilar uni shamolda uloqtirmaslikka harakat qilgan yaxshi.

en: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
uz: Xangi taomi yerdagi qaynoq chuqurda pishiriladi.

en: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
uz: O'ra olovdan qizigan issiq toshlar bilan isiydi yoki ayrim joylarda geotermal issiqlik yer maydonlarini tabiiy isitadi.

en: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
uz: Hangi ko'pincha odatiy qovurilgan uslubdagi kechki ovqatni pishirishda foydalaniladi.

en: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
uz: Rotoruadagi bir nechta joylar gerotermal xangini taqdim etadi, qolgan xangilarni Vellingtondagi Krayschyorchda va boshqa joylarda tatib ko'rish mumkin.

en: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
uz: MetroRail Keyptaun atrofida qatnovchi poyezdlarning ikki sinfiga ega: MetroPlus (Birinchi sinf deb ham ataladi) va Metro (Uchinchi sinf deb ham ataladi).

en: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
uz: MetroPlus yanada qulay va u qadar tiqilinch emas, lekin bir oz qimmatroq, shunga qaramay, Yevropadagi odatiy metro chiptalaridan arzonroq.

en: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
uz: Poyezdlarning har biriga MetroPlus va Metro vagonlari ulangan bo'lib, MetroPlus vagonlari doimo Keyptaun tomon eng yaqin poyezdning oxiriga joylashtiriladi.

en: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
uz: Boshqalarning yukini ko'tarish — Hech qachon, ayniqsa, xalqaro chegaralarni kesib o'tish vaqtida sumkalaringizni ko'zdan qochirmang.

en: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
uz: o'zingiz bilmagan holda sizdan giyohvand moddalar tashuvchisi sifatida foydalanishayotganini tushunib yetasiz, bu siz uchun katta muammolar keltirib chiqaradi.

en: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
uz: Bu navbat kutishni ham o'z ichiga oladi, chunki narkotik moddalarni izlovchi itlardan istalgan paytda ogohlantirishlarsiz foydalanilishi mumkin.

en: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
uz: Ayrim mamlakatlarda xattoki birinchi marta jinoyat qilganlik uchun ham o'ta shafqatsiz jazolar, jumladan 10 yildan ortiq vaqtga ozodlikdan mahrum qilish yoki o'lim jazosi tayinlanadi.

en: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
uz: Qarovsiz qolgan sumkalar o'g'irlik uchun nishondir hamda bomba xavflaridan ehtiyotkor mutasaddilar e'tiborini jalb qilishi ham mumkin.

en: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
uz: Uyda mahalliy mikroblarning doimiy ta'siri tufayli sizda ularga qarshi immunitetingiz borligi ehtimoli yuqori.

en: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
uz: Dunyoning bakteriologik fauna siz uchun yangilik bo'lgan boshqa hududlarida muammolarga ro'baro' kelishingiz ehtimoli ancha yuqori.

en: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
uz: Shuningdek, iliqroq iqlim sharoitida bakteriya ham tezroq o'sadi, ham tanadan tashqarida uzoqroq yashab qoladi.

en: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
uz: Shu tarzda Deli Belli balosi, Fir'avn la'nati, Montezuma qasosi va ularning ko'plab do'stlari.

en: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
uz: Sovuq iqlim sharoitlaridagi xuddi nafas olish bilan bog'liq muammolar kabi, issiq iqlim sharoitlarida ichak muammolari ancha keng tarqalgan hamda aksariyat holatlarda aniq bezovta qiladi, lekin u qadar xavfli emas.

en: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
uz: Agar rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki dunyoning yangi burchagiga ilk marta sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, madaniy shok ehtimolini past baholamang.

en: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
uz: Ko'plab sabotli, layoqatli sayyohlar ko'pgina kichik madaniy o'zgarishlar tezda to'planib qoladigan rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarga sayohatning yangiliklariga bardosh bera olmagan.

en: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
uz: Ayniqsa, ilk kunlarda moslashishingizga yordam berishi uchun g'arbiy va sifatli mehmonxonalar, oziq-ovqat hamda xizmatlardan pulingizni ayamang.
