en: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
uz: o'zingiz mahalliy faunasini bilmaydigan joylarda yerga qo'yilgan matras yoki to'shakda uxlamang.

en: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
uz: Agar siz tunni ochiq havoda o'tkazmoqchi bo'lsangiz, ilon, chayon kabilardan saqlanish uchun yig'ma krovat yoki to'r belanchak olib oling.

en: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
uz: Uyingizni ertalab to'yingan qahva bilan va tunda orom oldiruvchi moychechak choyi bilan to'ldiring.

en: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
uz: O'z uyingizda dam olayotganingizda, o'zingizga qarash uchun vaqtingiz bo'ladi va maxsus biror narsa pishirish uchun qo'shimcha bir necha daqiqa sarflang.

en: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
uz: Agar sizni ko'proq sarguzashtlar kutib turgan bo'lsa, sharbat ichish yoki kokteyl tayyorlash imkoniyatidan foydalanib qoling:

en: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
uz: Ehtimol, siz kundalik yumushingizga qaytganingizda nonushta tayyorlashingiz uchun oddiy ichimlikni kashf qilarsiz.

en: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
uz: Agar xilma-xil ichish madaniyatiga ega shaharda yashasangiz, o'zingiz tez-tez borib turmaydigan mahallalardagi barlar yoki qovoqxonalarga boring.

en: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
uz: Tibbiy jargon bilan notanish bo'lganlar uchun infeksion va yuqumli so'zlari turli xil ma'noga ega hisoblanadi.

en: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
uz: Yuqumli kasallik — virus, bakteriya, zamburug' yoki boshqa parazitlar singari patogen qo'zg'atuvchi kasallikdir.

en: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
uz: Yuqumli kasallik — bu kasallangan odamning yaqinida bo'lish bilan osongina yuqadigan kasallikdir.

en: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
uz: Ko'plab hukumatlar o'z davlatlariga kiruvchi mehmonlarni yoki jo'nab ketayotgan aholini bir qancha kasalliklarga qarshi emlashni talab qilishmoqda.

en: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
uz: Mazkur talablar ko'p hollarda sayyohning qaysi davlatlarga tashrif buyurganligi yoki tashrif buyurmoqchiligiga bog'liq bo'ladi.

en: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
uz: Shimoliy Karolinadagi Sharlotta shahrining afzalliklaridan biri — oilalar uchun yuqori sifatli tanlovlarning ko'pligidir.

en: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
uz: Boshqa hududlarning aholisi bu yerga koʻchib oʻtish sababi etib ko'pincha butun oila uchun qulay ekanligini koʻrsatadi va mehmonlar ko'p hollarda bolalar bilan zavqlanish oson deb biladilar.

en: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
uz: So'nggi 20 yilda Sharlotta shahri chetlarida bolalarga qulay bo'lgan variantlar soni keskin oshdi.

en: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
uz: Garchi muayyan holatlarda ba'zan foydalanish mumkin bo'lsa-da, Sharlotdagi oilalar tomon odatda taksilardan foydalanilmaydi.

en: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
uz: 2 nafardan ortiq yo'lovchi uchun qo'shimcha haq olinadi, shu sababli bu tanlov keragidan ortiq qimmatroq bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
uz: Antarktika Yer yuzasidagi eng sovuq joy hisoblanadi va Janubiy Qutbni o'rab turadi.

en: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
uz: Sayohatchilarning tashrifi qimmatga tushadi, jismoniy chidamlilikni talab etiladi, faqat yozgi noyabr-fevral oylarida amalga oshishi mumkin hamda asosan yarimorol, orollar va Ross dengizi bilan cheklanadi.

en: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
uz: Yozda asosan o'sha hududlardagi qirq sakkiztacha bazada bir necha ming xodim yashaydi; kamchiligi qish bo'yi qoladi.

en: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
uz: Ichki Antarktida — bu 2–3 kilometrlik muz bilan qoplangan tashlandiq platodir.

en: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
uz: Tasodifiy mutaxassislarning havo orqali sayohatlari alpinizm bilan shug'ullanish yoki katta bazaga ega bo'lgan Qutbga yetib borish uchun materik ichiga kirib boradi.

en: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
uz: Janubiy qutb shossesi (yoki magistral yo'li) Ross dengizidagi Mak-Merdo bekatidan qutbgacha cho'zilgan 1600 kilometrli yo'ldir.

en: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
uz: Bu qalin muz yoriqlari to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan siqilgan qor. Unda faqat yonilg'i va materiallar yordamida chanalarni tortib, ixtisoslashgan traktorlarda harakatlanish mumkin.

en: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
uz: Bular juda ildam emas, shu sababli yo'l yassi tog'likka yetib borish uchun Transantarktik tog'lar atrofidan uzun burilish olishiga to'g'ri keladi.

en: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
uz: Qish payti sodir bo'ladigan baxtsiz hodisalarning eng keng tarqalgan sababi sirpanchiq yo'llar, yo'lakchalar (piyodalar yo'lakchakari) hamda ayniqsa zinalar hisoblanadi.

en: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
uz: Eng kamida, sizga mos tagcharmga ega bo'lgan oyoq kiyim kerak. Yozgi poyabzallar odatda qor va muzda juda sirpanchiq bo'ladi, hattoki ba'zi qishki etiklar ham tanqis bo'ladi.

en: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
uz: Namuna yetarli darajada — 5 mm (1/5 duym) yoki undan ko'proq chuqur bo'lishi va material sovuq haroratlarda yetarlicha yumshoq bo'lishi kerak.

en: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
uz: Ayrim botinkalar shpilkalarga ega bo'lib, poshna va tagcharmlarga mo'ljallangan, ko'pchilik botinka va tuflilarga mos keluvchi, sirpanchiq holatlar uchun shpilkalangan qo'shimcha jihoz mavjud.

en: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
uz: Poshnalar past va keng bo'lishi kerak. Ko'pincha ishqalanishni kamaytirish uchun yo'llarga qum, shag'al yoki tuz (kalsiy xlorid) sepiladi.

en: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
uz: Qor ko'chkisi g'ayritabiiy holat emas; tik qiyaliklar faqatgina juda sekin ushlab tura oladi va ortiqcha hajmdagi qor ko'chki sifatida pastga tushadi.

en: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
uz: Muammo shundaki, qor yopishqoq, shuning uchun pastga tushishi uchun unga turtki kerak bo'ladi va pastga tushayotgan qor qolganlari uchun turtki beruvchi kuch bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
uz: Ba'zan dastlabki turtki bo'ladigan sabab quyoshning qorni isitishi, ba'zan yana qor yog'ishi, ba'zida boshqa tabiiy hodisalar, ko'pincha esa inson bo'ladi.

en: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
uz: Tornado aylanadigan juda past bosimli havo ustuni bo'lib, atrofdagi havoni ichkariga va tepaga so'rib oladi.

en: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
uz: Ular kuchli shamollarni yuzaga keltiradi (ko'pincha 100–200 mil/soat) va og'ir obyektlarni havoga ko'tarib, tornado harakatlanayotganda ularni o'zi bilan tashib yuradi.

en: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
uz: Ular bo'ronli bulutlardan tushayotgan voronka sifatida boshlanadi va yerga tekkanida "tornadolar"ga aylanadi.

en: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
uz: Shaxsiy VPN (virtual shaxsiy tarmoq) provayderlari ham siyosiy senzurani, ham tijoriy IP-geofiltrlashni aylanib o'tishning ajoyib usulidir.

en: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
uz: Bir qancha sabablarga ko'ra, ular veb proksi-serverlardan afzaldir: Ular faqatgina http'ni emas, balki butun internet trafikni qayta yo'naltiradi.

en: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
uz: Ular odatda yuqoriroq tarmoq kengligi va yaxshiroq xizmat ko'rsatish sifatini taklif qilishadi. Ular shifrlangani sababli ularni kuzatish mushkulroq.

en: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
uz: Media kompaniyalari "qaroqchilikni oldini olish" uchunligini da'vo qilib, buning maqsadi haqida muntazam ravishda yolg'on gapirishadi.

en: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
uz: Hududiy kodlar noqonuniy nusxalashga umuman ta'sir ko'rsatmaydi; diskning bitma-bit qilingan nusxasi har qanday qurilmada asl nusxasi kabi yaxshi ishlaydi.

en: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
uz: Asl maqsad mazkur kompaniyalarga o'z bozorlari ustidan kengroq nazoratni berishdir; barchasi mablag' aylanishi bilan bog'liq.

en: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
uz: Siz o'zingiz yashaydigan yoki sayohat qilayotgan yeringizda joylashgan telefon kompaniyasidan foydalanishingiz shart emas, chunki qo'ng'iroqlar internet orqali yo'naltiriladi.

en: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
uz: O'zingiz yashaydigan hamjamiyatdan mahalliy raqamni olishingiz kerakligi to'g'risidagi talab ham mavjud emas; Chiken, Alyaskaning yovvoyi tabiatida sun'iy yo'ldoshli internet ulanishini olishingiz va sizning quyoshli Arizonada ekanligingizni tasdiqlovchi raqamni tanlashingiz mumkin.

en: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
uz: Ko'p hollarda, PSTN telefonlari uchun sizga qo'ng'iroq qilish imkonini beruvchi global raqamni alohida xarid qilishingizga to'g'ri keladi. Raqamning qayerdan ekanligi sizga qo'ng'iroq qilayotganlar uchun ahamiyatga ega.

en: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
uz: Real vaqt matnli tarjimon ilovalari — matnning butun boshli segmentlarini bir tildan ikkinchisiga avtomatik tarzda tarjima qila oladigan ilovalardir.

en: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
uz: Ushbu toifadagi ba'zi ilovalar, foydalanuvchi smartfonini obyektlar tomon olib borganda, hatto real hayotdagi mazkur belgilar yoki boshqa obyektlar ustidagi chet tillarida yozilgan matnlarni ham tarjima qila oladi.

en: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
uz: Tarjima tizimlari keskin yaxshilandi va hozirda ko'pincha muayyan darajada to'g'ri tarjimalar (hamda kamdan-kam hollarda tushunarsiz) beriladi, lekin bir oz ehtiyotkorlik zarur, chunki ular hali ham hammasini noto'g'ri qabul qilgan bo'lishi mumkin.

en: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
uz: Mazkur toifadagi eng mashhur ilovalardan biri – bu Google Translate bo'lib, u zarur til ma'lumotlari yuklab olinganidan keyin oflayn tarjima qilish imkonini beradi.

en: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
uz: Smartfoningizda GPS navigatsiya ilovalaridan foydalanish o'z mamlakatingizdan tashqarida yo'l topish uchun eng qulay va eng oson usuldir.

en: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
uz: Bu GPS uchun yangi xarita yoki avtonom GPS qurilmasi sotib olish yoki ijaraga beruvchi kompaniyadan bitta avtomobil ijaraga olishga nisbatan pul tejashi mumkin.

en: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
uz: Agar telefoningizda internetga ulanish bo'lmasa yoki u xizmat doirasidan tashqarida bo'lsa, ularning faoliyati cheklanishi yoki ishlamasligi mumkin.

en: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
uz: Har bir burchak do'kon pullik telefonlar yoki odatiy telefonlardan foydalansa bo'ladigan oldindan to'lash telefon kartalarining chalkash qatori bilan to'la.

en: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
uz: Ko'pchilik kartalar istalgan joyga qo'ng'iroq qilish uchun juda mos bo'lgani holda ayrimlari ma'lum mamlakatlar guruhi uchun foydali qo'ng'iroq narxlarini taqim etadi.

en: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
uz: Mazkur xizmatlardan foydalanish, ko'pincha, aksariyat telefonlardan bepul qo'ng'iroq qilish mumkin bo'lgan bepul telefon raqamlari orqali amalga oshiriladi.

en: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
uz: Odatiy suratkashlik qoidalari videoga olishga ham taalluqlidir, balki undan ham ko'proq.

en: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
uz: Agar biror narsani shunchaki rasmga olish ruxsat etilmagan bo'lsa, unda uni videoga olishni hatto xayolingizga ham keltirmasligingiz kerak.

en: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
uz: Agar siz drondan foydalanayotgan bo'lsangiz, avvaldan nimalarni suratga olishga ruxsat berilganligi va qanday ruxsatlar yoki qo'shimcha litsenziyalarni olish talab qilinishini tekshiring.

en: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
uz: Hatto bu sizning hududda noqonuniy bo'lmasa-da, aeroport yaqinida yoxud olomon ustida dron uchirish deyarli hamma vaqt yomon fikrdir.

en: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
uz: Hozirgi kunda havo safarlari dastlab narxlarni izlamasdan va taqqoslamasdan turib, faqat kamdan-kam hollardagina bevosita aviakompaniya orqali bron qilinadi.

en: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
uz: Ba'zi hollarda bitta reys turli agregatorlarda katta farq bilan turlicha narxlarga ega bo'lishi mumkin hamda qidiruv natijalarini solishtirish va chipta buyurtirishdan avval aviakompaniyaning veb-saytini ham ko'rib chiqish foydalidir.

en: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
uz: Ish yuzasidan yoki sayyoh sifatida ma'lum davlatlarga qisqa tashriflar uchun viza shart bo'lmasa-da, u yerga xalqaro talaba sifatida borish oddiy sayyoh sifatida borishga nisbatan ko'proq qolishingizni talab etadi.

en: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
uz: Umumiy holda istalgan xorijiy mamlakatda uzoqroq muddat turish avvaldan viza olishni talab qiladi.

en: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
uz: Talaba vizalari odatiy sayyohlik yoki ish vizalaridan farqli ravishda, odatda turli talablar va ariza topshirish jarayonlariga ega bo'ladi.

en: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
uz: Ko'pgina davlatlar uchun sizga o'qimoqchi bo'lgan muassasangizdan taklif xati, shuningdek, kursingizning kamida birinchi yilida o'zingizni ta'minlash uchun mablag'ga egaligingizni isbotlovchi hujjat kerak bo'ladi.

en: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
uz: Batafsil talablarni bilish uchun institut, shuningdek, o'qishni istagan davlatingizning immigratsiya bo'limiga murojaat qiling.

en: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
uz: Agarda siz diplomat bo'lmasangiz, xorijda ishlash odatda o'zingiz turgan davlatda daromad solig'i to'lashingiz lozimligini bildiradi.

en: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
uz: Daromad solig'i turli davlatlarda turlicha tuzilishga ega hamda soliq stavkalari va sinflari davlatga qarab keskin farq qiladi.

en: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
uz: AQSH va Kanada singari ba'zi federal davlatlarda daromad solig'i ham federal, ham mahalliy darajada undiriladi, shu sababli stavkalar va sinflar hududga qarab farq qilishi mumkin.

en: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
uz: O'z yurtingizga yetib kelganingizda, odatda immigratsiya tekshiruvi bo'lmasa yoki rasmiylashtirilmasa-da, bojxona nazorati qiyin kechishi mumkin.

en: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
uz: Nimani olib kirishingiz mumkin va nimani olib kirishingiz mumkin emasligini bilib olganingizga amin bo'ling va qonuniy me'yorlardan ortiq har qanday narsani taqdim qiling.

en: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
uz: Sayohat haqida yozish bilan shug'ullanishni boshlashning eng oson usuli — biror mashhur sayohat blogi veb-saytida o'z ko'nikmalaringizni charxlashdir.

en: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
uz: Internetda formatlash hamda tahrirlashga qo'lingiz kelib qolgandan keyin, keyinchalik, shaxsiy veb-saytingizni yaratishingiz mumkin.

en: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
uz: Sayohat vaqtida volontyorlik qilish o'zgarishlar qilishning eng ajoyib yo'li, biroq bu shunchaki nimadir berish bilan bog'liq emas.

en: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
uz: Xorijiy davlatda yashash va volontyorlik bilan shug'ullanish — boshqa madaniyat bilan tanishish, yangi odamlarni uchratish, o'zingizni o'rganish, istiqbolni his qilish va hatto yangi ko'nikmalarni o'zlashtirishning ajoyib usulidir.

en: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
uz: Biror joyda uzoqroq turis uchun byudjetni qisqartirish ham yaxshi usul bo'lishi mumkin, chunki ko'ngillilar uchun ko'p ishlar xona va oziq-ovqat bilan ta'milaydilar, ba'zilari esa kichik maosh to'laydilar.

en: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
uz: Vikinglar Qora dengiz va Kaspiy dengiziga borish uchun Rossiya suv yo'llaridan foydalangan. Mazkur yo'nalishlarning qismlaridan hali ham foydalanish mumkin. Qo'lga kiritish qiyin kechishi mumkin bo'lgan maxsus ruxsatnomalarni olish zarurati bor yoki yo'qligini tekshiring.

en: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
uz: Oq dengiz-Boltiq kanali Shimoliy muz okeanini Boltiq dengiziga, Onega ko'li, Ladoga ko'li va Sankt-Peterburg orqali asosan daryo hamda ko'llar bilan bog'lab turadi.

en: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
uz: Onega ko'li, shuningdek, Volgaga ulangan, shu sababli hazungacha Kaspiy dengizidan Rossiya orqali o'tishning imkoni bor.

en: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
uz: Bandargohga yetib borganingizda hammasi yetarlicha aniq bo'lishiga ishonch hosil qiling. Siz boshqa avtostopchilarni uchratasiz va ular siz bilan o'z ma'lumotlarini baham ko'rishadi.

en: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
uz: Umuman olganda siz yordamingizni taklif qilib, doklarni aylanib, yaxtalarini tozalayotgan odamlr, bardagi kemachilar bilan aloqaga kirishishga urinib xabar tarqatasiz.

en: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
uz: Imkoni boricha ko'proq odam bilan gaplashishga harakat qiling. Ma'lum vaqtdan keyin barcha siz haqingizda biladi va qaysi qayiq biror kimni izlayotganligi haqida maslahatlar beradi.

en: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
uz: Siz ittifoqdan aviakompaniyaning bonusli dasturini ehtiyotkorlik bilan tanlashingiz kerak.

en: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
uz: o'zingiz eng ko'p parvoz qiladigan aviakompaniyaga qo'shilish intuitiv deb o'ylashingiz mumkin bo'lsa-da, taklif etiladigan imtiyozlar ko'pincha turli xil bo'lishi va tez-tez uchuvchi yo'lovchi ballari bitta ittifoqdagi boshqa aviakompaniyada saxiyroq bo'lishi mumkinligini bilishingiz kerak.

en: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
uz: Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways va Turkish Airlines singari aviakompaniyalar Afrikadagi xizmatlarini sezilarli darajada kengaytirdi va Afikaning ko'pgina katta shaharlariga reyslarni boshqa Yevropa aviakompaniyalaridan ko'ra raqobatdosh narxlarda taklif qilmoqda.

en: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
uz: Turk Havo yo'llari aviakompaniyasi 2014-yildan boshlab Afrikaning 30 davlatidagi 39 ta manzilga parvozni amalga oshirmoqda.

en: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
uz: Agar sizda sayohat qilish uchun qo'shimcha vaqt bo'lsa, Afrikaga bo'lgan jami yo'l harajatlaringizning dunyo bo'ylab sayohat yo'l harajatlariga nisbatan solishtirib ko'ring.

en: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
uz: Afrikadan tashqaridagi hamma yerlar uchun qo'shimcha vizalar, mamlakatdan chiqish soliqlari, yer usti transporti hamda boshqalarning qo'shimcha chiqimlarni qo'shishni esdan chiqarmang.

en: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
uz: Agar siz janubiy yarimshar bo'ylab to'liq parvoz qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, transokean yo'nalishlarning yo'qligi tufayli parvozlar va manzillar tanlovi cheklangan bo'ladi.

en: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
uz: Hech qaysi aviakompaniya ittifoqi Janubiy Yarimshardagi barcha uchta okeanni kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi (va SkyTeam birorta kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi).

en: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
uz: Biroq Star Alliance aviakompaniyasi, LATAM Oneworld reysi bo'lgan janubiy Tinch okeanining sharqiy qismi Santyago de Chilidan Taitigacha reysidan tashqari, barchasini qamrab oladi.

en: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
uz: Agar siz Janubiy Tinch okeani va Janubiy Amerika g'arbiy qirg'og'ini chetlab o'tmoqchi bo'lsangiz, bu reys yagona variant emas. (pastga qarang)

en: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
uz: 1994-yilda Ozarbayjonning Tog'li Qorabog' hududidagi etnik armanlar ozarbayjonlarga qarshi urush boshladilar.

en: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
uz: Armanistonning qo'llab-quvvatlovi bilan yangi respublika yaratildi. Ammo hech bir obro'li davlat — hattoki Armaniston ham uni rasman tan olmadi.

en: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
uz: Mintaqaga oid diplomatik tortishuvlar Armaniston va Ozarbayjon orasidagi aloqalarga putur yetkazishda davom etmoqda.

en: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
uz: Kanal okrugi (gollandcha: Grachtengordel) — Amsterdamning Binnestadini o'rab turuvchi 17-asrning mashhur okrugidir.

en: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
uz: Butun tuman o'zining yagona madaniy hamda tarixiy qiymati uchun YUNESKOning Butunjahon madaniy merosi ro'yxatiga kiritilgan bo'lib, uning mulkiy qiymati mamlakatning eng yuqorilaridan biridir.

en: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
uz: "Besh mamlakat" degan ma'noni bildiruvchi Cinque Terre Italiyaning Liguriya mintaqasidagi Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza hamda Monterosso singari besh kichik sohil bo'yi qishloqlarni o'z ichiga oladi.

en: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
uz: Ular YUNESKOning Butunjahon madaniy merosi ro'yxatidan joy olgan.

en: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
uz: Asrlar mobaynida kishilar terasalarni ehtiyotkorlik bilan notekis, tik landshaftlar ustida shundoqqina dengiz tepasidagi qoyalarga qadar qurishgan.

en: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
uz: Jozibadorligi qisman ko'zga tashlanuvchi umumiy rivojlanishningning yo'qligidandir. Qishloqlarni yo'llar, poyezdlar va qayiqlar bog'laydi, avtomobillar esa tashqaridan yetib bora olmaydi.

en: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
uz: Garchi o'zaro tushunish uchun yetarlicha o'xshash bo'lsa-da, Belgiya va Shveytsariyada gaplashiladigan fransuz tili turlari Fransiyada gaplashiladigan fransuz tilidan bir oz farq qiladi.

en: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
uz: Xususan, fransuz tilida gaplashuvchi Belgiya va Shveytsariyada raqamlash tizimi frantsuz tilida gaplashuvchi Frantsiyadan bir oz farq qiluvchi ayrim o'ziga xosliklarga ega va ayrim so'zlarning talaffuz qilinishi biroz boshqachadir.

en: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
uz: Shunday bo'lsada, fransuz zabon hamma belgiyalik va shveytsariyaliklar maktabda standart fransuz tilini o'rgangan bo'ladi, shu sababli ham standart fransuz sanash tizimidan foydalansangiz ham sizni tushunadi.

en: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
uz: Dunyoning ko'plab qismlarida qo'lni silkitish do'stona ishora bo'lib, "salom" degan ma'noni bildiradi.

en: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
uz: Biroq Malayziyada, hech bo'lmaganda chekka hududlardagi malaylar orasida, ko'rsatkich barmoqning tana tomon bukilishi — ma'lum g'arb mamlakatlarida foydalaniluvchi imo-ishoraga o'xshash va undan faqat shu maqsadda foydalanilishi kerak.

en: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
uz: Xuddu shu kabi, Ispaniyadagi britaniyalik sayyoh kaft silkituvchi odam tomonga (silkitilayotgan odam tomonga qaratilgan bo'lishi o'rniga) qaratilgan holda qo'l silkitishni xayrlashish sifatida noto'g'ri tushunishi mumkin.

en: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
uz: Yordamchi tillar boshqa holda aloqa qilishga qiynaluvchi odamlar o'rtasidagi aloqani osonlashtirish maqsadida sun'iy yaratilgan yoki tuzilgan tillardir.

en: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
uz: Ular u yoki bu sabab bilan boshqa tillarda gaplashuvchilar o'rtasidagi aloqa vositasi sifatida dominantga aylangan tabiiy yoki organik tillar bo'lgan umumiy tillardan alohidadir.

en: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
uz: Kunning jaziramasida sayohatchilar suv (yoki boshqa narsalar) illyuziyasini hosil qiluvchi saroblarni ko'rishi mumkin.

en: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
uz: Agar sayyoh qimmatli kuchi va qolgan suvni bekorga sarflagan holda sarob ketidan yursa, bu xavfli bo'lishi mumkin.

en: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
uz: Hattoki eng issiq cho'llar ham tunda juda sovuq bo'lishi mumkin. Gipotermiya issiq kiyimlarsiz haqiqatda xavf tug'diradi.

en: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
uz: Ayniqsa, yoz payti tropik o'rmon oralab sayr qilishga qaror qilsangiz, chivinlardan ehtiyot bo'lishingiz lozim.

en: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
uz: Agar siz subtropik yomg'irli o'rmonlar bo'ylab harakatlanayotgan bo'lsangiz ham avtomobilga minayotganingizdagi eshik ochiq bo'ladigan bir necha soniya chivinlarning siz bilan avtomobil ichiga kirishi uchun yetarli vaqtdir.

en: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
uz: Qush grippi yoxud rasmiyroq aytganda, parranda grippi qushlarga ham, sutemizuvchilarga ham zararlashi mumkin.

en: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
uz: Insonlarda mingdan kamroq holat qayd etilgan, lekin ularning ayrimlari o'limga sabab bo'lgan.

en: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
uz: Aksariyati parrandachilik bilan shug'ullanuvchi kishilar bilan bog'liq bo'lgan, biroq qushlarni kuzatuvchilar uchun ham ayrim xavflar mavjud.

en: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
uz: To'satdan baland, u yoki bu darajada tekis platolarga o'rin bo'shatuvchi fordlar va vodiylar Norvegiya uchun xosdir.

en: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
uz: Mazkur platolar bu keng, ochiq daraxtsiz makon, cheksiz kenglikni anglatuvchi "vidde" nomi bilan ataladi.

en: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
uz: Rogaland va Agderda ular ko'pincha archagul bilan qoplangan bepoyon kenglik ma'nosini beruvchi "hei" deb nomlanadi.

en: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
uz: Muzliklar barqaror emas, biroq ular tog'dan pastga oqib tushadi. Bu qor ko'priklari osida ko'rinmay qolishi mumkin bo'lgan yorilishlar, darz ketishlarga olib kelishi mumkin.

en: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
uz: Muz g'orlarining devorlari va tomlari qulab tushishi va yoriqlar yopilib qolishi mumkin.

en: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
uz: Muzliklarning chetidan yirik bo'laklar sinib, pastga qulaydi, ba'zan esa uzoqroqqa irg'ib yoki dumalab ketadi.

en: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
uz: Tog' bekatlari uchun sayyohlik mavsumi odatda hind yozida avjiga chiqadi.

en: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
uz: Shunday bo'lsa-da, ular qish vaqtida o'zgacha go'zallik va jozibaga ega bo'lib, ko'plab tog' bekatlarida yirik miqdorda qor bo'ladi hamda chang'ida uchish va snouboard kabi mashg'ulotlarni taklif qiladi.

en: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
uz: Faqat bir nechta aviakompaniya hali ham yaqin kishisini yo'qotganlik tariflarini taklif qiladi, bu oxirgi daqiqadagi dafn marosimiga borish narxini bir oz pasaytiradi.

en: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
uz: Bularni taklif qiluvchi aviakompaniyalarga Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, AQSH yoki Kanadadan parvozlar uchun Lufthansa hamda WestJet kiradi.

en: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
uz: Barcha hollarda siz aviakompaniyaga bevosita telefon qilish orqali bron qilishingiz kerak.
